[03] ^b^devamanussaana^eb^nti na kevala.m devamanussaana.myeva, avasesaana.m naagasupa.n.naadiinampi atthaaya hitaaya sukhaayeva uppanno. sahetukapa.tisandhike pana ^a^M1.0079^ea^ maggaphalasacchikiriyaaya bhabbe puggale dassetu.m eta.m vutta.m. tasmaa etesampi atthaaya hitaaya sukhaayeva uppannoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^katamo ekapuggalo^eb^ti aya.m pucchaa. pucchaa ca naamesaa pa~ncavidhaa hoti -- adi.t.thajotanaa pucchaa, di.t.thasa.msandanaa pucchaa, vimaticchedanaa pucchaa, anumatipucchaa, kathetukamyataapucchaati.

[03] taasa.m ida.m naanatta.m -- katamaa ^b^adi.t.thajotanaa pucchaa^eb^? pakatiyaa lakkha.na.m a~n~naata.m hoti adi.t.tha.m atulita.m atiirita.m avibhuuta.m abhaavita.m. tassa ~naa.naaya dassanaaya tulanaaya ^a^P1.0102^ea^ tiira.naaya vibhuutatthaaya vibhaavanatthaaya pa~nha.m pucchati, aya.m adi.t.thajotanaa pucchaa.

[03] katamaa ^b^di.t.thasa.msandanaa pucchaa^eb^? pakatiyaa lakkha.na.m ~naata.m hoti di.t.tha.m tulita.m tiirita.m vibhuuta.m vibhaavita.m. so a~n~nehi pa.n.ditehi saddhi.m sa.msandanatthaaya pa~nha.m pucchati, aya.m di.t.thasa.msandanaa pucchaa.

[03] katamaa ^b^vimaticchedanaa pucchaa^eb^? pakatiyaa sa.msayapakkhanto hoti vimatipakkhanto dve.lhakajaato ``eva.m nu kho, na nu kho, ki.m nu kho, katha.m nu kho''ti. so vimaticchedanatthaaya pa~nha.m pucchati, aya.m vimaticchedanaa pucchaa.

[03] katamaa ^b^anumatipucchaa^eb^? bhagavaa hi bhikkhuuna.m anumatiyaa pa~nha.m pucchati -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bhante''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m ^a^V1.0084^ea^ nu kho ta.m samanupassitu.m eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''ti, aya.m anumatipucchaa.

[03] katamaa ^b^kathetukamyataapucchaa^eb^? bhagavaa bhikkhuuna.m kathetukamyataaya pa~nha.m pucchati -- ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro''ti? aya.m kathetukamyataapucchaati.

[03] tattha buddhaana.m purimaa tisso pucchaa natthi. kasmaa? buddhaana.m hi tiisu addhaasu ki~nci sa"nkhata.m addhaavimutta.m vaa asa"nkhata.m adi.t.tha.m ajaanita.m atulita.m atiirita.m avibhuuta.m avibhaavita.m naama natthi, tasmaa tesa.m adi.t.thajotanaapucchaa natthi. ya.m pana bhagavataa attano ~naa.nena pa.tividdha.m, tassa a~n~nena sama.nena vaa braahma.nena ^a^P1.0103^ea^ vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa saddhi.m sa.msandanakicca.m ^a^M1.0080^ea^ natthi. tenassa di.t.thasa.msandanaapucchaa natthi. yasmaa panesa akatha.mkathii ti.n.navicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasa.msayo, tenassa vimaticchedanaapucchaa natthi. itaraa pana dve pucchaa bhagavato atthi, taasu aya.m kathetukamyataapucchaati veditabbaa.

[03] idaani taaya pucchaaya pu.t.tha.m ekapuggala.m vibhaavento ^b^tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho^eb^ti aaha. tattha ^b^tathaagato^eb^ti a.t.thahi kaara.nehi bhagavaa tathaagato -- tathaa aagatoti tathaagato, tathaa gatoti tathaagato, tathalakkha.na.m aagatoti tathaagato, tathadhamme yaathaavato abhisambuddhoti tathaagato, tathadassitaaya tathaagato, tathavaaditaaya tathaagato, tathaakaaritaaya tathaagato, abhibhavana.t.thena tathaagatoti.

[03] katha.m bhagavaa ^b^tathaa aagatoti tathaagato^eb^? yathaa sabbalokahitaaya ussukkamaapannaa purimakaa sammaasambuddhaa aagataa, yathaa vipassii bhagavaa aagato, yathaa sikhii bhagavaa, yathaa vessabhuu bhagavaa, yathaa kakusandho bhagavaa, yathaa ko.naagamano bhagavaa, yathaa kassapo bhagavaa aagatoti. ki.m vutta.m hoti? yena abhiniihaarena ete bhagavanto aagataa, teneva amhaakampi bhagavaa aagato. atha vaa yathaa vipassii bhagavaa...pe0... yathaa kassapo bhagavaa daanapaarami.m puuretvaa, siilanekkhammapa~n~naaviiriyakhantisaccaadhi.t.thaanamettaaupekkhaapaarami.m puuretvaa imaa dasa paaramiyo, dasa upapaaramiyo, dasa paramatthapaaramiyoti samati.msa paaramiyo puuretvaa, a"ngapariccaaga.m nayanadhanarajjaputtadaarapariccaaganti ime pa~nca mahaapariccaage pariccajitvaa, pubbayogapubbacariyadhammakkhaana~naatatthacariyaadayo ^a^V1.0085^ea^ puuretvaa buddhicariyaaya ko.ti.m patvaa aagato, tathaa amhaakampi bhagavaa aagato. yathaa ca vipassii bhagavaa ^a^P1.0104^ea^...pe0... kassapo bhagavaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane cattaaro sammappadhaane cattaaro iddhipaade pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"nge ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaavetvaa bruuhetvaa aagato, tathaa amhaakampi bhagavaa aagatoti tathaagato.
[21] ``yatheva ^a^M1.0081^ea^ lokamhi vipassiaadayo,
[27] sabba~n~nubhaava.m munayo idhaagataa.
[26] tathaa aya.m sakyamuniipi aagato,
[22] tathaagato vuccati tena cakkhumaa''ti..
[03] eva.m tathaa aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaa gatoti tathaagato^eb^? yathaa sampatijaato vipassii bhagavaa gato...pe0... kassapo bhagavaa gato. katha~nca so gatoti? so hi sampatijaatova samehi paadehi pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya uttaraabhimukho sattapadaviitihaarena gato. yathaaha -- ``sampatijaato, aananda, bodhisatto samehi paadehi pathaviya.m pati.t.thahitvaa uttaraabhimukho sattapadaviitihaarena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhaariyamaane, sabbaa ca disaa anuviloketi, aasabhi~nca vaaca.m bhaasati `aggohamasmi lokassa, je.t.thohamasmi lokassa, se.t.thohamasmi lokassa, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti (ma0 ni0 3.207). ta~ncassa gamana.m tatha.m ahosi avitatha.m anekesa.m visesaadhigamaana.m pubbanimittabhaavena. ya~nhi so sampatijaatova samehi paadehi pati.t.thahi, idamassa caturiddhipaadapa.tilaabhassa pubbanimitta.m, uttaraabhimukhabhaavo pana sabbalokuttarabhaavassa pubbanimitta.m, sattapadaviitihaaro sattabojjha"ngaratanapa.tilaabhassa, ``suva.n.nada.n.daa viitipatanti caamaraa''ti (su0 ni0 693) ettha vuttacaamarukkhepo pana sabbatitthiyanimmathanassa ^a^P1.0105^ea^ pubbanimitta.m, setacchattadhaara.na.m arahattaphalavimuttivaravimalasetacchattapa.tilaabhassa pubbanimitta.m, sabbadisaanuvilokana.m sabba~n~nutaanaavara.na~naa.napa.tilaabhassa pubbanimitta.m, aasabhivaacaabhaasana.m appa.tivattiyavaradhammacakkappavattanassa pubbanimitta.m. tathaa aya.m ^a^V1.0086^ea^ bhagavaapi gato. ta~ncassa gamana.m katha.m ahosi avitatha.m tesa.myeva visesaadhigamaana.m pubbanimittabhaavena. tenaahu poraa.naa --
[21] ``muhuttajaatova gavampatii yathaa,
[27] samehi paadehi phusii vasundhara.m.
[26] so vikkamii satta padaani gotamo,
[22] seta~nca chatta.m anudhaarayu.m maruu..
[21] ``gantvaana ^a^M1.0082^ea^ so satta padaani gotamo,
[27] disaa vilokesi samaa samantato.
[26] a.t.tha"ngupeta.m giramabbhudiirayi,
[22] siiho yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito''ti..
[03] eva.m tathaa gatoti tathaagato.

[03] atha vaa yathaa vipassii bhagavaa...pe0... yathaa kassapo bhagavaa, ayampi bhagavaa tatheva nekkhammena kaamacchanda.m pahaaya gato, abyaapaadena byaapaada.m, aalokasa~n~naaya thinamiddha.m, avikkhepena uddhaccakukkucca.m, dhammavavatthaanena vicikiccha.m pahaaya gato, ~naa.nena avijja.m padaaletvaa gato, paamojjena arati.m vinodetvaa, pa.thamajjhaanena niivara.nakavaa.ta.m ugghaa.tetvaa, dutiyajjhaanena vitakkavicaara.m vuupasametvaa, tatiyajjhaanena piiti.m viraajetvaa, catutthajjhaanena sukhadukkha.m pahaaya, aakaasaana~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa ruupasa~n~naapa.tighasa~n~naanaanattasa~n~naayo samatikkamitvaa, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasamaapattiyaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m, aaki~nca~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa ^a^P1.0106^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~na.m, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasamaapattiyaa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~na.m samatikkamitvaa gato.

[03] aniccaanupassanaaya niccasa~n~na.m pahaaya, dukkhaanupassanaaya sukhasa~n~na.m, anattaanupassanaaya attasa~n~na.m, nibbidaanupassanaaya nandi.m, viraagaanupassanaaya raaga.m, nirodhaanupassanaaya samudaya.m, pa.tinissaggaanupassanaaya aadaana.m, khayaanupassanaaya ghanasa~n~na.m, vayaanupassanaaya ^a^V1.0087^ea^ aayuuhana.m, vipari.naamaanupassanaaya dhuvasa~n~na.m, animittaanupassanaaya nimittasa~n~na.m, appa.nihitaanupassanaaya pa.nidhi.m, su~n~nataanupassanaaya abhinivesa.m, adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya saaraadaanaabhinivesa.m, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanena sammohaabhinivesa.m, aadiinavaanupassanaaya aalayaabhinivesa.m, pa.tisa"nkhaanupassanaaya appa.tisa"nkha.m, viva.t.taanupassanaaya sa.myogaabhinivesa.m, sotaapattimaggena di.t.theka.t.the kilese bha~njitvaa, sakadaagaamimaggena o.laarike kilese pahaaya, anaagaamimaggena a.nusahagate kilese samugghaatetvaa, arahattamaggena sabbakilese samucchinditvaa gato. evampi tathaa gatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^a^M1.0083^ea^ ^b^tathalakkha.na.m aagatoti tathaagato^eb^? pathaviidhaatuyaa kakkha.lattalakkha.na.m tatha.m avitatha.m, aapodhaatuyaa pagghara.nalakkha.na.m, tejodhaatuyaa u.nhattalakkha.na.m, vaayodhaatuyaa vitthambhanalakkha.na.m, aakaasadhaatuyaa asamphu.t.thalakkha.na.m, vi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa vijaananalakkha.na.m.
[03] ruupassa ruppanalakkha.na.m, vedanaaya vedayitalakkha.na.m, sa~n~naaya sa~njaananalakkha.na.m, sa"nkhaaraana.m abhisa"nkhara.nalakkha.na.m, vi~n~naa.nassa vijaananalakkha.na.m.
[03] vitakkassa abhiniropanalakkha.na.m, vicaarassa anumajjanalakkha.na.m, piitiyaa phara.nalakkha.na.m, sukhassa saatalakkha.na.m, cittekaggataaya avikkhepalakkha.na.m, phassassa phusanalakkha.na.m.

[03] saddhindriyassa adhimokkhalakkha.na.m, viiriyindriyassa paggahalakkha.na.m, satindriyassa ^a^P1.0107^ea^ upa.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, samaadhindriyassa avikkhepalakkha.na.m, pa~n~nindriyassa pajaananalakkha.na.m.
[03] saddhaabalassa assaddhiye akampiyalakkha.na.m, viiriyabalassa kosajje, satibalassa mu.t.thassacce, samaadhibalassa uddhacce, pa~n~naabalassa avijjaaya akampiyalakkha.na.m.

[03] satisambojjha"ngassa upa.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngassa pavicayalakkha.na.m, viiriyasambojjha"ngassa paggahalakkha.na.m, piitisambojjha"ngassa phara.nalakkha.na.m, passaddhisambojjha"ngassa vuupasamalakkha.na.m ^a^V1.0088^ea^, samaadhisambojjha"ngassa avikkhepalakkha.na.m, upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa pa.tisa"nkhaanalakkha.na.m.

[03] sammaadi.t.thiyaa dassanalakkha.na.m, sammaasa"nkappassa abhiniropanalakkha.na.m, sammaavaacaaya pariggahalakkha.na.m, sammaakammantassa samu.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, sammaaaajiivassa vodaanalakkha.na.m, sammaavaayaamassa paggahalakkha.na.m, sammaasatiyaa upa.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, sammaasamaadhissa avikkhepalakkha.na.m.

[03] avijjaaya a~n~naa.nalakkha.na.m, sa"nkhaaraana.m cetanaalakkha.na.m, vi~n~naa.nassa vijaananalakkha.na.m, naamassa namanalakkha.na.m, ruupassa ruppanalakkha.na.m, sa.laayatanassa aayatanalakkha.na.m, phassassa phusanalakkha.na.m, vedanaaya vedayitalakkha.na.m, ta.nhaaya hetulakkha.na.m, upaadaanassa gaha.nalakkha.na.m, bhavassa aayuuhanalakkha.na.m, jaatiyaa nibbattilakkha.na.m, jaraaya jiira.nalakkha.na.m, mara.nassa cutilakkha.na.m.

[03] dhaatuuna.m ^a^M1.0084^ea^ su~n~nataalakkha.na.m, aayatanaana.m aayatanalakkha.na.m, satipa.t.thaanaana.m upa.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, sammappadhaanaana.m padahanalakkha.na.m, iddhipaadaana.m ijjhanalakkha.na.m, indriyaana.m adhipatilakkha.na.m, balaana.m akampiyalakkha.na.m, bojjha"ngaana.m niyyaanalakkha.na.m, maggassa hetulakkha.na.m.
[03] saccaana.m tathalakkha.na.m, samathassa avikkhepalakkha.na.m, vipassanaaya anupassanaalakkha.na.m, samathavipassanaana.m ekarasalakkha.na.m, yuganaddhaana.m anativattanalakkha.na.m.
[03] siilavisuddhiyaa ^a^P1.0108^ea^ sa.mvara.nalakkha.na.m, cittavisuddhiyaa avikkhepalakkha.na.m, di.t.thivisuddhiyaa dassanalakkha.na.m.
[03] khaye ~naa.nassa samucchedalakkha.na.m, anuppaade ~naa.nassa passaddhilakkha.na.m.

[03] chandassa muulalakkha.na.m, manasikaarassa samu.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, phassassa samodhaanalakkha.na.m, vedanaaya samosara.nalakkha.na.m, samaadhissa pamukhalakkha.na.m, satiyaa aadhipateyyalakkha.na.m, pa~n~naaya tatuttariyalakkha.na.m ^a^V1.0089^ea^, vimuttiyaa saaralakkha.na.m, amatogadhassa nibbaanassa pariyosaanalakkha.na.m tatha.m avitatha.m. eva.m tathalakkha.na.m ~naa.nagatiyaa aagato avirajjhitvaa patto anuppattoti tathaagato. eva.m tathalakkha.na.m aagatoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathadhamme yaathaavato abhisambuddhoti tathaagato^eb^? tathadhammaa naama cattaari ariyasaccaani. yathaaha -- ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, tathaani avitathaani ana~n~nathaani. katamaani cattaari? `ida.m dukkha'nti, bhikkhave, tathameta.m avitathameta.m ana~n~nathameta''nti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1090) vitthaaro. taani ca bhagavaa abhisambuddho, tasmaa tathaana.m abhisambuddhattaa tathaagatoti vuccati. abhisambodhattho hi ettha gatasaddo.

[03] apica jaraamara.nassa jaatipaccayasambhuutasamudaagata.t.tho tatho avitatho ana~n~natho...pe0... sa"nkhaaraana.m avijjaapaccayasambhuutasamudaagata.t.tho tatho avitatho ana~n~natho. tathaa avijjaaya sa"nkhaaraana.m paccaya.t.tho, sa"nkhaaraana.m vi~n~naa.nassa paccaya.t.tho...pe0... jaatiyaa jaraamara.nassa paccaya.t.tho tatho avitatho ana~n~natho. ta.m sabba.m bhagavaa abhisambuddho. tasmaapi ^a^M1.0085^ea^ tathaana.m dhammaana.m abhisambuddhattaa tathaagatoti vuccati. eva.m tathadhamme yaathaavato abhisambuddhoti tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathadassitaaya tathaagato^eb^? bhagavaa ^a^P1.0109^ea^ ya.m sadevake loke...pe0... sadevamanussaaya aparimaa.naasu lokadhaatuusu aparimaa.naana.m sattaana.m cakkhudvaare aapaatha.m aagacchanta.m ruupaaramma.na.m naama atthi, ta.m sabbaakaarato jaanaati passati. eva.m jaanataa passataa ca tena ta.m i.t.thaani.t.thaadivasena vaa di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatesu labbhamaanakapadavasena vaa ``katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m? ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka''ntiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 616) nayena anekehi naamehi terasahi vaarehi dvepa~n~naasaaya nayehi vibhajjamaana.m tathameva hoti, vitatha.m natthi. esa nayo sotadvaaraadiisupi aapaathamaagacchantesu saddaadiisu. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa -- ``ya.m, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sadevamanussaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tamaha.m jaanaami, tamaha.m abbha~n~naasi.m, ta.m tathaagatassa vidita.m, ta.m tathaagato na upa.t.thaasii''ti (a0 ni0 4.24). eva.m tathadassitaaya tathaagato. tattha tathadassiiatthe tathaagatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.

[03] katha.m ^a^V1.0090^ea^ ^b^tathavaaditaaya tathaagato^eb^? ya.m ratti.m bhagavaa bodhima.n.de aparaajitapalla"nke nisinno ti.n.na.m maaraana.m matthaka.m madditvaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho, ya~nca ratti.m yamakasaalaana.m antare anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi, etthantare pa~ncacattaaliisavassaparimaa.ne kaale pa.thamabodhiyaapi majjhimabodhiyaapi pacchimabodhiyaapi ya.m bhagavataa bhaasita.m sutta.m geyya.m...pe0... vedalla.m, sabba.m ^a^P1.0110^ea^ ta.m atthato ca bya~njanato ca anupavajja.m anuuna.m anadhika.m sabbaakaaraparipu.n.na.m raagamadanimmadana.m dosamohamadanimmadana.m, natthi tattha vaalaggamattampi avakkhalita.m, sabba.m ta.m ekamuddikaaya la~nchita.m viya ekanaa.likaaya mita.m viya ekatulaaya tulita.m viya ca tathameva hoti avitatha.m. tenaaha -- ``ya~nca, cunda, ratti.m tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, ya.m etasmi.m antare bhaasati ^a^M1.0086^ea^ lapati niddisati, sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti no a~n~nathaa. tasmaa tathaagatoti vuccatii''ti (dii0 ni0 3.188). gadattho hi ettha gatasaddo. eva.m tathavaaditaaya tathaagato.
[03] apica aagadana.m aagado, vacananti attho. tatho avipariito aagado assaati dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa tathaagatoti evampetasmi.m atthe padasiddhi veditabbaa.

[03] katha.m ^b^tathaakaaritaaya tathaagato^eb^? bhagavato hi vaacaaya kaayo anulometi kaayassapi vaacaa, tasmaa yathaavaadii tathaakaarii yathaakaarii tathaavaadii ca hoti. eva.m bhuutassa cassa yathaa vaacaa, kaayopi tathaa gato, pavattoti attho. yathaa ca kaayo, vaacaapi tathaa gataati tathaagato. tenevaaha -- ``yathaavaadii, bhikkhave, tathaagato tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. iti yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.23). eva.m tathaakaaritaaya tathaagato.

[03] katha.m ^b^abhibhavana.t.thena tathaagato^eb^? upari bhavagga.m he.t.thaa aviici.m pariyanta.m katvaa tiriya.m ^a^P1.0111^ea^ aparimaa.naasu lokadhaatuusu sabbasatte abhibhavati siilenapi samaadhinaapi pa~n~naayapi vimuttiyaapi, na tassa tulaa vaa pamaa.na.m vaa atthi, atulo appameyyo anuttaro raajaraajo devadevo sakkaanamatisakko brahmaanamatibrahmaa. tenaaha -- ``sadevake loke, bhikkhave...pe0... sadevamanussaaya ^a^V1.0091^ea^ tathaagato abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthu daso vasavattii. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.23).

[03] tatreva.m padasiddhi veditabbaa -- agado viya agado. ko panesa? desanaavilaaso ceva pu~n~nussayo ca. tena hesa mahaanubhaavo bhisakko dibbaagadena sappe viya sabbaparappavaadino sadevaka~nca loka.m abhibhavati. iti sabbalokaabhibhavane tatho avipariito desanaavilaaso ceva pu~n~nussayo ca agado assaati dakaarassa takaara.m katvaa tathaagatoti veditabbo. eva.m abhibhavana.t.thena tathaagato.

[03] apica ^a^M1.0087^ea^ tathaaya gatotipi tathaagato, tatha.m gatotipi tathaagato, gatoti avagato atiito patto pa.tipannoti attho. tattha sakalaloka.m tiira.napari~n~naaya tathaaya gato avagatoti tathaagato. lokasamudaya.m pahaanapari~n~naaya tathaaya gato atiitoti tathaagato, lokanirodha.m sacchikiriyaaya tathaaya gato pattoti tathaagato, lokanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m tathaaya gato pa.tipannoti tathaagato. tena ya.m vutta.m bhagavataa --

[02] ``loko, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho, lokasmaa tathaagato ^a^P1.0112^ea^ visa.myutto. lokasamudayo, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathaagatassa pahiino. lokanirodho, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathaagatassa sacchikato. lokanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa, lokanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa tathaagatassa bhaavitaa. ya.m, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa...pe0... sabba.m ta.m tathaagatena abhisambuddha.m. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.23).
[03] tassapi eva.m attho veditabbo. idampi ca tathaagatassa tathaagatabhaavadiipane mukhamattameva. sabbaakaarena pana tathaagatova tathaagatassa tathaagatabhaava.m va.n.neyya.

[03] ^b^araha.m sammaasambuddho^eb^ti padadvaye pana aarakattaa, ariina.m araana~nca hatattaa, paccayaadiina.m arahattaa, paapakara.ne rahaabhaavaati imehi taava kaara.nehi arahanti veditabbo. sammaa saama~nca sabbadhammaana.m ^a^V1.0092^ea^ buddhattaa pana ^b^sammaasambuddho^eb^ti ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaarato paneta.m padadvaya.m visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.123 aadayo) buddhaanussativa.n.nanaaya.m pakaasitanti.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^paatubhaavo^eb^ti uppatti nipphatti. ^b^dullabho lokasmi^eb^nti imasmi.m sattaloke dullabho sudullabho paramadullabho. kasmaa dullabhoti? ekavaara.m daanapaarami.m puuretvaa buddhena bhavitu.m na sakkaa, dve vaare dasa vaare viisati vaare pa~n~naasa vaare vaarasata.m vaarasahassa.m vaarasatasahassa.m vaarako.tisatasahassampi daanapaarami.m puuretvaa buddhena bhavitu.m ^a^M1.0088^ea^ na sakkaa, tathaa ekadivasa.m dve divase dasa divase viisati divase pa~n~naasa divase divasasata.m divasasahassa.m divasasatasahassa.m divasako.tisatasahassa.m ^a^P1.0113^ea^. ekamaasa.m dve maase...pe0... maasako.tisatasahassa.m. ekasa.mvacchara.m dve sa.mvacchare...pe0... sa.mvaccharako.tisatasahassa.m. ekakappa.m dve kappe...pe0... kappako.tisatasahassa.m. kappaana.m eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m dve asa"nkhyeyyaani tii.ni asa"nkhyeyyaani daanapaarami.m puuretvaa buddhena bhavitu.m na sakkaa. siilapaaramiinekkhammapaaramii...pe0... upekkhaapaaramiisupi eseva nayo. pacchimako.tiyaa pana kappasatasahassaadhikaani cattaari asa"nkhyeyyaani dasa paaramiyo puuretvaa buddhena bhavitu.m sakkaati iminaa kaara.nena dullabho.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^acchariyamanusso^eb^ti acchariyo manusso. acchariyoti andhassa pabbataaroha.na.m viya nicca.m na hotiiti attho. aya.m taava saddanayo. aya.m pana a.t.thakathaanayo -- accharaayoggoti acchariyo, acchara.m paharitvaa passitabboti attho. apica ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa paatubhavantii''ti (a0 ni0 4.127) evamaadiihi anekehi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannaagatattaapi acchariyamanusso. aaci.n.namanussotipi acchariyamanusso.

[03] abhiniihaarassa hi sampaadake a.t.tha dhamme samodhaanetvaa ekabuddhassa sammukhe mahaabodhima.n.de maanasa.m bandhitvaa nisajjana.m naama na a~n~nassa kassaci aaci.n.na.m, sabba~n~nubodhisattasseva aaci.n.na.m. tathaa buddhaana.m santike byaakara.na.m labhitvaa anivattakena hutvaa viiriyaadhi.t.thaana.m adhi.t.thaaya buddhakaarakadhammaana.m puura.nampi na a~n~nassa kassaci aaci.n.na.m, sabba~n~nubodhisattasseva aaci.n.na.m. tathaa paaramiyo gabbha.m ga.nhaapetvaa ^a^P1.0114^ea^ vessantarattabhaavasadise attabhaave .thatvaa sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.ditaana.m hatthiina.m sattasataani assaana.m sattasataaniiti eva.m sattasatakamahaadaana.m datvaa ^a^V1.0093^ea^ jaalikumaarasadisa.m putta.m, ka.nhaajinaasadisa.m dhiitara.m, maddiidevisadisa.m bhariya~nca daanamukhe niyyaatetvaa yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa dutiye attabhaave tusitabhavane pa.tisandhiggaha.nampi na a~n~nassa kassaci aaci.n.na.m, sabba~n~nubodhisattasseva aaci.n.na.m. tusitapure yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa devataana.m aayaacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa pa~ncamahaavilokana.m viloketvaa satassa ^a^M1.0089^ea^ sampajaanassa tusitapuraa cavitvaa mahaabhogakule pa.tisandhiggaha.nampi na a~n~nassa kassaci aaci.n.na.m, sabba~n~nubodhisattasseva aaci.n.na.m. tathaa pa.tisandhiggaha.nadivase dasasahassilokadhaatukampanampi, satassa sampajaanassa maatukucchiya.m nivaasopi, satassa sampajaanassa maatukucchito nikkhamanadivase dasasahassilokadhaatukampanampi, sampatijaatassa sattapadaviitihaaragamanampi, dibbasetacchatta0 dhaara.nampi, dibbavaa.labiijanukkhepopi, sabbadisaasu siihavilokana.m viloketvaa attanaa pa.tisama.m ka~nci satta.m adisvaa ``aggohamasmi lokassaa''ti eva.m siihanaadanadanampi, paripaakagate ~naa.ne mahaasampatti.m pahaaya mahaabhinikkhamanampi, mahaabodhima.n.de palla"nkena nisinnassa maaravijaya.m aadi.m katvaa pubbenivaasaanussatidibbacakkhuvisodhanaani katvaa paccuusasamaye sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nagu.naraasipa.tividdhakkha.ne dasasahassilokadhaatukampanampi, pa.thamadhammadesanaaya anuttara.m tipariva.t.ta.m dhammacakkappavattanampiiti evamaadi sabba.m na a~n~nassa kassaci aaci.n.na.m, sabba~n~nubuddhasseva aaci.n.na.m. eva.m aaci.n.namanussotipi acchariyamanusso.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P1.0115^ea^ ^b^kaalakiriyaa^eb^ti ekasmi.m kaale paaka.taa kiriyaati kaalakiriyaa. tathaagato hi pa~ncacattaaliisa vassaani .thatvaa tii.ni pi.takaani pa~nca nikaaye nava"nga.m satthusaasana.m caturaasiiti dhammakkhandhasahassaani pakaasetvaa mahaajana.m nibbaananinna.m nibbaanapo.na.m katvaa yamakasaalaanamantare nipanno bhikkhusa"ngha.m aamantetvaa appamaadena ovaditvaa sato sampajaano anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi. ayamassa kiriyaa yaavajjatanaa paaka.taati ekasmi.m kaale paaka.taa kiriyaati kaalakiriyaa. ^b^anutappaa hotii^eb^ti anutaapakaraa hoti. tattha cakkavattira~n~no kaalakiriyaa ekacakkavaa.le devamanussaana.m anutaapakaraa hoti. buddhaana.m kaalakiriyaa dasasahassacakkavaa.lesu devamanussaana.m anutaapakaraa hoti. tena vutta.m -- ``bahuno janassa anutappaa hotii''ti.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ pa~ncame ^b^adutiyo^eb^ti dutiyassa buddhassa abhaavaa adutiyo. cattaaro hi buddhaa sutabuddho, catusaccabuddho, paccekabuddho, sabba~n~nubuddhoti. tattha bahussuto bhikkhu ^b^sutabuddho^eb^ naama ^a^V1.0094^ea^. khii.naasavo ^b^catusaccabuddho^eb^ naama ^a^M1.0090^ea^. kappasatasahassaadhikaani dve asa"nkhyeyyaani paaramiyo puuretvaa saama.m pa.tividdhapaccekabodhi~naa.no ^b^paccekabuddho^eb^ naama. kappasatasahassaadhikaani cattaari vaa a.t.tha vaa so.lasa vaa asa"nkhyeyyaani paaramiyo puuretvaa ti.n.na.m maaraana.m matthaka.m madditvaa pa.tividdhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.no ^b^sabba~n~nubuddho^eb^ naama. imesu catuusu buddhesu sabba~n~nubuddhova adutiyo naama. na hi tena saddhi.m a~n~no sabba~n~nubuddho naama uppajjati.

[03] ^b^asahaayo^eb^ti attabhaavena vaa pa.tividdhadhammehi vaa sadiso sahaayo naama assa natthiiti asahaayo. ``laddhasahaayo kho pana so bhagavaa sekhaana~nceva pa.tipadaana''nti iminaa pana pariyaayena sekhaasekhaa buddhaana.m sahaayaa naama honti. ^b^appa.timo^eb^ti pa.timaa ^a^P1.0116^ea^ vuccati attabhaavo, tassa attabhaavasadisaa a~n~naa pa.timaa natthiiti appa.timo. yaapi ca manussaa suva.n.narajataadimayaa pa.timaa karonti, taasu vaalaggamattampi okaasa.m tathaagatassa attabhaavasadisa.m kaatu.m samattho naama natthiiti sabbathaapi appa.timo.

[03] ^b^appa.tisamo^eb^ti attabhaavenevassa pa.tisamo naama koci natthiiti appa.tisamo. ^b^appa.tibhaago^eb^ti ye tathaagatena ``cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''tiaadinaa nayena dhammaa desitaa, tesu ``na cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, tayo vaa pa~nca vaa''tiaadinaa nayena pa.tibhaaga.m kaatu.m samattho naama natthiiti appa.tibhaago. ^b^appa.tipuggalo^eb^ti a~n~no koci ``aha.m buddho''ti eva.m pa.ti~n~na.m kaatu.m samattho puggalo natthiiti appa.tipuggalo. ^b^asamo^eb^ti appa.tipuggalattaava sabbasattehi asamo. ^b^asamasamo^eb^ti asamaa vuccanti atiitaanaagataa sabba~n~nubuddhaa, tehi asamehi samoti asamasamo.

[03] ^b^dvipadaana.m aggo^eb^ti sammaasambuddho apadaana.m dvipadaana.m catuppadaana.m bahuppadaana.m ruupiina.m aruupiina.m sa~n~niina.m asa~n~niina.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niina.m sattaana.m aggova. kasmaa idha dvipadaana.m aggoti vutto? se.t.thataravasena. imasmi~nhi loke se.t.tho naama uppajjamaano apadacatuppadabahuppadesu na uppajjati, dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. kataradvipadvesuuti? manussesu ceva devesu ca. manussesu uppajjamaano tisahassimahaasahassilokadhaatu.m vase vattetu.m samattho ^a^M1.0091^ea^ buddho hutvaa uppajjati. devesu uppajjamaano dasasahassilokadhaatu.m vasavattii mahaabrahmaa hutvaa uppajjati. so ^a^V1.0095^ea^ tassa kappiyakaarako vaa aaraamiko ^a^P1.0117^ea^ vaa sampajjati. iti tatopi se.t.thataravasenesa dvipadaana.m aggoti vutto.

[03] 175-186^b^.^eb^ cha.t.thaadiisu ^b^ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, paatubhaavaa mahato cakkhussa paatubhaavo hotii^eb^ti, bhikkhave, ekapuggalassa tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavena mahantassa cakkhussa paatubhaavo hoti. tasmi.m puggale paatubhuute ta.m paatubhuutameva hoti, na vinaa tassa paatubhaavena paatubhavati. ^b^paatubhaavo^eb^ti uppatti nipphatti. katamassa cakkhussaati? pa~n~naacakkhussa. kiivaruupassaati? saariputtattherassa vipassanaapa~n~naasadisassa mahaamoggallaanattherassa samaadhipa~n~naasadisassaati. ^b^aalokaa^eb^diisupi eseva nayo. ubhinna.m aggasaavakaana.m pa~n~naaaalokasadisoyeva hi ettha aaloko, pa~n~naaobhaasasadisoyeva obhaaso adhippeto. ``mahato cakkhussa, mahato aalokassa, mahato obhaasassaa''ti imaani ca pana tii.nipi lokiyalokuttaramissakaani kathitaaniiti veditabbaani.

[03] ^b^channa.m anuttariyaana^eb^nti uttaritaravirahitaana.m channa.m uttamadhammaana.m. tattha dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m, paaricariyaanuttariya.m, anussataanuttariyanti imaani cha anuttariyaani. imesa.m paatubhaavo hotiiti attho. aayasmaa hi aanandatthero saaya.mpaata.m tathaagata.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nena da.t.thu.m labhati, ida.m ^b^dassanaanuttariya.m^eb^. a~n~nopi sotaapanno vaa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa aanandatthero viya tathaagata.m dassanaaya labhati, idampi dassanaanuttariya.m ^a^P1.0118^ea^. aparo pana puthujjanakalyaa.nako aanandatthero viya dasabala.m dassanaaya labhitvaa ta.m dassana.m va.d.dhetvaa sotaapattimagga.m paapeti. ida.m dassanameva naama, muuladassana.m pana dassanaanuttariya.m naama.

[03] aanandattheroyeva ca abhikkha.na.m dasabalassa vacana.m sotavi~n~naa.nena sotu.m labhati, ida.m ^b^savanaanuttariya.m^eb^. a~n~nepi sotaapannaadayo aanandatthero viya tathaagatassa vacana.m savanaaya labhanti, idampi savanaanuttariya.m. aparo pana puthujjanakalyaa.nako aanandatthero viya tathaagatassa ^a^M1.0092^ea^ vacana.m sotu.m labhitvaa ta.m savana.m va.d.dhetvaa sotaapattimagga.m paapeti. ida.m savanameva naama, muulasavana.m pana savanaanuttariya.m naama.

[03] aanandattheroyeva ^a^V1.0096^ea^ ca dasabale saddha.m pa.tilabhati, ida.m ^b^laabhaanuttariya.m^eb^. a~n~nepi sotaapannaadayo aanandatthero viya dasabale saddhaapa.tilaabha.m labhanti, idampi laabhaanuttariya.m. aparo pana puthujjanakalyaa.nako aanandatthero viya dasabale saddhaapa.tilaabha.m labhitvaa ta.m laabha.m va.d.dhetvaa sotaapattimagga.m paapeti, aya.m laabhoyeva naama, muulalaabho pana laabhaanuttariya.m naama.

[03] aanandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa saasane tisso sikkhaa sikkhati, ida.m ^b^sikkhaanuttariya.m^eb^. a~n~nepi sotaapannaadayo aanandatthero viya dasabalassa saasane tisso sikkhaa sikkhanti, idampi sikkhaanuttariya.m. aparo pana puthujjanakalyaa.nako aanandatthero viya dasabalassa saasane tisso sikkhaa sikkhitvaa taa sikkhaa va.d.dhetvaa sotaapattimagga.m paapeti. aya.m sikkhaayeva naama, muulasikkhaa pana sikkhaanuttariya.m naama.

[03] aanandattheroyeva ca abhi.nha.m dasabala.m paricarati, ida.m ^b^paaricariyaanuttariya.m^eb^. a~n~nepi sotaapannaadayo aanandatthero viya abhi.nha.m dasabala.m paricaranti, idampi paaricariyaanuttariya.m. aparo pana puthujjanakalyaa.nako aanandatthero ^a^P1.0119^ea^ viya dasabala.m paricaritvaa ta.m paaricariya.m va.d.dhetvaa sotaapattimagga.m paapeti, aya.m paaricariyaayeva naama, muulapaaricariyaa pana paaricariyaanuttariya.m naama.

[03] aanandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare gu.ne anussarati, ida.m ^b^anussataanuttariya.m^eb^. a~n~nepi sotaapannaadayo aanandatthero viya dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare gu.ne anussaranti, idampi anussataanuttariya.m. aparo pana puthujjanakalyaa.nako aanandatthero viya dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare gu.ne anussaritvaa ta.m anussati.m va.d.dhetvaa sotaapattimagga.m paapeti, aya.m anussatiyeva naama, muulaanussati pana anussataanuttariya.m naama. imaani cha anuttariyaani, imesa.m paatubhaavo hoti. imaani ca pana cha anuttariyaani lokiyalokuttaramissakaani kathitaaniiti veditabbaani.

[03] ^b^catunna.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0093^ea^ ^b^pa.tisambhidaana.m sacchikiriyaa hotii^eb^ti catasso hi pa.tisambhidaayo atthapa.tisambhidaa, dhammapa.tisambhidaa, niruttipa.tisambhidaa, pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaati. tattha atthesu ~naa.na.m atthapa.tisambhidaa, dhammesu ~naa.na.m dhammapa.tisambhidaa, atthadhammaniruttaabhilaape ~naa.na.m niruttipa.tisambhidaa ^a^V1.0097^ea^, ~naa.nesu ~naa.na.m pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaa. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaaro panetaasa.m abhidhamme (vibha0 718 aadayo) aagatoyeva. imaasa.m catassanna.m pa.tisambhidaana.m buddhuppaade paccakkhakiriyaa hoti, na vinaa buddhuppaadaa. etaasa.m sacchikiriyaati attho. imaapi lokiyalokuttaraava kathitaati veditabbaa.

[03] ^b^anekadhaatupa.tivedho^eb^ti ``cakkhudhaatu ruupadhaatuu''tiaadiina.m a.t.thaarasanna.m dhaatuuna.m buddhuppaadeyeva pa.tivedho hoti, na vinaa buddhuppaadenaati attho. ^b^naanaadhaatupa.tivedho^eb^ti ettha ^a^P1.0120^ea^ imaava a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo naanaasabhaavato naanaadhaatuyoti veditabbaa. yo panetaasa.m ``naanaasabhaavaa etaa''ti eva.m naanaakara.nato pa.tivedho, aya.m naanaadhaatupa.tivedho naama. ^b^vijjaavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaa^eb^ti ettha ^b^vijjaa^eb^ti phale ~naa.na.m, ^b^vimuttii^eb^ti tadavasesaa phalasampayuttaa dhammaa. ^b^sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaa^eb^ti sototi pa.thamamaggo, tena sotena pattabba.m phalanti sotaapattiphala.m. ^b^sakadaagaamiphalaa^eb^diini paaka.taaneva.
[03] 187^b^.^eb^ ^b^anuttara^eb^nti niruttara.m. ^b^dhammacakka^eb^nti se.t.thacakka.m. cakkasaddo hesa --
[21] ``catubbhi a.t.thajjhagamaa, a.t.thaahipi ca so.lasa.
[27] so.lasaahi ca baatti.msa, atriccha.m cakkamaasado.
[22] icchaahatassa posassa, cakka.m bhamati matthake''ti.. (jaa0 1.1.104; 1.5.103) --

[25] ettha uracakke aagato. ``cakkasamaaru.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayantii''ti (a0 ni0 3.63; 5.54) ettha iriyaapathacakke. ``atha kho so, bhikkhave, rathakaaro ya.m ta.m cakka.m chahi maasehi ni.t.thita.m, ta.m pavattesii''ti (a0 ni0 3.15) ettha daarucakke. ``addasaa kho do.no braahma.no bhagavato paadesu cakkaani sahassaaraanii''ti (a0 ni0 4.36) ettha lakkha.nacakke. ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, cakkaani, yehi samannaagataana.m devamanussaana.m ^a^M1.0094^ea^ catucakka.m vattatii''ti (a0 ni0 4.31) ettha sampatticakke. ``dibba.m ^a^P1.0121^ea^ cakkaratana.m paatubhavatii''ti (dii0 ni0 2.243; ma0 ni0 3.256) ettha ratanacakke. idha pana dhammacakke aagato.

[03] ^b^pavattita^eb^nti ^a^V1.0098^ea^ ettha dhammacakka.m abhiniiharati naama, abhiniiha.ta.m naama, uppaadeti naama, uppaadita.m naama, pavatteti naama, pavattita.m naamaati aya.m pabhedo veditabbo. kuto pa.t.thaaya dhammacakka.m ^b^abhiniiharati^eb^ naamaati? yadaa sumedhabraahma.no hutvaa kaamesu aadiinava.m nekkhamme ca aanisa.msa.m disvaa sattasatakamahaadaana.m datvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pa~nca abhi~n~naa a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbatteti, tato pa.t.thaaya dhammacakka.m abhiniiharati naama.

[03] kuto pa.t.thaaya ^b^abhiniiha.ta.m^eb^ naamaati? yadaa a.t.tha dhamme samodhaanetvaa diipa"nkarapaadamuule mahaabodhima.n.datthaaya maanasa.m bandhitvaa ``byaakara.na.m aladdhaa na vu.t.thahissaamii''ti viiriyaadhi.t.thaana.m adhi.t.thaaya nipanno dasabalassa santikaa byaakara.na.m labhi, tato pa.t.thaaya dhammacakka.m abhiniiha.ta.m naama.

[03] kuto pa.t.thaaya ^b^uppaadeti^eb^ naamaati? tato pa.t.thaaya daanapaarami.m puurentopi dhammacakka.m uppaadeti naama. siilapaarami.m puurentopi...pe0... upekkhaapaarami.m puurentopi dhammacakka.m uppaadeti naama. dasa paaramiyo dasa upapaaramiyo dasa paramatthapaaramiyo puurentopi, pa~nca mahaapariccaage pariccajantopi, ~naatatthacariya.m puurentopi dhammacakka.m uppaadeti naama. vessantarattabhaave .thatvaa sattasatakamahaadaana.m datvaa puttadaara.m daanamukhe niyyaatetvaa paaramikuu.ta.m gahetvaa tusitapure nibbattitvaa tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa devataahi aayaacito pa.ti~n~na.m datvaa pa~ncamahaavilokana.m vilokentopi ^a^P1.0122^ea^ dhammacakka.m uppaadetiyeva naama. maatukucchiya.m pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhantopi, pa.tisandhikkha.ne dasasahassacakkavaa.la.m kampentopi, maatukucchito nikkhantadivase tatheva loka.m kampentopi, sampatijaato satta padaani gantvaa ``aggomahasmii''ti siihanaada.m nadantopi, ekuunati.msa sa.mvaccharaani agaaramajjhe vasantopi, mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamantopi, anomaanadiitiire pabbajantopi, mahaapadhaane chabbassaani viiriya.m karontopi, sujaataaya dinna.m madhupaayaasa.m bhu~njitvaa suva.n.napaati.m nadiyaa pavaahetvaa saayanhasamaye bodhima.n.davaragato puratthima.m lokadhaatu.m olokento nisiiditvaa suuriye dharamaaneyeva maarabala.m vidhametvaa pa.thamayaame ^a^M1.0095^ea^ pubbenivaasa.m anussarantopi, majjhimayaame dibbacakkhu.m visodhentopi, paccuusakaalasamanantare paccayaakaara.m sammasitvaa sotaapattimagga.m pa.tivijjhantopi, sotaapattiphala.m sacchikarontopi, sakadaagaamimagga.m sakadaagaamiphala.m anaagaamimagga.m anaagaamiphala.m sacchikarontopi, arahattamagga.m pa.tivijjhantopi dhammacakka.m uppaadetiyeva naama.

[03] arahattaphalakkha.ne ^a^V1.0099^ea^ pana tena dhammacakka.m ^b^uppaadita.m^eb^ naama. buddhaana~nhi sakalalokiyalokuttaragu.naraasi arahattaphaleneva saddhi.m ijjhati. tasmaa tena tasmi.m kha.ne dhammacakka.m uppaadita.m naama hoti.

[03] kadaa ^b^pavatteti^eb^ naama? bodhima.n.de sattasattaaha.m viitinaametvaa isipatane migadaaye a~n~naako.n.da~n~natthera.m kaayasakkhi.m katvaa dhammacakkappavattanasuttanta.m desento dhammacakka.m pavatteti naama.

[03] yadaa pana a~n~naako.n.da~n~nattherena dasabalassa desanaa~naa.naanubhaavanibbatta.m savana.m labhitvaa sabbapa.thama.m dhammo adhigato, tato pa.t.thaaya dhammacakka.m ^b^pavattita.m^eb^ naama hotiiti veditabba.m. dhammacakkanti ^a^P1.0123^ea^ ceta.m desanaa~naa.nassapi naama.m pa.tivedha~naa.nassapi. tesu desanaa~naa.na.m lokiya.m, pa.tivedha~naa.na.m lokuttara.m. kassa desanaapa.tivedha~naa.nanti? na a~n~nassa kassaci, sammaasambuddhasseva desanaa~naa.na~nca pa.tivedha~naa.na~ncaati veditabba.m.

[03] ^b^sammadevaa^eb^ti hetunaa nayena kaara.neneva. ^b^anuppavattetii^eb^ti yathaa purato gacchantassa pacchato gacchanto ta.m anugacchati naama, eva.m pa.thamatara.m satthaaraa pavattita.m thero anuppavatteti naama. katha.m? satthaa hi ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro''ti kathento dhammacakka.m pavatteti naama, dhammasenaapati saariputtattheropi ``cattaarome, aavuso, satipa.t.thaanaa''ti kathento dhammacakka.m anuppavatteti naama. sammappadhaanaadiisupi eseva nayo. na kevala~nca bodhipakkhiyadhammesu, ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, ariyasaccaani. cattaarome, bhikkhave, ariyava.msaa''tiaadiisupi aya.m nayo netabbova. eva.m sammaasambuddho dhammacakka.m pavatteti naama, thero dasabalena pavattita.m dhammacakka.m anuppavatteti naama.

[03] eva.m dhammacakka.m anuppavattentena pana therena dhammo desitopi pakaasitopi satthaaraava desito pakaasito hoti. yo hi koci bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa upaasako vaa upaasikaa vaa devo vaa sakko vaa maaro ^a^M1.0096^ea^ vaa brahmaa vaa dhamma.m desetu pakaasetu, sabbo so satthaaraa desito pakaasitova naama hoti, sesajano pana lekhahaarakapakkhe .thitova naama hoti. katha.m? yathaa hi ra~n~naa dinna.m pa.n.na.m vaacetvaa ya.m ya.m kamma.m karonti, ta.m ta.m kamma.m yena ^a^V1.0100^ea^ kenaci katampi kaaritampi ^a^P1.0124^ea^ ra~n~naa kaaritanteva vuccati. mahaaraajaa viya hi sammaasambuddho. raajapa.n.na.m viya tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m. pa.n.nadaana.m viya tepi.take nayamukhadaana.m pa.n.na.m vaacetvaa ta.mta.mkammaana.m kara.na.m viya catunna.m parisaana.m attano balena buddhavacana.m ugga.nhitvaa paresa.m desanaa pakaasanaa. tattha yathaa pa.n.na.m vaacetvaa yena kenaci katampi kaaritampi ta.m kamma.m ra~n~naa kaaritameva hoti, evameva yena kenaci desitopi pakaasitopi dhammo satthaaraa desito pakaasitova naama hotiiti veditabbo. sesa.m sabbattha uttaanatthamevaati.
[06] ekapuggalavaggava.n.nanaa.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ etadaggesu ^a^V1.0101^ea^ pa.thamavaggassa pa.thame ^b^etadagga^eb^nti eta.m agga.m. ettha ca aya.m aggasaddo aadiko.tiko.t.thaasase.t.thesu dissati. ``ajjatagge, samma dovaarika, aavaraami dvaara.m niga.n.thaana.m niga.n.thiina''ntiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.70) hi aadimhi dissati. ``teneva a"ngulaggena ta.m a"ngulagga.m paraamaseyya (kathaa0 441), ucchagga.m ve.lagga''ntiaadiisu ko.tiya.m. ``ambilagga.m vaa madhuragga.m vaa tittakagga.m vaa (sa.m0 ni0 5.374), anujaanaami, bhikkhave, vihaaraggena vaa parive.naggena vaa bhaajetu''ntiaadiisu (cuu.lava0 318) ko.t.thaase. ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, sattaa apadaa vaa...pe0... tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayatii''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.34; itivu0 90) se.t.the. svaayamidha ^a^P1.0125^ea^ ko.tiyampi va.t.tati se.t.thepi. te hi theraa attano attano .thaane ko.tibhuutaatipi aggaa, se.t.thabhuutaatipi. tasmaa etadagganti esaa ko.ti eso se.t.thoti ayamettha attho. eseva nayo sabbasuttesu.

[03] aya~nca ^a^M1.0097^ea^ etadaggasannikkhepo naama catuuhi kaara.nehi labbhati a.t.thuppattito aagamanato ci.n.navasito gu.naatirekatoti. tattha koci thero ekena kaara.nena etadagga.t.thaana.m labhati, koci dviihi, koci tiihi, koci sabbeheva catuuhipi aayasmaa saariputtatthero viya. so hi a.t.thuppattitopi mahaapa~n~nataaya etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi aagamanaadiihipi. katha.m? ekasmi.m hi samaye satthaa jetavanamahaavihaare viharanto ka.n.dambarukkhamuule titthiyamaddana.m yamakapaa.tihaariya.m dassetvaa ``kaha.m nu kho purimabuddhaa yamakapaa.tihaariya.m katvaa vassa.m upagacchantii''ti aavajjento ``taavati.msabhavane''ti ~natvaa dve padantaraani dassetvaa tatiyena padena taavati.msabhavane paccu.t.thaasi. sakko devaraajaa bhagavanta.m disvaa pa.n.dukambalasilaato u.t.thaaya saddhi.m devaga.nena paccuggamana.m agamaasi. devaa cintayi.msu -- ``sakko devaraajaa devaga.naparivuto ^a^V1.0102^ea^ sa.t.thiyojanaayaamaaya pa.n.dukambalasilaaya nisiiditvaa sampatti.m anubhavati, buddhaana.m naama nisinnakaalato pa.t.thaaya na sakkaa a~n~nena ettha hatthampi .thapetu''nti. satthaapi tattha nisinno tesa.m cittaacaara.m ~natvaa mahaapa.msukuuliko viya mu.n.dapii.thaka.m sabbameva pa.n.dukambalasila.m avattharitvaa nisiidi. eva.m nisiidanto pana attano vaa sariira.m mahanta.m katvaa maapesi, pa.n.dukambalasila.m ^a^P1.0126^ea^ vaa khuddaka.m akaasiiti na sallakkhetabba.m. acinteyyo hi buddhavisayo. eva.m nisinno pana maatara.m kaayasakkhi.m katvaa dasasahassacakkavaa.ladevataana.m ``kusalaa dhammaa akusalaa dhammaa abyaakataa dhammaa''ti abhidhammapi.taka.m desesi.

[03] paa.tihaariya.t.thaanepi sabbaapi dvaadasayojanikaa parisaa anuruddhatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``kaha.m, bhante, dasabalo gato''ti pucchi. taavati.msabhavane pa.n.dukambalasilaaya.m vassa.m upagantvaa abhidhammakatha.m desetu.m gatoti. bhante, na maya.m satthaara.m adisvaa gamissaama. kadaa satthaa aagamissatiiti satthu aagamanakaala.m jaanaathaati? mahaamoggallaanattherassa bhaara.m karotha, so buddhaana.m santika.m gantvaa saasana.m aaharissatiiti. ki.m pana therassa tattha gantu.m bala.m natthiiti? atthi, visesavantaana.m pana visesa.m passantuuti evamaaha. mahaajano mahaamoggallaanatthera.m upasa"nkamitvaa satthu ^a^M1.0098^ea^ saasana.m gahetvaa aagamanatthaaya yaaci. thero passanteyeva mahaajane pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa antosinerunaa gantvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa aaha -- ``bhante, mahaajano tumhaaka.m dassanakaamo, aagamanadivasa.m vo jaanitu.m icchatii''ti. tena hi ``ito temaasaccayena sa"nkassanagaradvaare passathaa''tissa vadehiiti. thero bhagavato saasana.m aaharitvaa mahaajanassa kathesi. mahaajano tattheva temaasa.m khandhaavaara.m bandhitvaa vasi. cuu.laanaathapi.n.diko dvaadasayojanaaya parisaaya temaasa.m yaagubhatta.m aadaasi.

[03] satthaapi sattappakara.naani desetvaa manussaloka.m aagamanatthaaya aakappa.m dassesi. sakko devaraajaa vissakamma.m aamantetvaa tathaagatassa otara.natthaaya sopaana.m maapetu.m aa.naapesi. so ekato sova.n.namaya.m ekato rajatamaya.m ^a^P1.0127^ea^ sopaana.m maapetvaa majjhe ma.nimaya.m maapesi. satthaa ma.nimaye sopaane .thatvaa ``mahaajano ma.m passatuu''ti adhi.t.thaasi. attano aanubhaaveneva ``mahaajano aviicimahaaniraya.m passatuu''tipi adhi.t.thaasi. nirayadassanena cassa uppannasa.mvegata.m ~natvaa devaloka.m dassesi. athassa otarantassa mahaabrahmaa chatta.m dhaaresi, sakko devaraajaa patta.m ga.nhi, suyaamo devaraajaa dibba.m vaa.labiijani.m biiji, pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto beluvapa.n.duvii.na.m ^a^V1.0103^ea^ samapa~n~naasaaya mucchanaahi mucchitvaa vaadento purato otari. buddhaana.m pathaviya.m pati.t.thitakaale ``aha.m pa.thama.m vandissaami, aha.m pa.thama.m vandissaamii''ti mahaajano a.t.thaasi. saha mahaapathaviiakkamanena pana bhagavato neva mahaajano na asiitimahaasaavakaa pa.thamakavandana.m sampaapu.ni.msu, dhammasenaapati saariputtattheroyeva pana sampaapu.ni.

[03] atha satthaa dvaadasayojanaaya parisaaya antare ``therassa pa~n~naanubhaava.m jaanantuu''ti puthujjanapa~ncaka.m pa~nha.m aarabhi. pa.thama.m lokiyamahaajano sallakkhessatiiti puthujjanapa~nha.m pucchi. ye ye sallakkhi.msu, te te kathayi.msu. dutiya.m puthujjanavisaya.m atikkamitvaa sotaapattimagge pa~nha.m pucchi. puthujjanaa tu.nhii ahesu.m, sotaapannaava kathayi.msu. tato sotaapannaana.m ^a^M1.0099^ea^ visaya.m atikkamitvaa sakadaagaamimagge pa~nha.m pucchi. sotaapannaa tu.nhii ahesu.m, sakadaagaaminova kathayi.msu. tesampi visaya.m atikkamitvaa anaagaamimagge pa~nha.m pucchi. sakadaagaamino tu.nhii ahesu.m, anaagaaminova kathayi.msu. tesampi visaya.m atikkamitvaa arahattamagge pa~nha.m pucchi. anaagaamino tu.nhii ahesu.m, arahantaava kathayi.msu. tato he.t.thimako.tito pa.t.thaaya abhi~n~naate abhi~n~naate saavake pucchi, te attano attano pa.tisambhidaavisaye .thatvaa kathayi.msu. atha mahaamoggallaana.m pucchi ^a^P1.0128^ea^, sesasaavakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m, therova kathesi. tassaapi visaya.m atikkamitvaa saariputtattherassa visaye pa~nha.m pucchi. mahaamoggallaano tu.nhii ahosi, saariputtattherova kathesi. therassaapi visaya.m atikkamitvaa buddhavisaye pa~nha.m pucchi. dhammasenaapati aavajjentopi passitu.m na sakkoti, puratthimapacchimuttaradakkhi.naa catasso disaa catasso anudisaati ito cito ca olokento pa~nhuppatti.t.thaana.m sallakkhetu.m naasakkhi.

[03] satthaa therassa kilamanabhaava.m jaanitvaa ``saariputto kilamati, nayamukhamassa dassessaamii''ti ``aagamehi tva.m, saariputtaa''ti vatvaa ``naaya.m tuyha.m visayo pa~nho, buddhaana.m esa visayo sabba~n~nuuna.m yasassiina''nti buddhavisayabhaava.m aacikkhitvaa ``bhuutamidanti, saariputta, samanupassasii''ti aaha. thero ``catumahaabhuutikakaayapariggaha.m me bhagavaa aacikkhatii''ti ~natvaa ``a~n~naata.m bhagavaa, a~n~naata.m sugataa''ti aaha. etasmi.m .thaane aya.m kathaa udapaadi -- mahaapa~n~no vata, bho, saariputtatthero, yatra hi naama sabbehi ana~n~naata.m pa~nha.m kathesi, buddhehi ca dinnanaye .thatvaa buddhavisaye pa~nha.m kathesi, iti therassa pa~n~naanubhaavo yattaka.m ^a^V1.0104^ea^ .thaana.m buddhaana.m kittisaddena ottha.ta.m, sabba.m ajjhottharitvaa gatoti eva.m taava thero ^b^a.t.thuppattito^eb^ mahaapa~n~nataaya etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi.
[03] katha.m ^b^aagamanato^eb^? imissaayeva hi a.t.thuppattiyaa satthaa aaha -- saariputto na idaaneva pa~n~navaa, atiite pa~nca jaatisataani isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaapi mahaapa~n~nova ahosi --
[21] ``yo ^a^M1.0100^ea^ pabbajii jaatisataani pa~nca,
[27] pahaaya kaamaani manoramaani.
[26] ta.m viitaraaga.m susamaahitindriya.m,
[22] parinibbuta.m vandatha saariputta''nti..

[03] eva.m ^a^P1.0129^ea^ pabbajja.m upabruuhayamaano ekasmi.m samaye baaraa.nasiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatto. tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa tattha saara.m apassanto ``pabbajitvaa eka.m mokkhadhamma.m gavesitu.m va.t.tatii''ti citta.m uppaadesi. tasmi.m kaale bodhisattopi kaasira.t.the udiccabraahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatto vuddhimanvaaya uggahitasippo kaamesu aadiinava.m nekkhamme ca aanisa.msa.m disvaa gharaavaasa.m pahaaya himavanta.m pavisitvaa kasi.naparikamma.m katvaa pa~nca abhi~n~naa a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbattetvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaro himavantappadese vasati. sopi maa.navo nikkhamitvaa tasseva santike pabbaji. parivaaro mahaa ahosi pa~ncasatamattaa isayo.

[03] athassa so je.t.thantevaasiko ekadesa.m parisa.m gahetvaa lo.nambilasevanattha.m manussapatha.m agamaasi. tasmi.m samaye bodhisatto tasmi.myeva himavantappadese kaala.m akaasi. kaalakiriyasamayeva na.m antevaasikaa sannipatitvaa pucchi.msu -- ``atthi tumhehi koci viseso adhigato''ti. bodhisatto ``natthi ki~ncii''ti vatvaa aparihiinajjhaano aabhassarabrahmaloke nibbatto. so ki~ncaapi aaki~nca~n~naayatanassa laabhii, bodhisattaana.m pana aruupaavacare pa.tisandhi naama na hoti. kasmaa? abhabba.t.thaanattaa. iti so aruupasamaapattilaabhii samaanopi ruupaavacare nibbatti. antevaasikaapissa ``aacariyo `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaha, moghaa tassa kaalakiriyaa''ti na ki~nci sakkaarasammaana.m aka.msu. atha so je.t.thantevaasiko atikkante vassaavaase aagantvaa ``kaha.m aacariyo''ti pucchi. kaala.m katoti. api nu aacariyena ^a^V1.0105^ea^ laddhagu.na.m pucchitthaati? aama pucchimhaati. ki.m vadetiiti? natthi ki~nciiti. mayampi ``aacariyena laddhagu.no naama natthii''ti naassa sakkaarasammaana.m karimhaati. tumhe bhaasitassa attha.m na jaanittha, aacariyo aaki~nca~n~naayatanassa laabhiiti.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0101^ea^ te je.t.thantevaasikassa katha.m na saddahi.msu. so punappuna.m kathentopi saddahaapetu.m naasakkhi ^a^P1.0130^ea^. atha bodhisatto aavajjamaano ``andhabaalo mahaajano mayha.m je.t.thantevaasikassa katha.m na ga.nhaati, ima.m kaara.na.m paaka.ta.m karissaamii''ti brahmalokato otaritvaa assamapadamatthake .thito aakaasagatova je.t.thantevaasikassa pa~n~naanubhaava.m va.n.netvaa ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``parosahassampi samaagataana.m,
[27] kandeyyu.m te vassasata.m apa~n~naa.
[26] ekova seyyo puriso sapa~n~no,
[22] yo bhaasitassa vijaanaati attha''nti.. (jaa0 1.1.101).

[03] eva.m isiga.na.m sa~n~naapetvaa bodhisatto brahmalokameva gato. sesaisiga.nopi aparihiinajjhaano hutvaa kaala.m katvaa brahmalokaparaaya.no jaato. tattha bodhisatto sabba~n~nuta.m patto, je.t.thantevaasiko saariputtatthero jaato, sesaa isayo buddhaparisaa jaataati eva.m atiitepi saariputto mahaapa~n~nova sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m jaanitu.m samatthoti veditabbo.
[03] idameva ca puthujjanapa~ncaka.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa --
[21] ``parosata~ncepi samaagataana.m,
[27] jhaayeyyu.m te vassasata.m apa~n~naa.
[26] ekova seyyo puriso sapa~n~no,
[22] so bhaasitassa vijaanaati attha''nti.. (jaa0 1.1.101) --
[25] imampi jaataka.m kathesi. tassa purimajaatake vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
[03] aparampi ^a^V1.0106^ea^ idameva puthujjanapa~ncaka.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa --
[21] ``ye sa~n~nino tepi duggataa, yepi asa~n~nino tepi duggataa.
[22] eta.m ubhaya.m vivajjaya, ta.m samaapattisukha.m ana"nga.na''nti.. (jaa0 1.1.134) --
[25] ima.m ^a^M1.0102^ea^ ana"nga.najaataka.m kathesi. ettha ca aacariyo kaala.m karonto antevaasikehi pucchito ``nevasa~n~nii naasa~n~nii''ti aaha. sesa.m ^a^P1.0131^ea^ vuttanayeneva veditabba.m.
[03] aparampi idameva puthujjanapa~ncaka.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa --
[21] ``candaabha.m suuriyaabha~nca, yodha pa~n~naaya gaadhati.
[22] avitakkena jhaanena, hoti aabhassaruupago''ti.. (jaa0 1.1.135) --

[25] ida.m candaabhajaataka.m kathesi. etthaapi aacariyo kaala.m karonto antevaasikehi pucchito ``odaatakasi.na.m candaabha.m naama, piitakasi.na.m suuriyaabha.m naamaati ta.m ubhaya.m yo pa~n~naaya gaadhati pavisati pakkhandati, so avitakkena dutiyajjhaanena aabhassaruupago hoti, taadiso aha''nti sandhaaya -- ``candaabha.m suuriyaabha''nti aaha. sesa.m purimanayeneva veditabba.m.
[03] idameva ca puthujjanapa~ncaka.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa --
[21] ``aasiisetheva puriso, na nibbindeyya pa.n.dito.
[22] passaami voha.m attaana.m, yathaa icchi.m tathaa ahu..
[21] ``aasiisetheva puriso, na nibbindeyya pa.n.dito.
[22] passaami voha.m attaana.m, udakaa thalamubbhata.m..
[21] ``vaayametheva ^a^V1.0107^ea^ puriso, na nibbindeyya pa.n.dito.
[22] passaami voha.m attaana.m, yathaa icchi.m tathaa ahu..
[21] ``vaayametheva puriso, na nibbindeyya pa.n.dito.
[22] passaami voha.m attaana.m, udakaa thalamubbhata.m..
[21] ``dukkhuupaniitopi naro sapa~n~no,
[27] aasa.m na chindeyya sukhaagamaaya.
[26] bahuu hi phassaa ahitaa hitaa ca,
[22] avitakkitaa maccamupabbajanti..
[21] ``acintitampi bhavati, cintitampi vinassati.
[22] na hi cintaamayaa bhogaa, itthiyaa purisassa vaa..
[21] ``sarabha.m ^a^M1.0103^ea^ giriduggasmi.m, ya.m tva.m anusarii pure.
[22] aliinacittassa tuva.m, vikkantamanujiivasi..
[21] ``yo ^a^P1.0132^ea^ ta.m viduggaa narakaa samuddhari,
[27] silaaya yogga.m sarabho karitvaa.
[26] dukkhuupaniita.m maccumukhaa pamocayi,
[22] aliinacitta.m ta miga.m vadesi..
[21] ``ki.m tva.m nu tattheva tadaa ahosi,
[27] udaahu te koci na.m etadakkhaa.
[26] viva.t.tacchaddo nusi sabbadassii,
[22] ~naa.na.m nu te braahma.na bhi.msaruupa.m..
[21] ``na ^a^V1.0108^ea^ cevaha.m tattha tadaa ahosi.m,
[27] na caapi me koci na.m etadakkhaa.
[26] gaathaapadaana~nca subhaasitaana.m,
[22] attha.m tadaanenti janinda dhiiraa''ti.. (jaa0 1.13.134-143) --

[25] ima.m terasanipaate sarabhajaataka~nca kathesi. imaani pana pa~ncapi jaatakaani atiitepi sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa vitthaarena attha.m mayha.m putto jaanaatiiti satthaaraa dhammasenaapatisaariputtattherassa pa~n~naanubhaavappakaasanatthameva kathitaaniiti eva.m aagamanatopi thero mahaapa~n~nataaya etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi.

[03] katha.m ^b^ci.n.navasito^eb^ti? ci.n.na.m kireta.m therassa catuparisamajjhe dhamma.m kathento cattaari saccaani amu~ncitvaa kathetiiti eva.m ci.n.navasitopi thero mahaapa~n~nataaya etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi.

[03] katha.m ^b^gu.naatirekato^eb^ti? .thapetvaa hi dasabala.m a~n~no koci ekasaavakopi mahaapa~n~nataaya ^a^P1.0133^ea^ dhammasenaapatinaa sadiso naama natthiiti eva.m gu.naatirekatopi thero mahaapa~n~nataaya etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi.

[03] yathaa ca saariputtatthero, eva.m ^b^mahaamoggallaanattheropi^eb^ sabbeheva catuuhipi imehi kaara.nehi etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi. katha.m? thero hi mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo nandopanandasadisampi naagaraajaana.m damesiiti eva.m taava ^a^M1.0104^ea^ a.t.thuppattito labhi. na panesa idaaneva mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo, atiite pa~nca jaatisataani isipabbajja.m pabbajitopi mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo ahosiiti.
[21] ``yo pabbajii jaatisataani pa~nca,
[27] pahaaya kaamaani manoramaani.
[26] ta.m viitaraaga.m susamaahitindriya.m,
[22] parinibbuta.m vandatha moggallaana''nti.. --

[25] eva.m ^a^V1.0109^ea^ aagamanatopi labhi. ci.n.na.m ceta.m therassa niraya.m gantvaa attano iddhibalena nirayasattaana.m assaasajananattha.m siita.m adhi.t.thaaya cakkamatta.m paduma.m maapetvaa padumaka.n.nikaaya.m nisiiditvaa dhammakatha.m katheti, devaloka.m gantvaa devasa"ngha.m kammagati.m jaanaapetvaa saccakatha.m kathetiiti eva.m ci.n.navasito labhi. .thapetvaa ca sammaasambuddha.m a~n~no saavako mahaamoggallaano viya mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo natthiiti eva.m gu.naatirekato labhi.

[03] yathaa cesa, eva.m ^b^mahaakassapattheropi^eb^ sabbehevimehi kaara.nehi etadagga.t.thaana.m labhi. katha.m? sammaasambuddho hi therassa tigaavuta.m magga.m paccuggamana.m katvaa tiihi ovaadehi upasampaadetvaa ciivara.m parivattetvaa adaasi. tasmi.m samaye mahaapathavii udakapariyanta.m katvaa kampi, mahaajanassa abbhantare therassa kittisaddo ajjhottharitvaa gato. eva.m a.t.thuppattito labhi. na cesa idaaneva dhutadharo, atiite pa~nca jaatisataani isipabbajja.m pabbajitopi dhutadharova ahosi.
[21] ``yo ^a^P1.0134^ea^ pabbajii jaatisataani pa~nca,
[27] pahaaya kaamaani manoramaani.
[26] ta.m viitaraaga.m susamaahitindriya.m,
[22] parinibbuta.m vandatha mahaakassapa''nti.. --

[25] eva.m aagamanatopi labhi. ci.n.na.m ceta.m therassa catuparisamajjhagato dhamma.m kathento dasa kathaavatthuuni avijahitvaava kathetiiti eva.m ci.n.navasito labhi. .thapetvaa ca sammaasambuddha.m a~n~no saavako terasahi dhutagu.nehi mahaakassapasadiso natthiiti eva.m gu.naatirekato labhi ^a^M1.0105^ea^. iminaava niyaamena tesa.m tesa.m theraana.m yathaalaabhato gu.ne kittetu.m va.t.tati.

[03] gu.navaseneva hi sammaasambuddho yathaa naama raajaa cakkavattii cakkaratanaanubhaavena cakkavaa.lagabbhe rajjasiri.m patvaa ``pattabba.m me patta.m, ki.m me idaani mahaajanena olokitenaa''ti na appossukko hutvaa rajjasiri.myeva anubhoti, kaalena pana kaala.m vinicchaya.t.thaane nisiiditvaa niggahetabbe nigga.nhaati, paggahetabbe pagga.nhaati, .thaanantaresu ca .thapetabbayuttake .thaanantaresu .thapeti, evameva.m mahaabodhima.n.de adhigatassa sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nassa aanubhaavena ^a^V1.0110^ea^ anuppattadhammarajjo dhammaraajaapi ``ki.m me idaani lokena olokitena, anuttara.m phalasamaapattisukha.m anubhavissaamii''ti appossukkata.m anaapajjitvaa catuparisamajjhe pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisinno a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m brahmassara.m nicchaaretvaa dhamma.m desayamaano niggahetabbayutte ka.nhadhamme puggale sinerupaade pakkhipanto viya apaayabhayasantajjanena niggahetvaa paggahetabbayutte kalyaa.nadhamme puggale ukkhipitvaa bhavagge nisiidaapento viya pagga.nhitvaa .thaanantaresu .thapetabbayuttake a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~nattheraadayo saavake yaathaavasarasagu.navaseneva .thaanantaresu ^a^P1.0135^ea^ .thapento ^b^etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ratta~n~nuuna.m, yadida.m a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no^eb^tiaadimaaha.

[03] tattha ^b^etadagga^eb^nti pada.m vuttatthameva. ^b^ratta~n~nuuna^eb^nti rattiyo jaanantaana.m. .thapetvaa hi sammaasambuddha.m a~n~no saavako a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~nattherato pa.thamatara.m pabbajito naama natthiiti pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya thero cirakaala.m rattiyo jaanaatiiti ratta~n~nuu. sabbapa.thama.m dhammassa pa.tividdhattaa yadaa tena dhammo pa.tividdho, cirakaalato pa.t.thaaya ta.m ratti.m jaanaatiitipi ratta~n~nuu. apica khii.naasavaana.m rattidivasaparicchedo paaka.tova hoti, aya~nca pa.thamakhii.naasavoti evampi ratta~n~nuuna.m saavakaana.m ayameva aggo purimako.tibhuuto se.t.tho. tena vutta.m -- ``ratta~n~nuuna.m yadida.m a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no''ti.

[03] ettha ^a^M1.0106^ea^ ca ^b^yadida^eb^nti nipaato, tassa thera.m avekkhitvaa yo esoti, aggasadda.m avekkhitvaa ya.m etanti attho. ^b^a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no^eb^ti ~naatako.n.da~n~no pa.tividdhako.n.da~n~no. tenevaaha -- ``a~n~naasi vata, bho, ko.n.da~n~no, a~n~naasi vata, bho, ko.n.da~n~noti. iti hida.m aayasmato ko.n.da~n~nassa a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no tveva naama.m ahosii''ti (sa.m0 ni0 5.1081; mahaava0 17).

[03] aya.m pana thero katarabuddhakaale pubbapatthana.m abhiniihaara.m akaasi, kadaa pabbajito, kadaanena pa.thama.m dhammo adhigato, kadaa .thaanantare .thapitoti iminaa nayena sabbesupi etadaggesu pa~nhakamma.m veditabba.m.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0111^ea^ ^a^P1.0136^ea^ imassa taava therassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ito kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro naama buddho loke udapaadi, tassa pa.tividdhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nassa mahaabodhipalla"nkato u.t.thahantassa mahaapathaviya.m .thapetu.m paade ukkhittamatte paadasampa.ticchanattha.m mahanta.m padumapuppha.m ugga~nchi, tassa dhurapattaani navutihatthaani honti, kesara.m ti.msahattha.m, ka.n.nikaa dvaadasahatthaa, paadena pati.t.thita.t.thaana.m ekaadasahattha.m. tassa pana bhagavato sariira.m a.t.thapa.n.naasahatthubbedha.m ahosi. tassa padumaka.n.nikaaya dakkhi.napaade pati.t.thahante mahaatumbamattaa re.nu uggantvaa sariira.m okiramaanaa otari, vaamapaadassa .thapanakaalepi tathaaruupa.myeva paduma.m uggantvaa paada.m sampa.ticchi. tatopi uggantvaa vuttappamaa.naava re.nu sariira.m okiri. ta.m pana re.nu.m abhibhavamaanaa tassa bhagavato sariirappabhaa nikkhamitvaa yantanaa.likaaya vissa.t.thasuva.n.narasadhaaraa viya samantaa dvaadasayojana.t.thaana.m ekobhaasa.m akaasi. tatiyapaaduddhara.nakaale pathamuggata.m paduma.m antaradhaayi, paadasampa.ticchanattha.m a~n~na.m nava.m paduma.m ugga~nchi. iminaava niyaamena yattha yattha gantukaamo hoti, tattha tatthaapi mahaapaduma.m uggacchati. tenevassa ``padumuttarasammaasambuddho''ti naama.m ahosi.

[03] eva.m so bhagavaa loke uppajjitvaa bhikkhusatasahassaparivaaro mahaajanassa sa"ngahatthaaya gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu bhikkhaaya caranto ha.msavatiinagara.m sampaapu.ni ^a^P1.0137^ea^. tassa aagatabhaava.m sutvaa pitaa mahaaraajaa paccuggamana.m ^a^M1.0107^ea^ akaasi. satthaa tassa dhammakatha.m kathesi. desanaapariyosaane keci sotaapannaa keci sakadaagaamii keci anaagaamii keci arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. raajaa svaatanaaya dasabala.m nimantetvaa punadivase kaala.m aarocaapetvaa bhikkhusatasahassaparivaarassa bhagavato sakanivesane mahaadaana.m adaasi. satthaa bhattaanumodana.m katvaa vihaarameva gato. teneva niyaamena punadivase naagaraa, punadivase raajaati diighamaddhaana.m daana.m ada.msu.

[03] tasmi.m kaale aya.m thero ha.msavatiinagare gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbatto. ekadivasa.m buddhaana.m dhammadesanaakaale ha.msavatiinagaravaasino gandhamaalaadihatthe yena buddho, yena dhammo, yena sa"ngho, tanninne tappo.ne tappabbhaare gacchante disvaa tena mahaajanena saddhi.m dhammadesana.t.thaana.m agamaasi. tasmi~nca samaye padumuttaro bhagavaa attano saasane pa.thama.m pa.tividdhadhamma.m eka.m bhikkhu.m etadagga.t.thaane .thapesi. so kulaputto ta.m kaara.na.m sutvaa ``mahaa vataaya.m bhikkhu, .thapetvaa kira buddha.m a~n~no iminaa pa.thamatara.m pa.tividdhadhammo naama natthi. aho vataahampi anaagate ekassa ^a^V1.0112^ea^ buddhassa saasane pa.thama.m dhamma.m pa.tivijjhanasamattho bhaveyya''nti cintetvaa desanaapariyosaane bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``sve mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhathaa''ti nimantesi. satthaa adhivaasesi.

[03] so bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa sakanivesana.m gantvaa sabbaratti.m buddhaana.m nisajjana.t.thaana.m gandhadaamamaalaadaamaadiihi ala"nkaritvaa pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena sakanivesane bhikkhusatasahassaparivaarassa bhagavato vicitrayaagukhajjakaparivaara.m naanaarasasuupabya~njana.m ^a^P1.0138^ea^ gandhasaalibhojana.m datvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane ticiivarapahonake va"ngapa.t.te tathaagatassa paadamuule .thapetvaa cintesi -- ``naaha.m parittakassa .thaanassatthaaya caraami, mahanta.m .thaana.m patthento caraami, na kho pana sakkaa ekameva divasa.m daana.m datvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetu''nti ``anupa.tipaa.tiyaa satta divasaani mahaadaana.m datvaa patthessaamii''ti. so teneva niyaamena satta divasaani mahaadaana.m datvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane dussako.t.thaagaara.m vivaraapetvaa uttamasukhumavattha.m buddhaana.m paadamuule .thapetvaa bhikkhusatasahassa.m ticiivarena acchaadetvaa tathaagata.m ^a^M1.0108^ea^ upasa"nkamitvaa, ``bhante, yo tumhehi ito sattadivasamatthake bhikkhu etadagge .thapito, ahampi so bhikkhu viya anaagate uppajjanakabuddhassa saasane pabbajitvaa pa.thama.m dhamma.m pa.tivijjhitu.m samattho bhaveyya''nti vatvaa satthu paadamuule siisa.m katvaa nipajji.

[03] satthaa tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``iminaa kulaputtena mahaaadhikaaro kato, samijjhissati nu kho etassa aya.m patthanaa no''ti anaagata.msa~naa.na.m pesetvaa aavajjento ``samijjhissatii''ti passi. buddhaana~nhi atiita.m vaa anaagata.m vaa paccuppanna.m vaa aarabbha aavajjentaana.m aavara.na.m naama natthi, anekakappako.tisatasahassantarampi ca atiita.m vaa anaagata.m vaa cakkavaa.lasahassantarampi ca paccuppanna.m vaa aavajjanapa.tibaddhameva manasikaarapa.tibaddhameva hoti. eva.m appa.tivattiyena ~naa.nena so bhagavaa ida.m addasa -- ``anaagate satasahassakappapariyosaane gotamo naama buddho loke uppajjissati, tadaa imassa patthanaa samijjhissatii''ti. atha na.m evamaaha -- ``ambho, kulaputta, anaagate satasahassakappapariyosaane gotamo naama buddho loke uppajjissati ^a^P1.0139^ea^, tva.m tassa pa.thamakadhammadesanaaya tepariva.t.tadhammacakkappavattanasuttantapariyosaane a.t.thaarasahi brahmako.tiihi saddhi.m sahassanayasampanne sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahissasii''ti.

[03] iti ^a^V1.0113^ea^ satthaa ta.m kulaputta.m byaakaritvaa caturaasiiti dhammakkhandhasahassaani desetvaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi. tassa parinibbutassa sariira.m suva.n.nakkhandho viya ekagghana.m ahosi, sariiracetiya.m panassubbedhena sattayojanika.m aka.msu. i.t.thakaa suva.n.namayaa ahesu.m, haritaalamanosilaaya mattikaakicca.m, telena udakakicca.m saadhayi.msu. buddhaana.m dharamaanakaale sariirappabhaa dvaadasayojanika.m phari, parinibbutaana.m pana tesa.m rasmi nikkhamitvaa samantaa yojanasata.m avatthari.

[03] aya.m se.t.thi buddhaana.m sariiracetiya.m parivaaretvaa sahassaratanagghiyaani kaaresi. cetiyapati.t.thaapanadivase antocetiye ratanaghara.m kaaresi. so vassasatasahassa.m mahanta.m daanaadimaya.m kalyaa.nakamma.m katvaa tato cuto devapure nibbatti. tassa devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msarantasseva navanavuti ^a^M1.0109^ea^ kappasahassaani nava kappasataani nava ca kappaa samatikkantaa. ettakassa kaalassa accayena ito ekanavutikappamatthake aya.m kulaputto bandhumatiinagarassa dvaarasamiipe gaame ku.tumbiyagehe nibbatto. tassa ^b^mahaakaalo^eb^ti naama.m ahosi, kani.t.thabhaataa panassa cuu.lakaalo naama.

[03] tasmi.m samaye vipassii bodhisatto tusitapuraa cavitvaa bandhumatiinagare bandhumassa ra~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchismi.m nibbatto. anukkamena sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa dhammadesanatthaaya mahaabrahmunaa aayaacito ``kassa ^a^P1.0140^ea^ nu kho pa.thama.m dhamma.m desessaamii''ti cintetvaa attano kani.t.tha.m kha.n.da.m naama raajakumaara.m tissa~nca purohitaputta.m ``pa.thama.m dhamma.m pa.tivijjhitu.m samatthaa''ti disvaa ``tesa~nca dhamma.m desessaami, pitu ca sa"ngaha.m karissaamii''ti bodhima.n.dato aakaaseneva aagantvaa kheme migadaaye oti.n.no te pakkosaapetvaa dhamma.m desesi. desanaapariyosaane te dvepi janaa caturaasiitiyaa paa.nasahassehi saddhi.m arahattaphale pati.t.thahi.msu.

[03] athaaparepi bodhisattakaale anupabbajitaa caturaasiitisahassaa kulaputtaa ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa satthu santika.m aagantvaa dhammadesana.m sutvaa arahattaphale pati.t.thahi.msu. satthaa ta.m tattheva kha.n.datthera.m aggasaavaka.t.thaane, tissatthera.m dutiyasaavaka.t.thaane .thapesi. raajaapi ta.m pavatti.m sutvaa ``putta.m passissaamii''ti uyyaana.m gantvaa dhammadesana.m sutvaa tiisu sara.nesu pati.t.thaaya satthaara.m svaatanaaya nimantetvaa abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] so ^a^V1.0114^ea^ paasaadavaragato nisiiditvaa cintesi -- ``mayha.m je.t.thaputto nikkhamitvaa buddho jaato, dutiyaputto me aggasaavako, purohitaputto dutiyasaavako. ime ca avasesabhikkhuu gihikaalepi mayha.m puttameva parivaaretvaa vicari.msu, ime pubbepi daanipi mayhameva bhaaraa, ahameva te catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahissaami, a~n~nesa.m okaasa.m na dassaamii''ti. vihaaradvaarako.t.thakato pa.t.thaaya yaava raajagehadvaaraa ubhosu passesu khadirapaakaara.m kaaretvaa vatthehi pa.ticchaadaapetvaa upari suva.n.nataarakavicitta.m samolambitataalakkhandhamattavividhapupphadaamavitaana.m kaaretvaa he.t.thaabhuumi.m ^a^M1.0110^ea^ vicittatthara.nehi santharaapetvaa anto ubhosu passesu maalaagacchakesu pu.n.nagha.te sakalamaggavaasatthaaya ca gandhantaresu pupphaani pupphantaresu gandhe ca .thapaapetvaa ^a^P1.0141^ea^ bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi. bhagavaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto antosaa.niyaava raajageha.m gantvaa bhattakicca.m katvaa vihaara.m paccaagacchati. a~n~no koci da.t.thumpi na labhati, kuto pana bhikkha.m vaa daatu.m puuja.m vaa kaatu.m.

[03] naagaraa cintesu.m -- ``ajja satthu loke uppannassa sattamaasaadhikaani satta sa.mvaccharaani, maya~nca da.t.thumpi na labhaama, pageva bhikkha.m vaa daatu.m puuja.m vaa kaatu.m dhamma.m vaa sotu.m. raajaa `mayha.m eva buddho, mayha.m dhammo, mayha.m sa"ngho'ti mamaayitvaa sayameva upa.t.thahati. satthaa ca uppajjamaano sadevakassa lokassa atthaaya uppanno, na ra~n~noyeva atthaaya. na hi ra~n~noyeva nirayo u.nho, a~n~nesa.m niiluppalavanasadiso. tasmaa raajaana.m eva.m vadaama `sace no satthaara.m deti, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce deti, ra~n~naa saddhi.m yujjhitvaa sa"ngha.m gahetvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani karoma. na sakkaa kho pana suddhanaagareheva eva.m kaatu.m, eka.m je.t.thakapurisampi ga.nhaamaa'''ti senaapati.m upasa"nkamitvaa tassa tamattha.m aarocetvaa ``saami ki.m amhaaka.m pakkho hohisi, udaahu ra~n~no''ti aaha.msu. so aaha -- ``tumhaaka.m pakkho homi, apica kho pana pa.thamadivaso mayha.m daatabbo''ti. te sampa.ticchi.msu.

[03] so raajaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``naagaraa, deva, tumhaaka.m kupitaa''ti aaha. kimattha.m taataati? satthaara.m kira tumheva upa.t.thahatha, amhe na labhaamaati. sace idaanipi labhanti, na kuppanti. alabhantaa tumhehi saddhi.m yujjhitukaamaa, devaati. yujjhaami, taata, na bhikkhusa"ngha.m demiiti. deva, tumhaaka.m daasaa tumhehi saddhi.m yujjhaamaati vadanti, tumhe ka.m ga.nhitvaa yujjhissathaati? nanu tva.m senaapatiiti? naagarehi vinaa asamattho aha.m, devaati. tato raajaa ^a^V1.0115^ea^ ``balavanto naagaraa, senaapatipi tesa.myeva pakkho''ti ~natvaa ``a~n~naani sattamaasaadhikaani satta sa.mvaccharaani mayha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m ^a^P1.0142^ea^ dentuu''ti aaha. naagaraa na sampa.ticchi.msu. raajaa ``chabbassaani pa~ncavassaanii''ti eva.m haapetvaa a~n~ne satta divase yaaci ^a^M1.0111^ea^. naagaraa ``atikakkha.la.m daani ra~n~naa saddhi.m kaatu.m na va.t.tatii''ti anujaani.msu. raajaa sattamaasaadhikaana.m sattanna.m sa.mvaccharaana.m sajjita.m daanamukha.m sattannameva divasaana.m sajjetvaa cha divase kesa~nci apassantaana.myeva daana.m datvaa sattame divase naagare pakkosaapetvaa ``sakkhissatha, taataa, evaruupa.m daana.m daatu''nti aaha. tepi ``nanu amheyeva nissaayeta.m devassa uppanna''nti vatvaa ``sakkhissaamaa''ti aaha.msu. raajaa pi.t.thihatthena assuuni pu~nchamaano bhagavanta.m vanditvaa, ``bhante, a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassa.m a~n~nassu bhaara.m akatvaa yaavajiiva.m catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahissaamiiti cintesi.m, naagaraana.m daani me anu~n~naata.m, naagaraa hi `maya.m daana.m daatu.m na labhaamaa'ti bhagavaa kuppanti. sveva pa.t.thaaya tesa.m anuggaha.m karothaa''ti aaha.

[03] atha dutiyadivase senaapati mahaadaana.m adaasi. tato naagaraa ra~n~naa katasakkaarato uttaritara.m sakkaarasammaana.m katvaa daana.m ada.msu. eteneva niyaamena sakalanagarassa pa.tipaa.tiyaa gataaya dvaaragaamavaasino sakkaarasammaana.m sajjayi.msu. mahaakaalaku.tumbiko cuu.lakaala.m aaha -- ``dasabalassa sakkaarasammaana.m sveva amhaaka.m paapu.naati, ki.m sakkaara.m karissaamaa''ti? tvameva bhaatika jaanaahiiti. sace mayha.m ruciyaa karosi, amhaaka.m so.lasakariisamattesu khettesu gahitagabbhaa saaliyo atthi. saaligabbha.m phaaletvaa aadaaya buddhaana.m ^a^P1.0143^ea^ anucchavika.m pacaapemaati. eva.m kayiramaane kassaci upakaaro na hoti, tasmaa neta.m mayha.m ruccatiiti. sace tva.m eva.m na karosi, aha.m mayha.m santaka.m mamaayitu.m labhaamiiti so.lasakariisamatta.m khetta.m majjhe bhinditvaa a.t.thakariisa.t.thaane siima.m .thapetvaa saaligabbha.m phaaletvaa aadaaya asambhinne khiire pacaapetvaa catumadhura.m pakkhipitvaa buddhappamukhassa sa"nghassa adaasi. ku.tumbikassa kho gabbha.m phaaletvaa gahitagahita.t.thaana.m puna puurati. puthukakaale puthukagga.m naama adaasi, gaamavaasiihi saddhi.m aggasassa.m naama adaasi, laayane laayanagga.m, ve.nikara.ne ve.nagga.m, kalaapaadiisu kalaapagga.m khalagga.m khalabha.n.dagga.m ko.t.thagganti. eva.m so ekasasseva nava vaare aggadaana.m adaasi. tampi sassa.m atireka.m u.t.thaanasampanna.m ahosi.

[03] yaava buddhaa dharati, yaava ca sa"ngho dharati, eteneva niyaamena kalyaa.nakamma.m katvaa tato cuto ^a^V1.0116^ea^ devaloke nibbattitvaa devesu ceva ^a^M1.0112^ea^ manussesu ca sa.msaranto ekanavutikappe sampatti.m anubhavitvaa amhaaka.m satthu loke uppannakaale kapilavatthunagarassa aviduure do.navatthubraahma.nagaame braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase ^b^ko.n.da~n~namaa.navo^eb^ti naama.m aka.msu. so vu.d.dhimanvaaya tayo vede uggahetvaa lakkha.namantaana.m paara.m agamaasi. tena samayena amhaaka.m bodhisatto tusitapuraa cavitvaa kapilavatthupure nibbatti. tassa naamaggaha.nadivase a.t.thuttara.m braahma.nasata.m ahatavatthehi acchaadetvaa appodaka.m ^a^P1.0144^ea^ madhupaayaasa.m paayetvaa tesa.m antare a.t.tha jane uccinitvaa mahaatale nisiidaapetvaa ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m bodhisatta.m dukuulacumba.take nipajjaapetvaa lakkha.napariggaha.nattha.m tesa.m santika.m aanayi.msu. dhuraasane nisinnabraahma.no mahaapurisassa sariirasampatti.m oloketvaa dve a"nguliyo ukkhipi. eva.m pa.tipaa.tiyaa satta janaa ukkhipi.msu. tesa.m pana sabbanavako ko.n.da~n~namaa.navo, so bodhisattassa lakkha.navaranipphatti.m oloketvaa ``agaaramajjhe .thaanakaara.na.m natthi, ekantenesa viva.t.tacchado buddho bhavissatii''ti ekameva a"nguli.m ukkhipi. itare pana satta janaa ``sace agaara.m ajjhaavasissati, raajaa bhavissati cakkavattii. sace pabbajissati, buddho bhavissatii''ti dve gatiyo disvaa dve a"nguliyo ukkhipi.msu. aya.m pana ko.n.da~n~no kataadhikaaro pacchimabhavikasatto pa~n~naaya itare satta jane abhibhavitvaa ``imehi lakkha.nehi samannaagatassa agaaramajjhe .thaanakara.na.m naama natthi, nissa.msaya.m buddho bhavissatii''ti ekameva gati.m addasa, tasmaa eka.m a"nguli.m ukkhipi. tato braahma.naa attano gharaani gantvaa putte aamantayi.msu -- ``taataa, amhe mahallakaa, suddhodanamahaaraajassa putta.m sabba~n~nutappatta.m maya.m sambhaaveyyaama vaa no vaa. tumhe tasmi.m kumaare sabba~n~nuta.m patte tassa saasane pabbajeyyaathaa''ti.

[03] suddhodanamahaaraajaapi bodhisattassa dhaatiyo aadi.m katvaa parihaara.m upa.t.thapento bodhisatta.m vuddhi.m aapaadesi. mahaasattopi vuddhippatto devo viya sampatti.m anubhavitvaa paripakke ~naa.ne kaamesu aadiinava.m nekkhamme ca aanisa.msa.m disvaa raahulakumaarassa jaatadivase channasahaayo ka.n.daka.m aaruyha devataahi viva.tena dvaarena mahaabhinikkhamana.m ^a^P1.0145^ea^ nikkhamitvaa teneva rattibhaagena tii.ni rajjaani atikkamitvaa anomaanadiitiire pabbajitvaa gha.tikaaramahaabrahmunaa aabhate arahaddhaje gahitamatteyeva ^a^M1.0113^ea^ vassasa.t.thikatthero viya paasaadikena iriyaapathena raajagaha.m patvaa tattha pi.n.daaya caritvaa pa.n.davapabbatacchaayaaya pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa ra~n~naa maagadhena rajjasiriyaa nimantiyamaanopi ta.m pa.tikkhipitvaa anukkamena uruvela.m gantvaa ``rama.niiyo vata aya.m bhuumibhaago ^a^V1.0117^ea^, ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa padhaanatthikassa padhaanaayaa''ti padhaanaabhimukha.m citta.m uppaadetvaa tattha vaasa.m upagato.

[03] tena samayena itare satta braahma.naa yathaakamma.m gataa, sabbadaharo pana lakkha.napariggaahako ko.n.da~n~namaa.navo arogo. so ``mahaapuriso pabbajito''ti sutvaa tesa.m braahma.naana.m putte upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha -- ``siddhatthakumaaro kira pabbajito. so hi nissa.msaya.m buddho bhavissati. sace tumhaaka.m pitaro arogaa assu, ajja nikkhamitvaa pabbajeyyu.m. sace tumhepi icchatha, etha maya.m ta.m mahaapurisamanupabbajissaamaa''ti. te sabbe ekacchandaa bhavitu.m naasakkhi.msu. tayo janaa na pabbaji.msu, ko.n.da~n~nabraahma.na.m je.t.thaka.m katvaa itare cattaaro pabbaji.msu. ime pa~nca pabbajitvaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu bhikkhaaya carantaa bodhisattassa santika.m agami.msu. te chabbassaani bodhisatte mahaapadhaana.m padahante ``idaani buddho bhavissati idaani buddho bhavissatii''ti mahaasatta.m upa.t.thahamaanaa santikaavacaraavassa ahesu.m. yadaa pana bodhisatto ekatilata.n.dulaadiihi viitinaamentopi dukkarakaarikaaya ariyadhammapa.tivedhassa abhaava.m ~natvaa o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahari, tadaa te pakkamitvaa isipatana.m agama.msu.

[03] atha bodhisatto o.laarikaahaaraparibhogena chavima.msalohitapaaripuuri.m katvaa ^a^P1.0146^ea^ visaakhapu.n.namadivase sujaataaya dinna.m varabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa suva.n.napaati.m nadiyaa pa.tisota.m khipitvaa ``ajja buddho bhavissaamii''ti katasanni.t.thaano saayanhasamaye kaalena naagaraajena anekehi thutisatehi abhitthaviyamaano mahaabodhima.n.da.m aaruyha acala.t.thaane paaciinalokadhaatuabhimukho palla"nkena nisiiditvaa catura"ngasamannaagata.m viiriya.m adhi.t.thaaya suuriye dharamaaneyeva maarabala.m vidhamitvaa pa.thamayaame pubbenivaasa.m anussaritvaa majjhimayaame dibbacakkhu.m visodhetvaa paccuusakaalasamanantare pa.ticcasamuppaade ~naa.na.m otaaretvaa anulomapa.tiloma.m paccayaakaarava.t.ta.m ^a^M1.0114^ea^ sammasanto sabbabuddhehi pa.tividdha.m asaadhaara.na.m sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m pa.tivijjhitvaa nibbaanaaramma.naaya phalasamaapattiyaa tattheva sattaaha.m viitinaamesi.

[03] eteneva upaayena sattasattaaha.m bodhima.n.de viharitvaa raajaayatanamuule madhupi.n.dikabhojana.m paribhu~njitvaa puna ajapaalanigrodhamuula.m aagantvaa tattha nisinno dhammagambhiirata.m paccavekkhitvaa appossukkataaya citte namante mahaabrahmunaa yaacito buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento tikkhindriyaadibhede ^a^V1.0118^ea^ satte disvaa mahaabrahmuno dhammadesanaaya pa.ti~n~na.m datvaa ``kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m desessaamii''ti aa.laarudakaana.m kaalakatabhaava.m ~natvaa puna cintento ``bahuupakaaraa kho pana me pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu, ye ma.m padhaanapahitatta.m upa.t.thahi.msu. ya.mnuunaaha.m pa~ncavaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya''nti citta.m uppaadesi. ida.m pana sabbameva buddhaana.m parivitakkamattameva, .thapetvaa pana ko.n.da~n~nabraahma.na.m a~n~no koci pa.thama.m dhamma.m pa.tivijjhitu.m samattho naama natthi. sopi etadatthameva ^a^P1.0147^ea^ kappasatasahassa.m adhikaarakamma.m akaasi, buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa nava vaare aggasassadaana.m adaasi.

[03] atha satthaa pattaciivaramaadaaya anupubbena isipatana.m gantvaa yena pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu, tenupasa"nkami. te tathaagata.m aagacchanta.m disvaava attano katikaaya sa.n.thaatu.m naasakkhi.msu. eko pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesi, eko aasana.m pa~n~naapesi, eko paadodaka.m paccupa.t.thaapesi, eko paade dhovi, eko taalava.n.ta.m gahetvaa biijamaano .thito. eva.m tesu vatta.m dassetvaa santike nisinnesu ko.n.da~n~natthera.m kaayasakkhi.m katvaa satthaa anuttara.m tepariva.t.ta.m dhammacakkappavattanasuttanta.m aarabhi. manussaparisaa pa~nca janaava ahesu.m, devaparisaa aparicchinnaa. desanaapariyosaane ko.n.da~n~natthero a.t.thaarasahi mahaabrahmako.tiihi saddhi.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thito. atha satthaa ``mayaa dukkarasataabhata.m dhamma.m pa.thamameva a~n~naasiiti a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~no naama aya''nti thera.m aalapanto ``a~n~naasi vata, bho, ko.n.da~n~no, a~n~naasi vata, bho, ko.n.da~n~no''ti aaha. tassa tadeva naama.m jaata.m. tena vutta.m -- ``iti hida.m ^a^M1.0115^ea^ aayasmato ko.n.da~n~nassa a~n~naasiko.n.da~n~notveva naama.m ahosii''ti.

[03] iti thero aasaa.lhipu.n.namaaya.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thito, paa.tipadadivase bhaddiyatthero, dutiyapakkhadivase vappatthero, tatiyapakkhadivase mahaanaamatthero, pakkhassa catutthiya.m assajitthero sotaapattiphale pati.t.thito. pa~ncamiyaa pana pakkhassa anattalakkha.nasuttantadesanaapariyosaane sabbepi arahatte pati.t.thitaa.

[03] tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto honti. tato pa.t.thaaya satthaa yasadaarakappamukhe pa~ncapa~n~naasa purise, kappaasiyavanasa.n.de ti.msamatte bhaddavaggiye, gayaasiise pi.t.thipaasaa.ne ^a^P1.0148^ea^ sahassamatte puraa.naja.tileti eva.m mahaajana.m ariyabhuumi.m otaaretvaa bimbisaarappamukhaani ekaadasanahutaani ^a^V1.0119^ea^ sotaapattiphale, eka.m nahuta.m sara.nattaye pati.t.thaapetvaa jambudiipatale saasana.m pupphitaphalita.m katvaa sakalajambudiipama.n.dala.m kaasaavapajjota.m isivaatapa.tivaata.m karonto ekasmi.m samaye jetavanamahaavihaara.m patvaa tattha vasanto bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasanagato dhamma.m desento ``pa.thama.m dhamma.m pa.tividdhabhikkhuuna.m antare mama putto ko.n.da~n~no aggo''ti dassetu.m etadagga.t.thaane .thapesi.

[03] theropi dve aggasaavake attano nipaccakaara.m karonte disvaa buddhaana.m santikaa apakkamitukaamo hutvaa ``pu.n.namaa.navo pabbajitvaa saasane aggadhammakathiko bhavissatii''ti disvaa do.navatthubraahma.nagaama.m gantvaa attano bhaagineyya.m pu.n.namaa.nava.m pabbaajetvaa ``aya.m buddhaana.m santike vasissatii''ti tassa buddhaana.m antevaasikabhaava.m katvaa saya.m dasabala.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``bhagavaa mayha.m gaamantasenaasana.m asappaaya.m, aaki.n.no viharitu.m na sakkomi, chaddantadaha.m gantvaa vasissaamii''ti bhagavanta.m anujaanaapetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa satthaara.m vanditvaa chaddantadaha.m gantvaa chaddantahatthikula.m nissaaya dvaadasa vassaani viitinaametvaa tattheva anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi.

[03] 189-190^b^.^eb^ dutiyatatiyesu ^a^M1.0116^ea^ ^b^mahaapa~n~naana^eb^nti mahatiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagataana.m. ^b^iddhimantaana^eb^nti iddhiyaa sampannaana.m. ^b^saariputto moggallaano^eb^ti tesa.m theraana.m naama.m.

[03] imesampi pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ito satasahassakappaadhike asa"nkhyeyyakappamatthake saariputto braahma.namahaasaalakule nibbatti, naamena saradamaa.navo naama ahosi. moggallaano gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbatti ^a^P1.0149^ea^, naamena siriva.d.dhanaku.tumbiyo naama ahosi. te ubhopi sahapa.msukii.litaava sahaayakaa ahesu.m. saradamaa.navo pitu accayena kulasantaka.m mahaadhana.m pa.tipajjitvaa ekadivasa.m rahogato cintesi -- ``aha.m idhalokattabhaavameva jaanaami, no paralokattabhaava.m, jaatasattaana~nca mara.na.m naama dhuva.m, mayaa eka.m pabbajja.m pabbajitvaa mokkhadhammagavesana.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti. so sahaayaka.m upasa"nkamitvaa aaha -- ``samma siriva.d.dhana, aha.m pabbajitvaa mokkhadhamma.m gavesissaami, tva.m mayaa saddhi.m pabbajitu.m sakkhissasii''ti. na sakkhissaami ^a^V1.0120^ea^, samma, tva.myeva pabbajaahiiti. so cintesi -- ``paraloka.m gacchantaa sahaaye vaa ~naatimitte vaa gahetvaa gataa naama natthi, attanaa kata.m attanova hotii''ti. tato ratanako.t.thaagaara.m vivaraapetvaa kapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaana.m mahaadaana.m datvaa pabbatapaada.m pavisitvaa isipabbajja.m pabbaji. tassa eko dve tayoti eva.m anupabbajja.m pabbajitaa catusattatisahassamattaa ja.tilaa ahesu.m. so pa~ncaabhi~n~naa a.t.tha ca samaapattiyo nibbattetvaa tesampi ja.tilaana.m kasi.naparikamma.m aacikkhi. tepi sabbe pa~nca abhi~n~naa a.t.tha ca samaapattiyo nibbattesu.m.

[03] tena samayena anomadassii naama buddho loke udapaadi. nagara.m candavatii naama ahosi, pitaa yasavanto naama khattiyo, maataa yasodharaa naama devii, bodhi ajjunarukkho, nisabhatthero ca anomatthero caati dve aggasaavakaa, varu.natthero naama upa.t.thaako, sundaraa ca sumanaa caati dve aggasaavikaa, aayu vassasatasahassa.m ahosi, sariira.m a.t.thapa~n~naasahatthubbedha.m, sariirappabhaa dvaadasayojana.m phari, bhikkhusatasahassaparivaaro ahosi.
