[03] so cintesi -- ``ida.m na bahumuula.m, aya~nca ekappahaareneva bahu.m deti, viima.msitu.m va.t.tatii''ti ^a^V1.0189^ea^. tato na.m ``naaha.m ekakahaapa.nena demii''ti aaha. yadi eva.m, dve gahetvaa dehiiti. dviihipi na demiiti. etenupaayena va.d.dhanta.m va.d.dhanta.m sahassa.m paapu.ni. so cintesi -- ``atia~nchitu.m na va.t.tati, hotu taava, imassa kattabbakicca.m pucchissaamii''ti. atha na.m aaha -- ``ida.m na bahuagghanaka.m, tva~nca bahu.m desi, kena kammena ida.m ga.nhaasii''ti? idha, bho, nagaravaasino ra~n~naa saddhi.m pa.tivirujjhitvaa vipassiidasabalassa daana.m dentaa ida.m dvaya.m daanamukhe apassantaa pariyesanti. sace ida.m dvaya.m na labhissanti, naagaraana.m paraajayo bhavissati. tasmaa sahassa.m datvaa ga.nhaamiiti. ki.m paneta.m naagaraanameva va.t.tati, na a~n~nesa.m daatu.m va.t.tatiiti? yassa kassaci daatu.m avaaritametanti. atthi pana te koci naagaraana.m daane ekadivasa.m sahassa.m daataati? natthi sammaati. imesa.m pana dvinna.m sahassagghanakabhaava.m jaanaasiiti? aama jaanaamiiti. tena hi gaccha, naagaraana.m aacikkha -- ``eko puriso imaani dve muulena na deti, sahattheneva daatukaamo, tumhe imesa.m dvinna.m kaara.naa nirussukkaa hothaa''ti. tva.m pana me imasmi.m daanamukhe je.t.thakabhaavassa kaayasakkhii hohiiti.

[03] so gaamavaasii paribbayattha.m gahitamaasakena pa~ncaka.tuka.m gahetvaa cu.n.na.m katvaa dadhito ka~njiya.m vaahetvaa tattha madhupa.tala.m ^a^P1.0245^ea^ pii.letvaa pa~ncaka.tukacu.n.nena yojetvaa ekasmi.m paduminipatte pakkhipitvaa ta.m sa.mvidahitvaa aadaaya ^a^M1.0192^ea^ dasabalassa aviduure .thaane nisiidi. mahaajanena aahariyamaanassa sakkaarassa antare attano pattavaara.m olokayamaano okaasa.m ~natvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa ``bhagavaa aya.m mayha.m duggatapa.n.naakaaro, ima.m me anukampa.m pa.ticca ga.nhathaa''ti. satthaa tassa anukampa.m pa.ticca catumahaaraajadattiyena selamayena pattena ta.m pa.tiggahetvaa yathaa a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassassa diyyamaana.m na khiiyati, eva.m adhi.t.thaasi. sopi kulaputto ni.t.thitabhattakicca.m bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m .thito aaha -- ``di.t.tho me bhagavaa ajja bandhumatiinagaravaasikehi tumhaaka.m sakkaaro aahariyamaano, ahampi imassa kammassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave laabhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya''nti. satthaa ``eva.m hotu kulaputtaa''ti vatvaa tassa ca nagaravaasiina~nca bhattaanumodana.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] sopi kulaputto yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade suppavaasaaya raajadhiitaaya kucchismi.m pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. pa.tisandhiggaha.nato pa.t.thaaya saaya.m paata~nca pa.n.naakaarasataani paapu.nanti, suppavaasaa sampatti.m gacchati. atha na.m pu~n~naviima.msanattha.m hatthena biijapacchi.m ^a^V1.0190^ea^ phusaapenti, ekekabiijato salaakasatampi salaakasahassampi nigacchati. ekakariisakhettato pa~n~naasampi sa.t.thipi saka.taani uppajjanti. ko.t.thapuura.nakaalepi ko.t.thadvaara.m hatthena phusaapenti, raajadhiitaaya pu~n~nena ga.nhantaana.m gahitagahita.t.thaana.m puna puurati. paripu.n.nabhattakumbhitopi ``raajadhiitaaya pu~n~na''nti ^a^P1.0246^ea^ vatvaa yassa kassaci dentaana.m yaava na ukka.d.dhanti, na taava bhatta.m khiiyati. daarake kucchigateyeva satta vassaani atikkami.msu.

[03] gabbhe pana paripakke sattaaha.m mahaadukkha.m anubhosi. saa saamika.m aamantetvaa ``pure mara.naa jiivamaanaava daana.m dassaamii''ti satthu santika.m pesesi -- ``gaccha ima.m pavatti.m satthu aarocetvaa satthaara.m nimantehi, ya~nca satthaa vadeti, ta.m saadhuka.m upalakkhetvaa aagantvaa mayha.m kathehii''ti. so gantvaa tassaa saasana.m bhagavato aarocesi. satthaa ``sukhinii hotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa, sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaayatuu''ti aaha. raajaa ta.m sutvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa antogaamaabhimukho paayaasi. tassa pure aagamanaayeva suppavaasaaya kucchito ^a^M1.0193^ea^ dhamakara.naa udaka.m viya gabbho nikkhami, parivaaretvaa nisinnajano assumukhova hasitu.m aaraddho. ha.t.thatu.t.tho mahaajano ra~n~no puttasaasana.m aarocetu.m agamaasi.

[03] raajaa tesa.m i"ngita.m disvaava ``dasabalena kathitakathaa nipphannaa ma~n~ne''ti cintesi. so aagantvaa satthu saasana.m raajadhiitaaya aarocesi. raajadhiitaa ``tayaa nimantita.m jiivitabhattameva ma"ngalabhatta.m bhavissati, gaccha sattaaha.m dasabala.m nimantehii''ti. raajaa tathaa akaasi. sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m pavattayi.msu. daarako sabbesa.m ~naatiina.m santattacitta.m nibbaapento jaatoti ^b^siivalidaarako^eb^tvevassa naama.m aka.msu. so satta vassaani gabbhe vasitattaa jaatakaalato pa.t.thaaya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi. dhammasenaapati saariputto sattame divase tena saddhi.m kathaasallaapa.m akaasi. satthaapi dhammapade gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``yoma.m ^a^P1.0247^ea^ palipatha.m dugga.m, sa.msaara.m mohamaccagaa.
[27] ti.n.no paara"ngato jhaayii, anejo akatha.mkathii.
[22] anupaadaaya nibbuto, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. (dha0 pa0 414).

[03] atha na.m thero evamaaha -- ``ki.m pana tayaa evaruupa.m dukkharaasi.m anubhavitvaa pabbajitu.m na ^a^V1.0191^ea^ va.t.tatii''ti? labhamaano pabbajeyya.m, bhanteti. suppavaasaa ta.m daaraka.m therena saddhi.m kathenta.m disvaa ``ki.m nu kho me putto dhammasenaapatinaa saddhi.m kathetii''ti thera.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchi -- ``mayha.m putto tumhehi saddhi.m ki.m katheti, bhadante''ti? attanaa anubhuuta.m gabbhavaasadukkha.m kathetvaa tumhehi anu~n~naato pabbajissaamiiti vadatiiti. saadhu, bhante, pabbaajetha nanti. thero ta.m vihaara.m netvaa tacapa~ncakakamma.t.thaana.m datvaa pabbaajento, ``siivali, na tuyha.m a~n~nena ovaadena kamma.m atthi, tayaa satta vassaani anubhuutadukkhameva paccavekkhaahii''ti. bhante, pabbaajanameva tumhaaka.m bhaaro, ya.m pana mayaa kaatu.m sakkaa, tamaha.m jaanissaamiiti. so pa.thamakesava.t.tiyaa ohaaritakkha.neyeva sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaasi, dutiyaaya ohaaritakkha.ne sakadaagaamiphale, tatiyaaya anaagaamiphale. sabbesa.myeva pana kesaana.m oropana~nca arahattasacchikiriyaa ca apacchaa apurimaa ahosi. tassa pabbajitadivasato pa.t.thaaya bhikkhusa"nghassa cattaaro paccayaa yadicchaka.m uppajjanti. eva.m ettha vatthu samu.t.thita.m.

[03] aparabhaage ^a^M1.0194^ea^ satthaa saavatthi.m agamaasi. thero satthaara.m abhivaadetvaa, ``bhante, mayha.m pu~n~na.m viima.msissaami, pa~nca me bhikkhusataani dethaa''ti aaha ^a^P1.0248^ea^. ga.nha, siivaliiti. so pa~ncasate bhikkhuu gahetvaa himavantaabhimukha.m gacchanto a.tavimagga.m gacchati. tassa pa.thama.m di.t.thaa nigrodhe adhivatthaa devataa satta divasaani daana.m adaasi. iti so --
[21] ``nigrodha.m pa.thama.m passi, dutiya.m pa.n.davapabbata.m.
[22] tatiya.m aciravatiya.m, catuttha.m varasaagara.m..
[21] ``pa~ncama.m himavanta.m so, cha.t.tha.m chaddantupaagami.
[22] sattama.m gandhamaadana.m, a.t.thama.m atha revata''nti..

[03] sabba.t.thaanesu satta satta divasaaneva daana.m ada.msu. gandhamaadanapabbate pana naagadattadevaraajaa naama sattadivasesu ekadivasa.m khiirapi.n.dapaata.m adaasi, ekadivasa.m sappipi.n.dapaata.m adaasi. bhikkhusa"ngho aaha -- ``aavuso, imassa devara~n~no neva dhenuyo duyhamaanaa pa~n~naayanti, na dadhinimmathana.m, kuto te, devaraaja, ima.m uppajjatii''ti? ``bhante, kassapadasabalassa kaale khiirasalaakabhattadaanasseta.m ^a^V1.0192^ea^ phala''nti devaraajaa aaha. aparabhaage satthaa khadiravaniyarevatassa paccuggamana.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m attano saasane laabhaggayasaggappattaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^saddhaadhimuttaana^eb^nti saddhaaya adhimuttaana.m, balavasaddhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vakkalitthero aggoti dasseti. a~n~nesa.m hi saddhaa va.d.dhetabbaa hoti, therassa pana haapetabbaa jaataa. tasmaa so saddhaadhimuttaana.m aggoti vutto. ^b^vakkalii^eb^ti panassa naama.m.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi atiite padumuttarabuddhakaale vuttanayeneva ^a^P1.0249^ea^ vihaara.m gantvaa parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m saddhaadhimuttaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ``mayaapi anaagate evaruupena bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti vuttanayeneva satthaara.m nimantetvaa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa dasabala.m vanditvaa, ``bhante, ahampi iminaa adhikaarakammena tumhehi saddhaadhimuttaana.m etadagge .thapitabhikkhu viya anaagate ^a^M1.0195^ea^ ekassa buddhassa saasane saddhaadhimuttaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. satthaa tassa anantaraaya.m disvaa byaakaritvaa pakkaami.

[03] sopi yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m satthukaale saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, vakkaliitissa naama.m aka.msu. so vuddhippatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa dasabala.m bhikkhusa"nghaparivuta.m saavatthiya.m caranta.m disvaa satthu sariirasampatti.m olokento sariirasampattidassanena atitto dasabalena saddhi.myeva vicarati. vihaara.m gacchantena saddhi.m vihaara.m gantvaa sariiranipphatti.m olokentova ti.t.thati. dhammasabhaaya.m nisiiditvaa dhamma.m kathentassa sammukha.t.thaane .thito dhamma.m su.naati. so saddha.m pa.tilabhitvaa ``agaaramajjhe vasanto nibaddha.m dasabalassa dassana.m na labhissaamii''ti pabbajja.m yaacitvaa satthu santike pabbaji.

[03] tato pa.t.thaaya .thapetvaa aahaarakara.navela.m avasesakaale yattha .thitena sakkaa dasabala.m passitu.m, tattha .thito yonisomanasikaara.m pahaaya dasabala.m olokentova viharati. satthaa tassa ~naa.naparipaaka.m aagamento diighampi addhaana.m tasmi.m ruupadassanavaseneva vicarante ki~nci avatvaa ``idaanissa ^a^V1.0193^ea^ ~naa.na.m paripaakagata.m, sakkaa eta.m bodhetu''nti ~natvaa evamaaha -- ``ki.m te, vakkali, iminaa puutikaayena di.t.thena, yo kho, vakkali, dhamma.m passati, so ma.m passati. yo ma.m passati, so dhamma.m passati. dhamma~nhi, vakkali ^a^P1.0250^ea^, passanto ma.m passati, ma.m passanto dhamma.m passatii''ti.

[03] satthari eva.m ovadantepi thero dasabalassa dassana.m pahaaya neva a~n~nattha gantu.m sakkoti. tato satthaa ``naaya.m bhikkhu sa.mvega.m alabhitvaa bujjhissatii''ti upaka.t.thaaya vassuupanaayikaaya raajagaha.m gantvaa vassuupanaayikadivase ``apehi, vakkalii''ti thera.m pa.naameti. buddhaa ca naama aadeyyavacanaa honti, tasmaa thero satthaara.m pa.tippharitvaa .thaatu.m asakkonto temaasa.m dasabalassa sammukhe aagantu.m avisahanto ``ki.m daani sakkaa kaatu.m, tathaagatenamhi pa.naamito, sammukhiibhaava.m na labhaami, ki.m mayha.m jiivitenaa''ti gijjhakuu.tapabbate papaata.t.thaana.m abhiruhi. satthaa tassa kilamanabhaava.m ~natvaa ``aya.m bhikkhu mama santikaa assaasa.m alabhanto ^a^M1.0196^ea^ maggaphalaana.m upanissaya.m naaseyyaa''ti attaana.m dassetu.m obhaasa.m vissajjesi. athassa satthu di.t.thakaalato pa.t.thaaya eva mahanta.m sokasalla.m pahiina.m. satthaa sukkhata.laake ogha.m aaharanto viya vakkalittherassa balavapiitisomanassa.m uppaadetu.m dhammapade ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``paamojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasaasane.
[22] adhigacche pada.m santa.m, sa"nkhaaruupasama.m sukha''nti.. (dha0 pa0 381).

[03] vakkalittherassa ca ``ehi, vakkalii''ti hattha.m pasaaresi. thero ``dasabalo me di.t.tho, ehiiti avhaayanampi laddha''nti balavapiiti.m uppaadetvaa ``kuto gacchaamii''ti attano gamanabhaava.m ajaanitvaava dasabalassa sammukhe aakaase pakkhanditvaa pa.thamapaadena pabbate .thitoyeva satthaaraa vuttagaatha.m ^a^P1.0251^ea^ aavajjento aakaaseyeva piiti.m vikkhambhetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m patvaa tathaagata.m vandamaanova otari. aparabhaage satthaa ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m saddhaadhimuttaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.
[06] dutiyavaggava.n.nanaa.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^V1.0194^ea^ pa.thame ^b^sikkhaakaamaana^eb^nti tisso sikkhaa kaamayamaanaana.m sampiyaayitvaa sikkhantaananti attho. ^b^raahulo^eb^ti attano putta.m raahulatthera.m dasseti. thero kira pabbajitadivasato pa.t.thaaya paatova u.t.thahanto hatthapuura.m vaalika.m ukkhipitvaa ``aho vataaha.m ajja dasabalassa ceva aacariyupajjhaayaana~nca santikaa ettaka.m ovaada~nceva anusaasani~nca labheyya''nti pattheti. tasmaa sikkhaakaamaana.m aggo naama jaatoti.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^saddhaapabbajitaana^eb^nti saddhaaya pabbajitaana.m. ^b^ra.t.thapaalo^eb^ti ra.t.tha.m paaletu.m samattho, bhinna.m vaa ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthe kule jaatotipi ^a^M1.0197^ea^ ra.t.thapaaloti sa"nkha.m gato. so hi satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho cuddasabhattacchede katvaa maataapitaro pabbajja.m anujaanaapetvaa pabbajito. tasmaa saddhaapabbajitaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] imesa.m pana ubhinnampi theraana.m pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ete kira dvepi atiite padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare gahapatimahaasaalakule nibbatti.msu. tesa.m daharakaale naama.m vaa gotta.m vaa na kathiyati. vayappattaa pana gharaavaase pati.t.thaaya attano attano pitu accayena ubhopi attano attano ^a^P1.0252^ea^ ratanako.t.thaagaarakammike pakkosaapetvaa aparimaa.na.m dhana.m disvaa -- ``ima.m ettaka.m dhanaraasi.m ayyakapayyakaadayo attanaa saddhi.m gahetvaa gantu.m naasakkhi.msu, amhehi daani yena kenaci upaayena ima.m dhana.m gahetvaa gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti te ubhopi janaa catuusu .thaanesu kapa.naddhikaadiina.m mahaadaana.m daatu.m aaraddhaa. eko attano daanagge aagataagatajana.m pucchitvaa yaagukhajjakaadiisu yassa ya.m pa.tibhaati, tassa ta.m adaasi, tassa teneva kaara.nena aagatapaakoti ^a^V1.0195^ea^ naama.m jaata.m. itaro apucchitvaava gahitagahitabhaajana.m puuretvaa puuretvaa deti, tassapi teneva kaara.nena anaggapaakoti naama.m jaata.m, appamaa.napaakoti attho.

[03] te ubhopi ekadivasa.m paatova mukhadhovanattha.m bahigaama.m agama.msu. tasmi.m samaye himavantato dve mahiddhikaa taapasaa bhikkhaacaaratthaaya aakaasena aagantvaa tesa.m sahaayakaana.m aviduure otaritvaa ``maa no ete passi.msuu''ti ekapasse a.t.tha.msu. te ubhopi janaa tesa.m laabubhaajanaadiparikkhaara.m sa.mvidhaaya antogaama.m sandhaaya bhikkhaaya gataana.m santika.m aagamma vandi.msu. atha ne taapasaa ``kaaya velaaya aagatattha mahaapu~n~naa''ti aaha.msu. te ``adhunaava, bhante''ti vatvaa ^a^M1.0198^ea^ tesa.m hatthato laabubhaajana.m gahetvaa attano attano geha.m netvaa bhattakiccapariyosaane nibaddha.m bhikkhaagaha.nattha.m pa.ti~n~na.m ga.nhi.msu.

[03] tesu eko taapaso sapari.laahakaayadhaatuko hoti. so attano aanubhaavena mahaasamuddaudaka.m dvedhaa katvaa pathavindharanaagaraajassa bhavana.m gantvaa divaavihaara.m nisiidati. so utusappaaya.m gahetvaa paccaagantvaa attano upa.t.thaakassa gehe bhattaanumodana.m karonto ``pathavindharanaagabhavana.m viya ^a^P1.0253^ea^ hotuu''ti vadati. atha na.m ekadivasa.m upa.t.thaako pucchi -- ``bhante, tumhe anumodana.m karontaa `pathavindharanaagabhavana.m viya hotuu'ti vadatha, mayamassa attha.m na jaanaama, ki.m vutta.m hoti ida.m, bhante''ti? aama, ku.tumbiya aha.m ``tumhaaka.m sampatti pathavindharanaagaraajasampattisadisaa hotuu''ti vadaamiiti. ku.tumbiko tato pa.t.thaaya pathavindharanaagaraajabhavane citta.m .thapesi.

[03] itaro taapaso taavati.msabhavana.m gantvaa su~n~ne serisakavimaane divaavihaara.m karoti. so aagacchanto gacchanto ca sakkassa devaraajassa sampatti.m disvaa attano upa.t.thaakassa anumodana.m karonto ``sakkavimaana.m viya hotuu''ti vadati. atha na.m sopi ku.tumbiyo itaro sahaayako ta.m taapasa.m viya pucchi. so tassa vacana.m sutvaa sakkabhavane citta.m .thapesi. te ubhopi patthita.t.thaanesuyeva nibbattaa.

[03] pathavindharabhavane nibbatto pathavindharanaagaraajaa naama jaato. so nibbattakkha.ne attano attabhaava.m disvaa ``amanaapassa vata me .thaanassa kulupakataapaso va.n.na.m kathesi, urena parisakkitvaa ^a^V1.0196^ea^ vicara.na.t.thaanameta.m, nuuna so a~n~na.m .thaana.m na jaanaatii''ti vippa.tisaarii ahosi. athassa ta.mkha.neyeva ala"nkatapa.tiyattaani naaganaa.takaani sabbadisaasu tuuriyaani pagga.nhi.msu. so tasmi.myeva kha.ne ta.m attabhaava.m vijahitvaa maa.navakava.n.nii ahosi. anvaddhamaasa~nca cattaaro mahaaraajaano sakkassa upa.t.thaana.m gacchanti. tasmaa sopi viruupakkhena naagara~n~naa saddhi.m sakkassa upa.t.thaana.m gato. sakko ta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m disvaa sa~njaani. atha na.m samiipe aagantvaa .thitakaale ``kaha.m nibbattosi ^a^P1.0254^ea^ sammaa''ti pucchi. maa kathesi, mahaaraaja, urena parisakkana.t.thaane nibbattomhi, tumhe pana kalyaa.namitta.m labhitthaati. samma, tva.m ``a.t.thaane nibbattomhii''ti maa vitakkayi ^a^M1.0199^ea^, padumuttaradasabalo loke nibbatto, tassa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ima.myeva .thaana.m patthehi, ubho sukha.m vasissaamaati. so ``eva.m, deva, karissaamii''ti gantvaa padumuttaradasabala.m nimantetvaa attano naagabhavane naagaparisaaya saddhi.m sabbaratti.m sakkaarasammaana.m sajjesi.

[03] satthaa punadivase u.t.thite aru.ne attano upa.t.thaaka.m sumanatthera.m aamantesi -- ``sumana, ajja tathaagato duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m gamissati, maa puthujjanabhikkhuu aagacchantu, tepi.takaa pa.tisambhidaappattaa cha.labhi~n~naava aagacchantuu''ti. thero satthu vacana.m sutvaa sabbesa.m aarocesi. satthaaraa saddhi.m satasahassaa bhikkhuu aakaasa.m pakkhandi.msu. pathavindharo naagaparisaaya saddhi.m dasabalassa paccuggamana.m aagato satthaara.m parivaaretvaa samuddamatthake ma.niva.n.naa uumiyo maddamaana.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m oloketvaa aadito satthaara.m, pariyosaane sa"nghanavaka.m tathaagatassa putta.m uparevatasaama.nera.m naama olokento ``anacchariyo sesasaavakaana.m evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo, imassa pana taru.nabaaladaarakassa evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo ativiya acchariyo''ti piitipaamojja.m uppaadesi.

[03] athassa bhavane dasabale nisinne sesabhikkhuusu ko.tito pa.t.thaaya nisiidantesu satthu sammukha.t.thaaneyeva uparevatasaama.nerassa aasana.m paapu.ni. naagaraajaa yaagu.m dentopi khajjaka.m dentopi saki.m dasabala.m oloketi, saki.m uparevatasaama.nera.m. tassa kira sariire satthu sariire viya dvatti.msa mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa~n~naayanti. tato naagaraajaa ``aya.m saama.nero buddhaana.m sadiso pa~n~naayati, ki.m nu kho ^a^P1.0255^ea^ hotii''ti aviduure nisinna.m a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m pucchi -- ``aya.m, bhante, saama.nero dasabalassa ki.m hotii''ti? putto, mahaaraajaati. so cintesi -- ``mahaa ^a^V1.0197^ea^ vataaya.m bhikkhu, evaruupassa sobhaggappattassa tathaagatassa puttabhaava.m labhi. sariirampissa ekadesena buddhaana.m sariirasadisa.m pa~n~naayati, mayaapi anaagate evaruupena bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa, ``bhante, aha.m imassa adhikaarakammassaanubhaavena aya.m uparevato viya anaagate ekassa buddhassa putto bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. satthaa ^a^M1.0200^ea^ anantaraaya.m disvaa ``anaagate gotamabuddhassa putto bhavissasii''ti byaakaritvaa pakkaami.

[03] pathavindharopi puna addhamaase sampatte viruupakkhena saddhi.m sakkassa upa.t.thaana.m gato. atha na.m samiipe .thita.m sakko pucchi -- ``patthito te, samma, aya.m devaloko''ti? na patthito mahaaraajaati. ki.m dosa.m addasaati? doso natthi, mahaaraaja, aha.m pana dasabalassa putta.m uparevatasaama.nera.m passi.m. tassa me di.t.thakaalato pa.t.thaaya a~n~nattha citta.m na nami, svaaha.m ``anaagate ekassa buddhassa evaruupo putto bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi.m. tvampi, mahaaraaja, eka.m patthana.m karohi, te maya.m nibbatta.t.thaane na vinaa bhavissaamaati. sakko tassa vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa eka.m mahaanubhaava.m bhikkhu.m disvaa ``katarakulaa nu kho nikkhamitvaa aya.m kulaputto pabbajito''ti aavajjento ``aya.m bhinna.m ra.t.tha.m sandhaaretu.m samatthassa kulassa putto hutvaa cuddasa bhattacchede katvaa maataapitaro pabbajja.m anujaanaapetvaa pabbajito''ti a~n~naasi. ~natvaa ca pana ajaananto viya dasabala.m pucchitvaa sattaaha.m mahaasakkaara.m katvaa, ``bhante, aha.m imassa kalyaa.nakammassa nissandena tumhaaka.m saasane aya.m kulaputto viya anaagate ekassa buddhassa saasane saddhaapabbajitaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m ^a^P1.0256^ea^ akaasi. satthaa anantaraaya.m disvaa ``tva.m, mahaaraaja, anaagate gotamassa buddhassa saasane saddhaapabbajitaana.m aggo bhavissasii''ti byaakaritvaa pakkaami. sakkopi attano devapurameva gato.

[03] te ubhopi nibbatta.t.thaanato cavitvaa devamanussesu sa.msarantaa anekasahassakappe atikkami.msu. ito pana dvaanavutikappamatthake phusso naama buddho loke udapaadi. tassa pitaa mahindo naama raajaa ahosi, vemaatikaa tayo kani.t.thabhaataro. raajaa divase divase ``mayha.myeva buddho mayha.m dhammo mayha.m sa"ngho''ti mamaayanto sayameva dasabala.m nibaddha.m bhojana.m bhojeti.

[03] athassa ekadivasa.m paccanto kupito. so putte aamantesi -- ``taataa, paccanto kupito ^a^V1.0198^ea^, tumhehi vaa mayaa vaa gantabba.m. yadi aha.m gacchaami, tumhehi iminaa niyaamena dasabalo paricaritabbo''ti. te tayopi ekappahaareneva aaha.msu -- ``taata, tumhaaka.m gamanakicca.m natthi, maya.m ^a^M1.0201^ea^ core vidhamissaamaa''ti pitara.m vanditvaa paccanta.m gantvaa core vidhamitvaa vijitasa"ngaamaa hutvaa nivatti.msu. te antaraamagge paadamuulikehi saddhi.m mantayi.msu -- ``taataa, amhaaka.m gatakkha.neyeva pitaa vara.m dassati, katara.m vara.m ga.nhaamaa''ti? ayyaa, tumhaaka.m pitu accayena dullabha.m naama natthi, tumhaaka.m pana je.t.thabhaatika.m phussabuddha.m pa.tijagganavara.m ga.nhathaa''ti aaha.msu. te ``kalyaa.na.m tumhehi vutta''nti sabbepi ekacittaa hutvaa gantvaa pitara.m addasa.msu. tadaa pitaa tesa.m pasiiditvaa vara.m adaasi. te ``temaasa.m tathaagata.m pa.tijaggissaamaa''ti vara.m yaaci.msu. raajaa ``aya.m daatu.m na sakkaa, a~n~na.m vara.m ga.nhathaa''ti aaha. taata, amhaaka.m a~n~nena varena kicca.m natthi, sace tumhe daatukaamaa, eta.myeva ^a^P1.0257^ea^ no vara.m dethaati. raajaa tesu punappuna.m kathentesu attanaa pa.ti~n~naatattaa ``na sakkaa na daatu''nti cintetvaa aaha -- ``taataa, aha.m tumhaaka.m vara.m demi, apica kho pana buddhaa naama duraasadaa honti siihaa viya ekacaraa, dasabala.m pa.tijaggantaa appamattaa bhaveyyaathaa''ti.

[03] te cintayi.msu -- ``amhehi tathaagata.m pa.tijaggantehi anucchavika.m katvaa pa.tijaggitu.m va.t.tatii''ti sabbepi ekacittaa hutvaa dasasiilaani samaadaaya niraamagandhaa hutvaa satthu daanaggaparivahanake tayo purise .thapayi.msu. tesu eko dhanadha~n~nuppaadako ahosi, eko maapako, eko daanasa.mvidhaayako. tesu dhanadha~n~nuppaadako paccuppanne bimbisaaro mahaaraajaa jaato, maapako visaakho upaasako, daanasa.mvidhaayako ra.t.thapaalattheroti. so tattha yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devapure nibbatto. aya.m pana raahulatthero naama kassapadasabalassa kaale kikissa kaasira~n~no je.t.thaputto hutvaa nibbatti, pathavindharakumaarotissa naama.m aka.msu. tassa satta bhaginiyo ahesu.m. taa dasabalassa satta parive.naani kaarayi.msu. pathavindharo oparajja.m labhi. so taa bhaginiyo aaha -- ``tumhehi kaaritaparive.nesu mayhampi eka.m dethaa''ti. bhaatika, tumhe uparaaja.t.thaane .thitaa, tumhehi naama amhaaka.m daatabba.m, tumhe a~n~na.m parive.na.m karothaati. so taasa.m vacana.m sutvaa pa~nca vihaarasataani kaaresi. pa~nca parive.nasataaniitipi vadanti. so tattha yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devapure nibbatti. imasmi.m pana buddhuppaade pathavindharakumaaro amhaaka.m bodhisattassa ^a^M1.0202^ea^ aggamahesiyaa kucchismi.m pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, tassa sahaayako kurura.t.the thullako.t.thitanigame ra.t.thapaalase.t.thigehe nibbatti.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0199^ea^ amhaaka.m dasabalo abhisambodhi.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena kapilavatthu.m aagantvaa ^a^P1.0258^ea^ raahulakumaara.m pabbaajesi. tassa pabbajjaavidhaana.m paa.liya.m (mahaava0 105) aagatameva. eva.m pabbajitassa panassa satthaa abhi.nhaovaadavasena raahulovaadasutta.m abhaasi. raahulopi paatova vu.t.thaaya hatthena vaaluka.m ukkhipitvaa ``dasabalassa ceva aacariyupajjhaayaana~nca santikaa ajja ettaka.m ovaada.m labheyya''nti vadati. bhikkhusa"nghamajjhe kathaa udapaadi ``ovaadakkhamo vata raahulasaama.nero pitu anucchaviko putto''ti. satthaa bhikkhuuna.m cittaacaara.m ~natvaa ``mayi gate ekaa dhammadesanaa ca va.d.dhissati, raahulassa ca gu.no paaka.to bhavissatii''ti gantvaa dhammasabhaaya.m buddhaasaane nisinno bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti. raahulasaama.nerassa ovaadakkhamabhaava.m kathema bhagavaati. satthaa imasmi.m .thaane .thatvaa raahulassa gu.nadiipanattha.m migajaataka.m aaharitvaa kathesi --
[21] ``miga.m tipallatthamanekamaaya.m,
[27] a.t.thakkhura.m a.d.dharattaa papaayi.m.
[26] ekena sotena chamaa'ssasanto,
[22] chahi kalaahitibhoti bhaagineyyo''ti.. (jaa0 1.1.16).

[03] athassa sattavassikasaama.nerakaale ``maa heva kho raahulo daharabhaavena kii.lanatthaayapi sampajaanamusaa bhaaseyyaa''ti ambala.t.thiyaraahulovaada.m (ma0 ni0 2.107 aadayo) desesi. a.t.thaarasavassikasaama.nerakaale tathaagatassa pacchato pi.n.daaya pavisantassa satthu ceva attano ca ruupasampatti.m disvaa gehasita.m vitakka.m vitakkentassa ``ya.mki~nci, raahula, ruupa''ntiaadinaa ^a^P1.0259^ea^ nayena mahaaraahulovaadasuttanta.m (ma0 ni0 2.113) kathesi. sa.myuttake (sa.m0 ni0 4.121) pana raahulovaadopi a"nguttare (a0 ni0 4.177) raahulovaadopi therassa vipassanaacaaroyeva. athassa satthaa ~naa.naparipaaka.m ~natvaa avassikabhikkhukaale andhavane nisinno cuu.laraahulovaada.m (ma0 ni0 3.416 aadayo) kathesi. desanaapariyosaane raahulatthero ko.tisatasahassadevataahi saddhi.m arahatta.m paapu.ni, sotaapannasakadaagaamianaagaamidevataana.m ^a^M1.0203^ea^ ga.nanaa natthi. atha satthaa aparabhaage ariyasa"nghamajjhe nisinno thera.m imasmi.m saasane sikkhaakaamaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesi.

[03] satthari ^a^V1.0200^ea^ pana kurura.t.the caarikaaya nikkhamitvaa thullako.t.thita.m anuppatte ra.t.thapaalo kulaputto satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho maataapitaro anujaanaapetvaa dasabala.m upasa"nkamitvaa satthu aa.nattiyaa a~n~natarassa therassa santike pabbaji. tassa pabbajitadivasato pa.t.thaaya se.t.thigahapati bhikkhuu attano nivesanadvaarena gacchante disvaa ``ki.m tumhaaka.m imasmi.m gehe kamma.m, ekova puttako ahosi, ta.m ga.nhitvaa gatattha, idaani ki.m karissathaa''ti akkosati paribhaasati. satthaa addhamaasa.m thullako.t.thite vasitvaa puna saavatthimeva agamaasi. tatthaayasmaa ra.t.thapaalo yoniso manasikaronto kamma.m katvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. so satthaara.m anujaanaapetvaa maataapitaro dassanattha.m thullako.t.thita.m gantvaa tattha sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caranto pitu nivesane aabhidosika.m kummaasa.m labhitvaa ta.m amata.m viya paribhu~njanto pitaraa nimantito adhivaasetvaa dutiyadivase ^a^P1.0260^ea^ pitu nivesane pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa ala"nkatapa.tiyatte itthijane asubhasa~n~na.m uppaadetvaa .thitakova dhamma.m desetvaa jiyaa mutto viya naaraaco aakaasa.m uppatitvaa korabyara~n~no migaciira.m gantvaa ma"ngalasilaapa.t.te nisinno dassanatthaaya aagatassa ra~n~no catupaariju~n~napa.tima.n.dita.m dhamma.m (ma0 ni0 2.304) desetvaa anupubbena caarika.m caramaano puna satthu santika.myeva aagato. evameta.m vatthu samu.t.thita.m. atha satthaa aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m imasmi.m saasane saddhaapabbajitaana.m kulaputtaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana^eb^nti sabbapa.thama.m salaakagaahakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m ku.n.dadhaanatthero aggoti dasseti. so kira thero mahaasubhaddaaya nimantitadivase tathaagate ugganagara.m gacchante ``ajja satthaa duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m gamissati, puthujjanaa salaaka.m maa ga.nhantu, pa~ncasataa ^a^M1.0204^ea^ khii.naasavaava ga.nhantuu''ti vutte pa.thamameva siihanaada.m naditvaa salaaka.m ga.nhi. cuu.lasubhaddaaya nimantitadivase tathaagate saaketa.m gacchantepi pa~ncanna.m bhikkhusataana.m antare pa.thamameva salaaka.m ga.nhi, sunaaparantajanapada.m gacchantepi. imehi kaara.nehi thero pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana.m aggo naama jaato. ^b^ku.n.dadhaano^eb^ti panassa naama.m.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- aya.m kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe ^a^V1.0201^ea^ nibbatto vuttanayeneva vihaara.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa buddhaana.m adhikaarakamma.m ^a^P1.0261^ea^ katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa satthaaraa anantaraaya.m disvaa byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msaranto kassapabuddhakaale bhuuma.t.thakadevataa hutvaa nibbatti. diighaayukabuddhaana~nca naama na anvaddhamaasiko uposatho hoti. vipassiidasabalassa hi chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi, kassapadasabalo pana cha.t.the cha.t.the maase paatimokkha.m osaaresi. tassa paatimokkha.m osaara.nakaale disaavaasikaa dve sahaayakaa bhikkhuu ``uposatha.m karissaamaa''ti gacchanti. aya.m bhummadevataa cintesi -- ``imesa.m dvinna.m bhikkhuuna.m metti ativiya da.lhaa, ki.m nu kho bhedake sati bhijjeyya, na bhijjeyyaa''ti? tesa.m okaasa.m olokayamaanaa tesa.m aviduureneva gacchati.

[03] atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattaciivara.m datvaa sariirava.la~njanattha.m udakaphaasuka.t.thaana.m gantvaa dhotahatthapaado hutvaa gumbasabhaagato nikkhamati. bhummadevataa tassa therassa pacchato pacchato uttamaruupaa itthii hutvaa kese vidhunitvaa sa.mvidhaaya bandhantii viya pi.t.thito pa.msu.m pu~nchamaanaa viya saa.taka.m sa.mvidhaaya nivaasayamaanaa viya ca hutvaa therassa padaanupadikaa hutvaa gumbato nikkhantaa. ekamante .thito sahaayakatthero ima.m kaara.na.m disvaa domanassajaato ``na.t.tho daani me iminaa bhikkhunaa saddhi.m diigharattaanugato sineho. sacaaha.m eva.mvidhabhaava.m jaaneyya.m, ettaka.m addhaana.m iminaa saddhi.m vissaasa.m na kareyya''nti cintetvaa aagacchantassevassa ``handaavuso, tuyha.m pattaciivara.m, taadisena paapena sahaayena saddhi.m ekamagga.m na gacchaamii''ti aaha ^a^P1.0262^ea^. ta.m katha.m sutvaa tassa ^a^M1.0205^ea^ lajjibhikkhuno hadaya.m tikhi.nasatti.m gahetvaa viddha.m viya ahosi. tato na.m aaha -- ``aavuso, ki.m naameta.m vadasi, aha.m ettaka.m kaala.m dukka.tamattampi aapatti.m na jaanaami. tva.m pana ma.m ajja `paapo'ti vadasi, ki.m te di.t.tha''nti? ki.m a~n~nena di.t.thena, ki.m tva.m eva.mvidhena ala"nkatapa.tiyattena maatugaamena saddhi.m eka.t.thaane hutvaa nikkhantoti? nattheta.m, aavuso, mayha.m, naaha.m evaruupa.m maatugaama.m passaamiiti. tassa yaavatatiya.m kathentassaapi itaro thero katha.m asaddahitvaa attanaa di.t.thakaara.na.myeva attha.m gahetvaa tena saddhi.m ekamaggena agantvaa a~n~nena maggena satthu santika.m gato. itaropi a~n~nena maggena satthu santika.myeva gato.

[03] tato bhikkhusa"nghassa uposathaagaara.m pavisanavelaaya so bhikkhu ta.m bhikkhu.m uposathagge sa~njaanitvaa ^a^V1.0202^ea^ ``imasmi.m uposathagge evaruupo naama paapabhikkhu atthi, naaha.m tena saddhi.m uposatha.m karissaamii''ti nikkhamitvaa bahi a.t.thaasi. bhummadevataa ``bhaariya.m mayaa kamma.m kata''nti mahallakaupaasakava.n.nena tassa santika.m gantvaa ``kasmaa, bhante, ayyo imasmi.m .thaane .thito''ti aaha. upaasaka, ima.m uposathagga.m eko paapabhikkhu pavi.t.tho, aha.m tena saddhi.m uposatha.m na karomiiti vatvaa nikkhamitvaa bahi .thitomhiiti. bhante, maa eva.m ga.nhatha, parisuddhasiilo esa bhikkhu. tumhehi di.t.thamaatugaamo naama aha.m, mayaa tumhaaka.m viima.msanatthaaya ``da.lhaa nu kho imesa.m theraana.m metti, no da.lhaa''ti lajjialajjibhaava.m olokentena ta.m kamma.m katanti. ko pana tva.m sappurisaati? aha.m ekaa bhummadevataa, bhanteti. devaputto kathentova dibbaanubhaavena ^a^P1.0263^ea^ .thatvaa therassa paadesu patitvaa ``mayha.m, bhante, khamatha, eta.m dosa.m thero na jaanaati, uposatha.m karothaa''ti thera.m yaacitvaa uposathagga.m pavesesi. so thero uposatha.m taava eka.t.thaane akaasi, mittasanthavavasena na puna tena saddhi.m eka.t.thaane ahosiiti. imassa therassa kamma.m na kathiyati, cuditakatthero pana aparaapara.m vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] bhummadevataa tassa kammassa nissandena eka.m buddhantara.m apaayato na muccittha. sace pana kaalena kaala.m manussatta.m aagacchati, a~n~nena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati. so amhaaka.m bhagavato ^a^M1.0206^ea^ kaale saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti, dhaanamaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa mahallakakaale satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji, tassa upasampannadivasato pa.t.thaaya ekaa ala"nkatapa.tiyattaa itthii tasmi.m gaama.m pavisante saddhi.myeva gaama.m pavisati, nikkhamante nikkhamati. vihaara.m pavisantepi pavisati, ti.t.thantepi ti.t.thatiiti eva.m niccaanubandhaa pa~n~naayati. thero ta.m na passati, tassa pana purimassa kammassa nissandena saa a~n~nesa.m upa.t.thaati.

[03] gaame yaagubhikkha.m dadamaanaa itthiyo, ``bhante, aya.m eko yaaguu.lu"nko tumhaaka.m, eko imissaa amhaaka.m sahaayikaayaa''ti parihaasa.m karonti. therassa mahatii vihesaa hoti. vihaara.m gatampi na.m saama.neraa ceva daharabhikkhuu ca parivaaretvaa ``dhaano ko.n.do jaato''ti parihaasa.m karonti. athassa teneva kaara.nena ku.n.dadhaanattheroti naama.m jaata.m ^a^P1.0264^ea^. so u.t.thaaya samu.t.thaaya tehi kayiramaana.m ke.li.m sahitu.m asakkonto ummaada.m gahetvaa ``tumhe ko.n.daa, tumhaaka.m upajjhaayaa ko.n.daa ^a^V1.0203^ea^, aacariyaa ko.n.daa''ti vadati. atha na.m satthu aarocesu.m -- ``ku.n.dadhaano daharasaama.nerehi saddhi.m eva.m pharusavaaca.m vadatii''ti. satthaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa ``sacca.m bhikkhuu''ti pucchitvaa ``sacca.m bhagavaa''ti vutte ``kasmaa eva.m vadesii''ti aaha. bhante, nibaddha.m vihesa.m asahanto eva.m kathemiiti. ``tva.m pubbe katakamma.m yaavajjadivasaa jiiraapetu.m na sakkosi, puna evaruupa.m pharusa.m maa vada bhikkhuu''ti vatvaa aaha --
[21] ``maavoca pharusa.m ka~nci, vuttaa pa.tivadeyyu ta.m.
[22] dukkhaa hi saarambhakathaa, pa.tida.n.daa phuseyyu ta.m..
[21] ``sace neresi attaana.m, ka.mso upahato yathaa.
[22] esa pattosi nibbaana.m, saarambho te na vijjatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 133-134).

[03] ima~nca pana tassa therassa maatugaamena saddhi.m vicara.nabhaava.m kosalara~n~nopi kathayi.msu. raajaa ``gacchatha, bha.ne, viima.msathaa''ti pesetvaa sayampi mandeneva parivaarena saddhi.m therassa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa ekamante olokento a.t.thaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne thero suucikamma.m karonto nisinno hoti, saapissa itthii aviduure .thaane .thitaa viya pa~n~naayati.

[03] raajaa ^a^M1.0207^ea^ ta.m disvaa ``atthida.m kaara.na''nti tassaa .thita.t.thaana.m agamaasi. saa tasmi.m aagacchante therassa vasanapa.n.nasaala.m pavi.t.thaa viya ahosi. raajaapi ^a^P1.0265^ea^ taaya saddhi.myeva pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa sabbattha olokento adisvaa ``naaya.m maatugaamo, therassa eko kammavipaako''ti sa~n~na.m katvaa pa.thama.m therassa samiipena gacchantopi thera.m avanditvaa tassa kaara.nassa abhuutabhaava.m ~natvaa aagamma thera.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisinno ``kacci, bhante, pi.n.dakena na kilamathaa''ti pucchi. thero ``va.t.tati mahaaraajaa''ti aaha. ``jaanaami, bhante, ayyassa katha.m, evaruupena ca parikkilesena saddhi.m carantaana.m tumhaaka.m ke naama pasiidissanti, ito pa.t.thaaya vo katthaci gamanakicca.m natthi, aha.m catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahissaami, tumhe yonisomanasikaare maa pamajjitthaa''ti nibaddha.m bhikkha.m pa.t.thapesi. thero raajaana.m upatthambhaka.m labhitvaa ^a^V1.0204^ea^ bhojanasappaayena ekaggacitto hutvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tato pa.t.thaaya saa itthii antaradhaayi.

[03] mahaasubhaddaa ugganagare micchaadi.t.thikule vasamaanaa ``satthaa ma.m anukampatuu''ti uposatha.m adhi.t.thaaya niraamagandhaa hutvaa uparipaasaadatale .thitaa ``imaani pupphaani antare a.t.thatvaa dasabalassa matthake vitaana.m hutvaa ti.t.thantu, dasabalo imaaya sa~n~naaya sve pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhatuu''ti saccakiriya.m katvaa a.t.tha sumanapupphamu.t.thiyo vissajjesi. pupphaani gantvaa dhammadesanaavelaaya satthu matthake vitaana.m hutvaa a.t.tha.msu. satthaa ta.m sumanapupphavitaana.m disvaa citteneva subhaddaaya bhikkha.m adhivaasetvaa punadivase aru.ne u.t.thite aanandatthera.m aaha -- ``aananda, maya.m ajja duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m gamissaama, puthujjanaana.m adatvaa ariyaana.myeva salaaka.m dehii''ti. thero bhikkhuuna.m ^a^P1.0266^ea^ aarocesi -- ``aavuso, satthaa ajja duura.m bhikkhaacaara.m gamissati, puthujjanaa maa ga.nhantu, ariyaava salaaka.m ga.nhantuu''ti. ku.n.dadhaanatthero ``aaharaavuso, salaaka''nti pa.thama.myeva hattha.m pasaaresi. aanandaa ``satthaa taadisaana.m bhikkhuuna.m salaaka.m na daapeti, ariyaana.myeva daapetii''ti vitakka.m uppaadetvaa gantvaa satthu aarocesi. satthaa ``aaharaapentassa salaaka.m dehii''ti aaha. thero cintesi -- ``sace ku.n.dadhaanassa salaakaa daatu.m na ^a^M1.0208^ea^ yuttaa assa, atha satthaa pa.tibaaheyya, bhavissati eka.m kaara.na''nti. ``ku.n.dadhaanassa salaaka.m dassaamii''ti gamana.m abhiniihari. ku.n.dadhaanatthero tassa pure aagamanaava abhi~n~naapaadaka.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa iddhiyaa aakaase .thatvaa ``aaharaavuso aananda, satthaa ma.m jaanaati, maadisa.m bhikkhu.m pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhanta.m na satthaa vaaretii''ti hattha.m pasaaretvaa salaaka.m ga.nhi. satthaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m imasmi.m saasane pa.thama.m salaaka.m ga.nhantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^pa.tibhaanavantaana^eb^nti sampannapa.tibhaanaana.m va"ngiisatthero aggoti dasseti. aya.m kira thero dasabalassa santika.m upasa"nkamanto cakkhupathato pa.t.thaaya candena saddhi.m upametvaa, suuriyena, aakaasena, mahaasamuddena, hatthinaagena, siihena migara~n~naa saddhi.m upametvaapi anekehi padasatehi ^a^V1.0205^ea^ padasahassehi satthu va.n.na.m vadantoyeva upasa"nkamati. tasmaa pa.tibhaanavantaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa purimanayeneva vihaara.m ^a^P1.0267^ea^ gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tibhaanavantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ``ahampi anaagate pa.tibhaanavantaana.m aggo bhaveyya''nti patthana.m katvaa satthaaraa byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. va"ngiisamaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhanto aacariya.m aaraadhetvaa chavasiisamanta.m naama sikkhitvaa chavasiisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m satto asukayoniya.m naama nibbatto''ti jaanaati.

[03] braahma.naa ``aya.m amhaaka.m jiivikamaggo''ti ~natvaa va"ngiisamaa.nava.m pa.ticchannayaane nisiidaapetvaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo carantaa nagaradvaare vaa nigamadvaare vaa .thapetvaa mahaajanassa raasibhuutabhaava.m ~natvaa ``yo va"ngiisa.m passati, so dhana.m vaa labhati, yasa.m vaa labhati, sagga.m vaa gacchatii''ti vadanti. tesa.m katha.m sutvaa bahuu janaa la~nja.m datvaa passitukaamaa honti. raajaraajamahaamattaa ^a^M1.0209^ea^ tesa.m santika.m gantvaa ``ko aacariyassa jaanaviseso''ti pucchanti. tumhe na jaanaatha, sakalajambudiipe amhaaka.m aacariyasadiso a~n~no pa.n.dito naama natthi, tivassamatthake matakaana.m siisa.m aaharaapetvaa nakhena aako.tetvaa ``aya.m satto asukayoniya.m nibbatto''ti jaanaati. va"ngiisopi mahaajanassa ka"nkhachedanattha.m te te jane aavaahetvaa attano attano gati.m kathaapeti. ta.m nissaaya mahaajanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhati.

[03] braahma.naa va"ngiisamaa.nava.m aadaaya yathaaruci.m vicaritvaa puna saavatthi.m aagama.msu. va"ngiiso jetavanamahaavihaarassa aviduura.t.thaane .thito cintesi -- ``sama.no gotamo pa.n.ditoti vadanti, na kho pana sabbakaala.m mayaa imesa.myeva vacana.m karontena caritu.m ^a^P1.0268^ea^ va.t.tati, pa.n.ditaanampi santika.m gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti. so braahma.ne aaha -- ``tumhe gacchatha, aha.m na bahukehi saddhi.m gantvaa sama.na.m gotama.m passissaamii''ti. te aaha.msu -- ``va"ngiisa, maa te rucci sama.na.m gotama.m passitu.m ^a^V1.0206^ea^. yo hi na.m passati, ta.m so maayaaya aava.t.tetii''ti. va"ngiiso tesa.m katha.m anaadiyitvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa madhurapa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] atha na.m satthaa pucchi -- ``va"ngiisa, ki~nci sippa.m jaanaasii''ti. aama, bho gotama, chavasiisamanta.m naameka.m jaanaamiiti. ki.m so manto karotiiti? tivassamatthake mataanampi ta.m manta.m jappitvaa siisa.m nakhena aako.tetvaa nibbatta.t.thaana.m jaanaamiiti. satthaa tassa eka.m niraye uppannassa siisa.m dassesi, eka.m manussesu uppannassa, eka.m devesu, eka.m parinibbutassa siisa.m dassesi. so pa.thama.m siisa.m aako.tetvaa, ``bho gotama, aya.m satto niraya.m gato''ti aaha. saadhu saadhu, va"ngiisa, sudi.t.tha.m tayaa, aya.m satto kaha.m gatoti pucchi. manussaloka.m, bho gotamaati. aya.m satto kaha.m gatoti? devaloka.m, bho gotamaati ti.n.nampi gata.t.thaana.m kathesi. parinibbutassa pana siisa.m nakhena aako.tento neva anta.m na ko.ti.m passati. atha na.m satthaa ``na sakkosi tva.m, va"ngiisaa''ti pucchi. ``passatha, bho gotama, upaparikkhaami taavaa''ti punappuna.m parivatteti. baahirakamantena khii.naasavassa gati.m katha.m jaanissati, athassa matthakato sedo mucci. so lajjitvaa tu.nhiibhuuto a.t.thaasi. atha na.m satthaa ^a^M1.0210^ea^ ``kilamasi, va"ngiisaa''ti aaha. aama, bho gotama, imassa sattassa gata.t.thaana.m jaanitu.m na sakkomi. sace tumhe jaanaatha, kathethaati. ``va"ngiisa, aha.m etampi jaanaami ito uttaritarampii''ti vatvaa dhammapade imaa dve gaathaa abhaasi --
[21] ``cuti.m yo vedi sattaana.m, upapatti.m ca sabbaso.
[22] asatta.m sugata.m buddha.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na.m..
[21] ``yassa ^a^P1.0269^ea^ gati.m na jaananti, devaa gandhabbamaanusaa.
[22] khii.naasava.m arahanta.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. (dha0 pa0 419-420).

[03] tato va"ngiiso aaha -- ``bho gotama, vijjaaya vijja.m dentassa naama parihaani natthi, aha.m attanaa jaananaka.m manta.m tumhaaka.m dassaami, tumhe eta.m manta.m mayha.m dethaa''ti. va"ngiisa, na maya.m mantena manta.m dema, evameva demaati. ``saadhu, bho gotama, detha me manta''nti apaciti.m dassetvaa hatthakacchapaka.m katvaa nisiidi. ki.m, va"ngiisa, tumhaaka.m samaye mahagghamanta.m vaa ^a^V1.0207^ea^ ki~nci vaa ga.nhantaana.m parivaaso naama na hotiiti? hoti, bho gotamaati. amhaaka.m pana manto nipparivaasoti sa~n~na.m karosiiti? braahma.naa naama mantehi atittaa honti, tasmaa so bhagavanta.m aaha -- ``bho gotama, tumhehi kathitaniyaama.m karissaamii''ti. bhagavaa aaha -- ``va"ngiisa, maya.m ima.m manta.m dentaa amhehi samaanali"ngassa demaa''ti. va"ngiiso ``ya.mki~nci katvaa mayaa ima.m manta.m ga.nhitvaa gantu.m va.t.tatii''ti braahma.ne aaha. tumhe mayi pabbajante maa cintayittha, aha.m ima.m manta.m ga.nhitvaa sakalajambudiipe je.t.thako bhavissaami. eva.m sante tumhaakampi bhaddaka.m bhavissatii''ti mantatthaaya satthu santike pabbaji. satthaa ``mantaparivaasa.m taava vasaahii''ti dvatti.msaakaara.m aacikkhi. pa~n~navaa satto dvatti.msaakaara.m sajjhaayantova tattha khayavaya.m pa.t.thapetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni ^a^P1.0270^ea^.

[03] tasmi.m arahatta.m patte braahma.naa ``kaa nu kho va"ngiisassa pavatti, passissaama na''nti tassa santika.m gantvaa ``ki.m, bho va"ngiisa, sama.nassa gotamassa santike sippa.m sikkhita''nti pucchi.msu. aama, sikkhitanti. tena hi ^a^M1.0211^ea^ ehi gamissaamaati. gacchatha tumhe, tumhehi saddhi.m gantabbakicca.m mayha.m ni.t.thitanti. pa.thamameva amhehi tuyha.m kathita.m ``sama.no gotamo attaana.m passitu.m aagate maayaaya aava.t.tetii''ti. tva.m hi idaani sama.nassa gotamassa vasa.m aapanno, ki.m maya.m tava santike karissaamaati aagatamaggeneva pakkami.msu. va"ngiisattheropi ya.m ya.m vela.m dasabala.m passitu.m gacchati, eka.m thuti.m karontova gacchati. tena ta.m satthaa sa"nghamajjhe nisinno pa.tibhaanavantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ pa~ncame ^b^samantapaasaadikaana^eb^nti sabbapaasaadikaana.m. ^b^upaseno^eb^ti tassa therassa naama.m. va"ngantabraahma.nassa pana so putto, tasmaa ^b^va"ngantaputto^eb^ti vuccati. aya.m pana thero na kevala.m attanaava paasaadiko, parisaapissa paasaadikaa, iti parisa.m nissaaya laddhanaamavasena samantapaasaadikaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] pa~nhakamme panassa ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto vaya.m aagamma purimanayeneva satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.namaano satthaara.m eka.m ^a^V1.0208^ea^ bhikkhu.m samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa satthu adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade naalakabraahma.nagaame saaribraahma.niyaa kucchismi.m ^a^P1.0271^ea^ pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, upasenadaarakotissa naama.m aka.msu.

[03] so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa dasabalassa santike dhamma.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so upasampadaaya ekavassiko hutvaa ``ariyagabbha.m va.d.dhemii''ti eka.m kulaputta.m attano santike pabbaajetvaa upasampaadesi. so pavaaretvaa saddhivihaarikassa ekavassikakaale attanaa duvasso ``dasabalo ma.m passitvaa tusissatii''ti saddhivihaarika.m aadaaya dasabala.m passitu.m aagato. satthaa ta.m vanditvaa ekamante nisinna.m pucchi -- ``kativassosi tva.m bhikkhuu''ti? duvasso aha.m bhagavaati. aya.m pana bhikkhu kativassoti? ekavasso bhagavaati. kintaaya.m bhikkhu hotiiti? saddhivihaariko me bhagavaati. atha na.m satthaa ``atilahu.m kho ^a^M1.0212^ea^ tva.m, moghapurisa, baahullaaya aavatto''ti vatvaa anekapariyaayena vigarahi. thero satthu santikaa garaha.m labhitvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa ``iminaava pu.n.nacandasassirikena mukhena satthaara.m parisameva nissaaya saadhukaara.m daapessaamii''ti ta.mdivaseyeva eka.m .thaana.m gantvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m katvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] tato yasmaa thero mahaakulato nikkhamitvaa pabbajito pathavighu.t.thadhammakathikova, tasmaa tassa dhammakathaaya ceva pasiiditvaa mittaamacca~naatikulehi ca nikkhamitvaa bahuu kuladaarakaa therassa santike pabbajanti. ``aha.m aara~n~nako, tumhepi aara~n~nakaa bhavitu.m sakkontaa pabbajathaa''ti terasa dhuta"ngaani aacikkhitvaa ``sakkhissaama, bhante''ti vadante pabbaajeti. te attano balena ta.m ta.m dhuta"nga.m adhi.t.thahanti. thero attano dasavassakaale vinaya.m pagu.na.m katvaa ^a^P1.0272^ea^ sabbeva upasampaadesi. eva.m upasampannaa cassa pa~ncasatamattaa bhikkhuu parivaaraa ahesu.m.

[03] tasmi.m samaye satthaa jetavanamahaavihaare vasanto ``icchaamaha.m, bhikkhave, addhamaasa.m pa.tisalliiyitu''nti bhikkhusa"nghassa aarocetvaa ekavihaarii hoti. bhikkhusa"nghopi ``yo bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, so paacittiya.m desaapetabbo''ti katika.m akaasi. tadaa upasenatthero ``bhagavanta.m passissaamii''ti attano parisaaya saddhi.m jetavana.m gantvaa satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. satthaa kathaasamu.t.thaapanattha.m a~n~natara.m therassa saddhivihaarika.m ^a^V1.0209^ea^ aamantesi -- ``manaapaani te bhikkhu pa.msukuulaanii''ti. ``na kho me, bhante, manaapaani pa.msukuulaanii''ti vatvaa upajjhaaye gaaravena pa.msukuulikabhaava.m aarocesi. imasmi.m .thaane satthaa ``saadhu saadhu, upasenaa''ti therassa saadhukaara.m datvaa anekapariyaayena gu.nakatha.m kathesi. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaarato pana ida.m vatthu paa.liya.m (paaraa0 565) aagatameva. atha satthaa aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno imasmi.m saasane thera.m samantapaasaadikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ cha.t.the ^a^M1.0213^ea^ ^b^senaasanapa~n~naapakaana^eb^nti senaasana.m pa~n~naapentaana.m. therassa kira senaasanapa~n~naapanakaale a.t.thaarasasu mahaavihaaresu asamma.t.tha.m parive.na.m vaa apa.tijaggita.m senaasana.m vaa asodhita.m ma~ncapii.tha.m vaa anupa.t.thita.m paaniiyaparibhojaniiya.m vaa naahosi. tasmaa senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m aggo naama jaato. ^b^dabbo^eb^tissa naama.m. mallaraajakule pana uppannattaa ^b^mallaputto^eb^ naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- aya~nhi ^a^P1.0273^ea^ padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbattitvaa vayappatto vuttanayeneva vihaara.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa satthaaraa byaakato yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa kassapadasabalassa saasanassa osakkanakaale pabbaji, tadaa tena saddhi.m apare cha janaati satta bhikkhuu ekacittaa hutvaa a~n~ne saasane agaarava.m karonte disvaa ``idha ki.m karoma, ekamante sama.nadhamma.m katvaa dukkhassanta.m karissaamaa''ti nisse.ni.m bandhitvaa uccapabbatasikhara.m abhiruhitvaa ``attano cittabala.m jaanantaa nisse.ni.m paatentu, jiivite saalayaa otarantu, maa pacchaanutaapino ahuvatthaa''ti vatvaa sabbe ekacittaa hutvaa nisse.ni.m paatetvaa ``appamattaa hotha, aavuso''ti a~n~nama~n~na.m ovaditvaa cittaruciyesu .thaanesu nisiiditvaa sama.nadhamma.m kaatu.m aarabhi.msu.

[03] tatreko thero pa~ncame divase arahatta.m patvaa ``mama kicca.m nipphanna.m, aha.m imasmi.m .thaane ki.m karissaamii''ti iddhiyaa uttarakuruto pi.n.dapaata.m aaharitvaa, ``aavuso, ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njatha ^a^V1.0210^ea^, bhikkhaacaarakicca.m mamaayatta.m hotu, tumhe attano kamma.m karothaa''ti aaha. ki.m nu kho maya.m, aavuso, nisse.ni.m paatentaa eva.m avocumhaa ``yo pa.thama.m dhamma.m sacchikaroti, so bhikkha.m aaharatu, tena aabhata.m sesaa paribhu~njitvaa sama.nadhamma.m karissantii''ti. natthi, aavusoti. tumhe attano pubbahetunaa labhittha, mayampi sakkontaa va.t.tassanta.m karissaama, gacchatha tumheti ^a^M1.0214^ea^. thero te sa~n~naapetu.m asakkonto phaasuka.t.thaane pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa gato. aparo thero sattame divase anaagaamiphala.m patvaa tato cuto suddhaavaasabrahmaloke nibbatto.

[03] itarepi theraa ^a^P1.0274^ea^ tato cutaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade tesu tesu kulesu nibbattaa. eko gandhaarara.t.the takkasilanagare raajagehe nibbatto, eko pabbateyyara.t.the paribbaajikaaya kucchimhi nibbatto, eko baahiyara.t.the ku.tumbikagehe nibbatto, eko raajagahe ku.tumbikagehe nibbatto. aya.m pana dabbatthero mallara.t.the anupiyanagare ekassa mallara~n~no gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa maataa upavija~n~nakaale kaalamakaasi, matasariira.m susaana.m netvaa daarucitaka.m aaropetvaa aggi.m ada.msu. tassaa aggivegasantatta.m udarapa.tala.m dvedhaa ahosi. daarako attano pu~n~nabalena uppatitvaa ekasmi.m dabbatthambhe nipati. ta.m daaraka.m gahetvaa ayyikaaya ada.msu. saa tassa naama.m ga.nhantii dabbatthambhe nipatitvaa laddhajiivitattaa dabbotissa naama.m akaasi.

[03] tassa sattavassikakaale satthaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro mallara.t.the caarika.m caramaano anupiyanigama.m patvaa anupiyambavane viharati. dabbakumaaro satthaara.m disvaa dassaneneva pasiiditvaa pabbajitukaamo hutvaa ``aha.m dasabalassa santike pabbajissaamii''ti ayyika.m aapucchi. saa ``saadhu, taataa''ti dabbakumaara.m aadaaya satthu santika.m gantvaa, ``bhante, ima.m kumaara.m pabbaajethaa''ti aaha. satthaa a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno sa~n~na.m adaasi ``bhikkhu ima.m daaraka.m pabbaajehii''ti. so thero satthu vacana.m sutvaa dabbakumaara.m pabbaajento tacapa~ncaka.m kamma.t.thaana.m aacikkhi. pubbahetusampanno kataabhiniihaaro satto pa.thamakesava.t.tiyaa oropiyamaanaaya sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaasi, dutiyakesava.t.tiyaa ^a^P1.0275^ea^ oropiyamaanaaya sakadaagaamiphale, tatiyaaya anaagaamiphale. sabbakesaana.m pana oropana~nca arahattaphalasacchikiriyaa ca apacchaa apure ahosi.

[03] satthaa ^a^V1.0211^ea^ mallara.t.the yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa raajagaha.m gantvaa ve.luvane vaasa.m kappesi. tatraayasmaa dabbo mallaputto rahogato attano kiccanipphatti.m ^a^M1.0215^ea^ oloketvaa sa"nghassa veyyaavaccakara.ne kaaya.m yojetukaamo cintesi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m sa"nghassa senaasana~nca pa~n~naapeyya.m, bhattaani ca uddiseyya''nti. so satthu santika.m gantvaa attano parivitakka.m aarocesi. satthaa tassa saadhukaara.m datvaa senaasanapa~n~naapakatta~nca bhattuddesakatta~nca sampa.ticchi. atha na.m ``aya.m dabbo daharova samaano mahanta.t.thaane .thito''ti sattavassikakaaleyeva upasampaadesi. thero upasampannakaalatoyeva pa.t.thaaya raajagaha.m upanissaaya viharantaana.m sabbabhikkhuuna.m senaasanaani ca pa~n~naapeti, bhikkha~nca sampa.ticchitvaa uddisati. tassa senaasanapa~n~naapakabhaavo sabbadisaasu paaka.to ahosi -- ``dabbo kira mallaputto sabhaagasabhaagaana.m bhikkhuuna.m eka.t.thaane senaasanaani pa~n~naapeti, duurepi senaasana.m pa~n~naapetiyeva. gantu.m asakkonte iddhiyaa netiiti.

[03] atha na.m bhikkhuu kaalepi vikaalepi ``amhaaka.m, aavuso, jiivakambavane senaasana.m pa~n~naapehi, amhaaka.m maddakucchismi.m migadaaye''ti eva.m senaasana.m uddisaapetvaa tassa iddhi.m passantaa gacchanti. sopi iddhiyaa manomaye kaaye abhisa"nkharitvaa ekekassa therassa ekeka.m attanaa sadisa.m bhikkhu.m nimminitvaa a"nguliyaa jalamaanaaya purato purato gantvaa ``aya.m ma~nco, ida.m pii.tha''ntiaadiini vatvaa senaasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa puna attano vasana.t.thaanameva ^a^P1.0276^ea^ aagacchati. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaarato panida.m vatthu paa.liya.m aagatameva. satthaa idameva kaara.na.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa aparabhaage ariyaga.namajjhe nisinno thera.m senaasanapa~n~naapakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^devataana.m piyamanaapaana^eb^nti devataana.m piyaana~nceva manaapaana~nca pilindavacchatthero aggoti dasseti. so kira anuppanne buddhe cakkavattii raajaa hutvaa mahaajana.m pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa saggaparaaya.na.m akaasi. yebhuyyena kira chasu kaamasaggesu nibbattadevataa tasseva ovaada.m labhitvaa nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane attano sampatti.m oloketvaa ``ka.m nu kho nissaaya ima.m saggasampatti.m labhimhaa''ti aavajjamaanaa ^a^M1.0216^ea^ ima.m thera.m disvaa ``thera.m nissaaya amhehi sampati laddhaa''ti saaya.mpaata.m thera.m namassanti. tasmaa so devataana.m ^a^V1.0212^ea^ piyamanaapaana.m aggo naama jaato. ^b^pilindo^eb^ti panassa gotta.m, ^b^vaccho^eb^ti naama.m. tadubhaya.m sa.msandetvaa pilindavacchoti vuccati.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- aya.m kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto purimanayeneva satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m devataana.m piyamanaapa.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti. pilindavacchotissa naama.m aka.msu. so aparena samayena satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa upasampanno vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m ^a^P1.0277^ea^ paapu.ni. so gihiihipi bhikkhuuhipi saddhi.m kathento ``ehi, vasala, gaccha, vasala, aahara, vasala, ga.nha, vasalaa''ti vasalavaadeneva samudaacarati. ta.m katha.m aaharitvaa tathaagata.m pucchi.msu -- ``bhagavaa ariyaa naama pharusavaacaa na hontii''ti. bhikkhave, ariyaana.m paravambhanavasena pharusavaacaa naama natthi, apica kho pana bhavantare aaci.n.navasena bhaveyyaati. bhante, pilindavacchatthero u.t.thaaya samu.t.thaaya gihiihipi bhikkhuuhipi saddhi.m kathento, ``vasala, vasalaa''ti katheti, kimettha kaara.na.m bhagavaati. bhikkhave, na mayha.m puttassa eta.m idaaneva aaci.n.na.m, atiite panesa pa~nca jaatisataani vasalavaadibraahma.nakule nibbatti. iccesa bhavaaci.n.neneva kathesi, na pharusavasena. ariyaana~nhi vohaaro pharusopi samaano cetanaaya apharusabhaavena parisuddhova, appamattakampettha paapa.m na upalabbhatiiti vatvaa dhammapade ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``akakkasa.m vi~n~naapani.m, gira.m saccamudiiraye.
[22] yaaya naabhisaje ka~nci, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti..

[03] athekadivasa.m thero raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya pavisanto eka.m purisa.m pippaliina.m bhaajana.m puuretvaa aadaaya antonagara.m pavisanta.m disvaa ``ki.m te, vasala, bhaajane''ti aaha. so cintesi -- ``aya.m sama.no mayaa saddhi.m paatova pharusakatha.m kathesi, imassa anucchavikameva vattu.m va.t.tatii''ti ``muusikavacca.m ^a^M1.0217^ea^ me, bhante, bhaajane''ti ^a^P1.0278^ea^ aaha. eva.m bhavissati, vasalaati. tassa therassa dassana.m vijahantassa sabba.m muusikavaccameva ahosi. so cintesi -- ``imaa pippaliyo muusikavaccasadisaa pa~n~naayanti, sabhaavo nu kho no''ti viima.msanto hatthena uppii.lesi ^a^V1.0213^ea^. athassa unduuravaccabhaava.m ~natvaa balavadomanassa.m uppajji. so ``imaayeva nu kho evaruupaa, udaahu saka.tepii''ti gantvaa olokento sabbaapi pippaliyo taadisaava disvaa hadaya.m hatthena sandhaaretvaa ``ida.m na a~n~nassa kamma.m, mayaa paatova di.t.thabhikkhusseta.m kamma.m, addhaa eka.m upaaya.m bhavissati, tassa gata.t.thaana.m anuvicinitvaa eta.m kaara.na.m jaanissaamii''ti therassa gatamagga.m pucchitvaa paayaasi.

[03] atheko puriso ta.m ativiya ca.n.dikata.m gacchanta.m disvaa, ``bho purisa, tva.m ativiya ca.n.dikatova gacchasi, kena kammena gacchasii''ti pucchi. so tassa ta.m pavatti.m aarocesi. so tassa katha.m sutvaa evamaaha -- ``bho, maa cintayi, mayha.m ayyo pilindavaccho bhavissati, tva.m etadeva bhaajana.m puuretvaa aadaaya gantvaa therassa purato ti.t.tha. `ki.m naameta.m, vasalaa'ti vuttakaale ca `pippaliyo, bhante'ti vada, thero `eva.m bhavissati, vasalaa'ti vakkhati. puna sabbaapi pippaliyo bhavissantii''ti. so tathaa akaasi. sabbaa pippaliyo pa.tipaakatikaa ahesu.m. idamettaka.m vatthu. aparabhaage pana satthaa devataana.m piyamanaapakaara.nameva vatthu.m katvaa thera.m devataana.m piyamanaapaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ a.t.thame ^a^P1.0279^ea^ ^b^khippaabhi~n~naana^eb^nti khippa.m adhigataabhi~n~naana.m daaruciiriyatthero aggoti dasseti. aya~nhi thero sa.mkhittadhammadesanaapariyosaane arahatta.m paapu.ni, maggaphalaana.m parikammakicca.m naahosi. tasmaa khippaabhi~n~naana.m aggo naama jaato. baahiyara.t.the pana jaatattaa ^b^baahiyo^eb^tissa naama.m ahosi. so aparabhaage daaruciira.m nivaasesi. tasmaa ^b^daaruciiriyo^eb^ naama jaato.

[03] tassa ^a^M1.0218^ea^ pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto dasabalassa dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m khippaabhi~n~naana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapadasabalassa saasanassa osakkanakaale he.t.thaa vuttehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sama.nadhamma.m katvaa paripu.n.nasiilo jiivitakkhaya.m patvaa devaloke nibbatti.

[03] so ^a^V1.0214^ea^ eka.m buddhantara.m devaloke vasitvaa imasmi.m buddhuppaade baahiyara.t.the kulagehe nibbatto. vaya.m aagamma gharaavaasa.m vasanto ``vohaara.m karissaamii''ti suva.n.nabhuumigamaniiya.m naava.m abhiruhi. naavaa icchita.m desa.m appatvaava samuddamajjhe bhinnaa, mahaajano macchakacchapabhakkho ahosi. aya.m pana eka.m daarukha.n.da.m gahetvaa sattame divase suppaarakapa.t.tane utti.n.no manussaavaasa.m patvaa ``acelakaniyaamena manusse upasa"nkamitu.m ^a^P1.0280^ea^ ayutta''nti aviduure .thaane eka.m mahaata.laakaa sevaala.m gahetvaa sariira.m ve.thetvaa ekasmi.m .thaane patita.m eka.m kapaala.m aadaaya bhikkhaaya paavisi.

[03] manussaa ta.m disvaa cintesu.m -- ``sace loke arahantaa naama atthi, eva.mvidhehi bhavitabba.m. ki.m nu kho ayyo ukka.t.thabhaavena vattha.m na ga.nhaati, udaahu diyyamaana.m ga.nheyyaa''ti viima.msantaa naanaadisaahi vatthaani aahari.msu. so cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m na iminaa niyaamena aagamissa.m, na me ete pasiideyyu.m, ya.mki~nci katvaa ime va~ncetvaa jiivikupaaya.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti vatthaani na pa.tigga.nhi. manussaa bhiyyosomattaaya pasannaa mahaasakkaara.m kari.msu. sopi bhattakicca.m katvaa aviduura.t.thaane devakula.m gato. mahaajano tena saddhi.myeva gantvaa devakula.m pa.tijaggitvaa adaasi. so cintesi -- ``ime mayha.m sevaale nivaasanamatte pasiiditvaa eva.mvidha.m sakkaara.m karonti, etesa.m mayaa ukka.t.theneva bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti sallahukaani rukkhaphalakaani gahetvaa tacchetvaa vaakesu aavu.nitvaa ciira.m katvaa nivaasetvaa paarupitvaa jiivika.m kappento vasi.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0219^ea^ yo so kassapabuddhakaale sattasu janesu sama.nadhamma.m karontesu eko bhikkhu suddhaavaasabrahmaloke nibbatto. so nibbattasamanantarameva attano brahmasampatti.m oloketvaa aagata.t.thaana.m aavajjento sattanna.m janaana.m pabbata.m aaruyha sama.nadhammakara.na.t.thaana.m disvaa sesaana.m channa.m nibbatta.t.thaana.m aavajjento ekassa parinibbutabhaava.m itaresa.m pa~ncanna.m kaamaavacaradevaloke nibbattabhaava.m ~natvaa kaalaanukaala.m te pa~nca jane aavajjeti ^a^P1.0281^ea^. imasmi.m pana kaale ``kaha.m nu kho''ti aavajjento daaruciiriya.m suppaarakapa.t.tana.m upanissaaya kuhanakammena jiivika.m kappenta.m disvaa ``na.t.tho vataaya.m baalo, pubbe sama.nadhamma.m karonto atiukka.t.thabhaavena arahataapi aabhata.m pi.n.dapaata.m aparibhu~njitvaa idaani udaratthaaya anarahaava arahatta.m pa.tijaanitvaa loka.m va~ncento vicarati, dasabalassa ca nibbattabhaava.m na jaanaati, gacchaami na.m sa.mvejetvaa dasabalassa ^a^V1.0215^ea^ nibbattabhaava.m jaanaapemii''ti ta.mkha.na.myeva brahmalokato suppaarakapa.t.tane rattibhaagasamanantare daaruciiriyassa sammukhe paaturahosi.

[03] so attano vasana.t.thaane obhaasa.m disvaa bahi nikkhamitvaa .thito mahaabrahma.m oloketvaa a~njali.m paggayha ``ke tumhe''ti pucchi. aha.m tuyha.m poraa.nakasahaayo anaagaamiphala.m patvaa brahmaloke nibbatto. amhaaka.m pana sabbaje.t.thako arahatta.m patvaa parinibbuto, tumhe pa~nca janaa devaloke nibbattaa. svaaha.m ta.m imasmi.m .thaane kuhanakammena jiivanta.m disvaa dametu.m aagatoti vatvaa ida.m kaara.namaaha -- ``na kho tva.m, baahiya arahaa, napi arahattamagga.m samaapanno, saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi, yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti. athassa satthu uppannabhaava.m saavatthiya.m vasanabhaava~nca aacikkhitvaa ``satthu santika.m gacchaahii''ti ta.m uyyojetvaa brahmalokameva agamaasi.

[03] daaruciiriyo mahaabrahmunaa sa.mvejito ``mokkhamagga.m gavesissaamii''ti ^a^P1.0282^ea^ viisayojanasata.m magga.m ekarattivaasena gantvaa satthaara.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.tha.m antaraghare sampaapu.nitvaa satthu paadesu nipatitvaa ``desetu me, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu sugato dhamma''nti yaavatatiya.m yaaci. satthaa ``ettaavataa baahiyassa ~naa.na.m paripaaka.m gata''nti ~natvaa ``tasmaatiha te, baahiya, eva.m sikkhitabba.m di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissatii''ti (udaa0 10) iminaa ovaadena ovadi ^a^M1.0220^ea^. sopi desanaapariyosaane antaraviithiya.m .thitova desanaanusaarena ~naa.na.m pesetvaa saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] so attano kicca.m matthakappatta.m ~natvaa bhagavanta.m pabbajja.m yaacitvaa aparipu.n.napattaciivarataaya pattaciivara.m pariyesanto sa"nkaara.t.thaanato co.lakkha.n.daani sa.mka.d.dhati. atha na.m pubbaveriko amanusso ekissaa taru.navacchaaya gaaviyaa sariire adhimuccitvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapesi. satthaa saavatthito nikkhamanto antaraviithiya.m baahiya.m sa"nkaara.t.thaane patita.m disvaa ``ga.nhatha, bhikkhave, baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa sariira''nti niiharaapetvaa sariirakicca.m kaaretvaa caatumahaapathe cetiya.m kaaraapesi. tato sa"nghamajjhe kathaa udapaadi -- ``tathaagato bhikkhusa"nghena baahiyassa sariirajjhaapanakicca.m kaaresi, dhaatuyo gahetvaa cetiya.m kaaresi, kataramaggo nu kho tena sacchikato, saama.nero nu kho so, bhikkhu nu kho''ti citta.m uppaadayi.msu ^a^V1.0216^ea^. satthaa ta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, baahiyo''ti upari dhammadesana.m va.d.dhetvaa tassa parinibbutabhaava.m pakaasesi. puna sa"nghamajjhe kathaa udapaadi ``na ca satthaaraa baahiyassa bahu dhammo desito, arahatta.m pattoti ca vadeti. ki.m naameta''nti? satthaa ``dhammo mando ^a^P1.0283^ea^ bahuuti akaara.na.m, visapiitakassa agado viya ceso''ti vatvaa dhammapade gaathamaaha --
[21] ``sahassamapi ce gaathaa, anatthapadasa.mhitaa.
[22] eka.m gaathaapada.m seyyo, ya.m sutvaa upasammatii''ti.. (dha0 pa0 100).

[03] desanaapariyosaane caturaasiiti paa.nasahassaani amatapaana.m pivi.msu. ida~nca pana baahiyattherassa vatthu sutte (udaa0 10) aagatattaa vitthaarena na kathita.m. aparabhaage pana satthaa sa"nghamajjhe nisinno baahiyatthera.m khippaabhi~n~naana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^cittakathikaana^eb^nti vicitta.m katvaa dhamma.m kathentaana.m. thero kira ekassapi dvinnampi dhamma.m kathento bahuuhi upamaahi ca kaara.nehi ca ma.n.dayitvaa bodhento katheti. tasmaa cittakathikaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa ^a^M1.0221^ea^ pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa vayappatto dasabalassa dhammakatha.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m cittakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthetvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapabuddhasaasanosakkanakaale sattanna.m bhikkhuuna.m abbhantaro hutvaa pabbatamatthake sama.nadhamma.m katvaa aparihiinasiilo tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvaa eka.m buddhantara.m sampatti.m anubhavamaano amhaaka.m satthu kaale raajagahe ekissaa kuladaarikaaya kucchimhi uppanno. saa ca pa.thama.m maataapitaro yaacitvaa pabbajja.m alabhamaanaa kulaghara.m gataa gabbha.m ga.nhi. tampi ajaanantii ^a^P1.0284^ea^ saamika.m aaraadhetvaa tena anu~n~naataa bhikkhuniisu pabbajitaa. tassaa gabbhanimitta.m disvaa bhikkhuniyo devadatta.m pucchi.msu, so ``assama.nii''ti aaha. dasabala.m pucchi.msu, satthaa upaalitthera.m pa.ticchaapesi. thero saavatthinagaravaasiini kulaani visaakha~nca ^a^V1.0217^ea^ upaasika.m pakkosaapetvaa sodhento ``pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjaa arogaa''ti aaha. satthaa ``suvinicchita.m adhikara.na''nti therassa saadhukaara.m adaasi.

[03] saa bhikkhunii suva.n.nabimbasadisa.m putta.m vijaayi. ta.m gahetvaa raajaa pasenadikosalo posaapesi, kassapoti cassa naama.m katvaa aparabhaage ala"nkaritvaa satthu santika.m netvaa pabbaajesi. kumaarakaale pana pabbajitattaa bhagavataa ``kassapa.m pakkosatha, ida.m phala.m vaa khaadaniiya.m vaa kassapassa dethaa''ti vutte ``katarakassapassaati. kumaarakassapassaa''ti eva.m gahitanaamattaa tato pa.t.thaaya vu.d.dhakaalepi ^b^kumaarakassapo^eb^tveva vuccati. apica ra~n~no posaavanikaputtattaapi kumaarakassapoti ta.m sa~njaani.msu.

[03] so pabbajitakaalato pa.t.thaaya vipassanaaya ceva kamma.m karoti, buddhavacana~nca ga.nhaati. atha so tena saddhi.m pabbatamatthake sama.nadhamma.m katvaa anaagaamiphala.m patvaa suddhaavaase nibbatto mahaabrahmaa tasmi.m samaye aavajjento kumaarakassapa.m disvaa ``sahaayako me vipassanaaya kilamati, gantvaa tassa vipassanaaya nayamukha.m dassetvaa maggaphalapattiyaa upaaya.m karissaamii''ti brahmaloke .thitova pa~ncadasa pa~nhe ^a^M1.0222^ea^ abhisa"nkharitvaa rattibhaagasamanantare kumaarakassapattherassa vasana.t.thaane andhavane paaturahosi. thero aaloka.m disvaa ``ko etthaa''ti aaha. ``aha.m pubbe tayaa saddhi.m sama.nadhamma.m katvaa anaagaamiphala.m patvaa suddhaavaase nibbattabrahmaa''ti ^a^P1.0285^ea^ aaha. kena kammena aagatatthaati? mahaabrahmaa attano aagatakaara.na.m diipetu.m te pa~nhe aacikkhitvaa ``tva.m ime pa~nhe ugga.nhitvaa aru.ne u.t.thite tathaagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa puccha, .thapetvaa hi tathaagata.m a~n~no ime pa~nhe kathetu.m samattho naama natthii''ti vatvaa brahmalokameva gato.

[03] theropi punadivase satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa mahaabrahmunaa kathitaniyaameneva pa~nhe pucchi. satthaa kumaarakassapattherassa arahatta.m paapetvaa pa~nhe kathesi. thero satthaaraa kathitaniyaameneva ugga.nhitvaa andhavana.m gantvaa vipassana.m gabbha.m gaahaapetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tato pa.t.thaaya catunna.m parisaana.m dhammakatha.m kathento bahukaahi upamaahi ca kaara.nehi ca ma.n.detvaa cittakathameva katheti. atha na.m satthaa paayaasira~n~no pa~ncadasahi pa~nhehi pa.tima.n.detvaa suttante (dii0 ni0 2.406 aadayo) desite ^a^V1.0218^ea^ ta.m suttanta.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa imasmi.m saasane cittakathikaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^pa.tisambhidaapattaana^eb^nti catasso pa.tisambhidaa patvaa .thitaana.m mahaako.t.thitatthero aggoti dasseti. aya.m hi thero attano pa.tisambhidaasu ci.n.navasibhaavena abhi~n~naate abhi~n~naate mahaasaavake upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchantopi dasabala.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchantopi pa.tisambhidaasuyeva pa~nha.m pucchati. iti iminaa ci.n.navasibhaavena pa.tisambhidaapattaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi ^a^P1.0286^ea^ hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare mahaabhogakule nibbatto aparena samayena satthu dhammakatha.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tisambhidaapattaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule ^a^M1.0223^ea^ nibbatti. ko.t.thitamaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu. so vayappatto tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa ekadivasa.m satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so upasampannakaalato pa.t.thaaya vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m patvaa niccakaala.m pa.tisambhidaasu ci.n.navasii hutvaa pa~nha.m pucchanto pa.tisambhidaasuyeva pucchati. atha na.m satthaa aparabhaage mahaavedallasutta.m (ma0 ni0 1.449 aadayo) a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa pa.tisambhidaapattaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.
[06] tatiyavaggava.n.nanaa.

[03] 219-223^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V1.0219^ea^ pa.thame ^b^bahussutaana^eb^ntiaadiisu a~n~nepi theraa bahussutaa satimantaa gatimantaa dhitimantaa upa.t.thaakaa ca atthi. aya.m panaayasmaa buddhavacana.m ugga.nhanto dasabalassa saasane bha.n.daagaarikapariyattiya.m .thatvaa ga.nhi. tasmaa bahussutaana.m aggo naama jaato. imasseva ca therassa buddhavacana.m gahetvaa dhaara.nakasati a~n~nehi therehi balavataraa ahosi, tasmaa ^b^satimantaana.m^eb^ aggo naama jaato. ayameva ^a^P1.0287^ea^ caayasmaa ekapade .thatvaa sa.t.thi padasahassaani ga.nhanto satthaaraa kathitaniyaameneva sabbapadaani jaanaati, tasmaa ^b^gatimantaana.m^eb^ aggo naama jaato. tasseva caayasmato buddhavacana.m ugga.nhanaviiriya.m sajjhaayanaviiriya~nca dhaara.naviiriya~nca satthu upa.t.thaanaviiriya~nca a~n~nehi asadisa.m ahosi, tasmaa ^b^dhitimantaana.m^eb^ aggo naama jaato. tathaagata.m upa.t.thahanto cesa na a~n~nesa.m upa.t.thaakabhikkhuuna.m upa.t.thaanaakaarena upa.t.thahi, a~n~ne hi tathaagata.m upa.t.thahantaa na cira.m upa.t.thahi.msu, na ca buddhaana.m mana.m gahetvaa upa.t.thahi.msu. aya.m thero pana upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m laddhadivasato pa.t.thaaya aaraddhaviiriyo hutvaa tathaagatassa mana.m gahetvaa upa.t.thahi. tasmaa ^b^upa.t.thaakaana.m^eb^ aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa ^a^M1.0224^ea^ pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ito kira satasahassamatthake kappe padumuttaro naama satthaa loke uppajji. tassa ha.msavatii naama nagara.m ahosi, nando naama raajaa pitaa, sumedhaa naama devii maataa, bodhisatto uttarakumaaro naama ahosi. so puttassa jaatadivase mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamma pabbajitvaa padhaanamanuyutto anukkamena sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa ``anekajaatisa.msaara''nti udaana.m udaanetvaa sattaaha.m bodhipalla"nke viitinaametvaa ``pathaviya.m .thapessaamii''ti paada.m abhiniihari. atha pathavi.m bhinditvaa he.t.thaa vuttappamaa.na.m paduma.m u.t.thaasi. tadupaadaaya bhagavaa padumuttaroteva pa~n~naayittha. tassa devalo ca sujaato ca dve aggasaavakaa ahesu.m ^a^V1.0220^ea^, amitaa ca asamaa ca dve aggasaavikaa, sumano naama upa.t.thaako. padumuttaro bhagavaa pitu sa"ngaha.m kurumaano bhikkhusatasahassaparivaaro ha.msavatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa vasati.

[03] kani.t.thabhaataa ^a^P1.0288^ea^ panassa sumanakumaaro naama. tassa raajaa ha.msavatito viisayojanasate bhogagaama.m adaasi. so kadaaci kadaaci aagantvaa pitara~nca satthaara~nca passati. athekadivasa.m paccanto kupito sumano ra~n~no pesesi. raajaa ``tva.m mayaa tattha kasmaa .thapito''ti pa.tipesesi. so core vuupasametvaa ``upasanto, deva, janapado''ti ra~n~no pesesi. raajaa tu.t.tho ``siigha.m mama putto aagacchatuu''ti aaha. tassa sahassamattaa amaccaa honti. so tehi saddhi.m antaraamagge mantesi -- ``mayha.m pitaa tu.t.tho sace me vara.m deti, ki.m ga.nhaamii''ti? atha na.m ekacce ``hatthi.m ga.nhatha, assa.m ga.nhatha, janapada.m ga.nhatha, satta ratanaani ga.nhathaa''ti aaha.msu. apare ``tumhe pathavissarassa puttaa, na tumhaaka.m dhana.m dullabha.m, laddhampi ceta.m sabba.m pahaaya gamaniiya.m, pu~n~nameva eka.m aadaaya gamaniiya.m. tasmaa deve vara.m dadamaane temaasa.m padumuttarabhagavanta.m upa.t.thaatu.m vara.m ga.nhathaa''ti aaha.msu. so ``tumhe mayha.m kalyaa.namittaa, na meta.m citta.m atthi, tumhehi pana uppaadita.m, eva.m karissaamii''ti gantvaa pitara.m vanditvaa pitaraa aali"ngetvaa matthake cumbetvaa ``vara.m te putta demii''ti vutte ``icchaamaha.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavanta.m temaasa.m catuuhi paccayehi upa.t.thahanto jiivita.m ava~njha.m kaatu.m, ima.m me deva vara.m dehii''ti aaha. na sakkaa, taata, a~n~na.m varehiiti. deva, khattiyaana.m naama dve ^a^M1.0225^ea^ kathaa natthi, etadeva me vara.m dehi, na mama a~n~nena atthoti. taata, buddhaana.m naama citta.m dujjaana.m, sace bhagavaa na icchissati, mayaa dinnepi ^a^P1.0289^ea^ ki.m bhavissatiiti? ``saadhu, deva, aha.m bhagavato citta.m jaanissaamii''ti vihaara.m gato.

[03] tena ca samayena bhattakicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa bhagavaa gandhaku.ti.m pavi.t.tho hoti, so ma.n.dalamaa.le sannipatitaana.m bhikkhuuna.m santika.m agamaasi. te na.m aaha.msu -- ``raajaputta, kasmaa aagatosii''ti? bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, dassetha me bhagavantanti. na maya.m, raajaputta, icchiticchitakkha.ne satthaara.m da.t.thu.m labhaamaati. ko pana, bhante, labhatiiti? sumanatthero naama raajaputtaati. so ``kuhi.m, bhante, thero''ti? therassa nisinna.t.thaana.m pucchitvaa gantvaa vanditvaa ``icchaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m passitu.m, dassetha me bhagavanta''nti aaha. thero passantasseva raajakumaarassa aapokasi.najjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa mahaapathavi.m udaka.m adhi.t.thaaya pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa ^a^V1.0221^ea^ satthu gandhaku.tiya.myeva paaturahosi. atha na.m bhagavaa ``sumana kasmaa aagatosii''ti aaha. raajaputto, bhante, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya aagatoti. tena hi bhikkhu aasana.m pa~n~naapehiiti. puna thero passantasseva raajakumaarassa buddhaasana.m gahetvaa antogandhaku.tiya.m nimujjitvaa bahiparive.ne paatubhavitvaa parive.ne aasana.m pa~n~naapesi. raajakumaaro imaani dve acchariyaakaaraani disvaa ``mahanto vataaya.m bhikkhuu''ti cintesi.

[03] bhagavaapi gandhaku.tito nikkhamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. raajaputto bhagavanta.m vanditvaa pa.tisanthaara.m akaasi. ``kadaa aagatosi raajaputtaa''ti vutte, ``bhante, tumhesu gandhaku.ti.m pavi.t.thesu, bhikkhuu pana `na maya.m icchiticchitakkha.ne bhagavanta.m da.t.thu.m labhaamaa'ti ma.m therassa santika.m paahesu.m. thero pana ekavacaneneva dasseti, thero, bhante, tumhaaka.m saasane vallabho ma~n~ne''ti. aama raajakumaara, vallabho esa bhikkhu mayha.m ^a^P1.0290^ea^ saasaneti. bhante, buddhaana.m saasane ki.m katvaa vallabhaa hontiiti? daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa kumaaraati. bhagavaa aha.m thero viya buddhasaasane vallabho hotukaamo, sve mayha.m bhikkha.m adhivaasethaati. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena ^a^M1.0226^ea^. raajakumaaro attano vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa sabbaratti.m mahaasakkaara.m sajjetvaa satta divasaani khandhaavaarabhatta.m naama adaasi.

[03] sattame divase satthaara.m vanditvaa, bhante, mayaa pitu santikaa temaasa.m antovassa.m tumhaaka.m pa.tijagganavaro laddho, temaasa.m me vassaavaasa.m adhivaasethaati. bhagavaa ``atthi nu kho tattha gatena attho''ti oloketvaa ``atthii''ti disvaa ``su~n~naagaare kho, raajakumaara, tathaagataa abhiramantii''ti aaha. kumaaro ``a~n~naata.m bhagavaa a~n~naata.m sugataa''ti vatvaa ``aha.m, bhante, purimatara.m gantvaa vihaara.m kaaremi, mayaa pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhi.m aagacchathaa''ti bhagavanta.m pa.ti~n~na.m gaahaapetvaa pitu santika.m gantvaa ``dinnaa me, deva, bhagavataa pa.ti~n~naa, mayaa pahite bhagavanta.m peseyyathaa''ti vatvaa pitara.m vanditvaa nikkhamitvaa yojane yojane vihaara.m kaarento viisayojanasata.m addhaana.m gato. gantvaa ca attano nagare vihaara.t.thaana.m vicinanto sobhananaamassa ku.tumbikassa uyyaana.m disvaa satasahassena ki.nitvaa satasahassa.m vissajjetvaa vihaara.m kaaresi. tattha bhagavato gandhaku.ti.m sesabhikkhuuna~nca ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanatthaaya ku.tile.nama.n.dape kaaretvaa paakaaraparikkhepa.m dvaarako.t.thaka~nca ni.t.thaapetvaa pitu santika.m pesesi -- ``ni.t.thita.m mayha.m kicca.m, satthaara.m pahi.nathaa''ti.

[03] raajaa ^a^V1.0222^ea^ bhagavanta.m bhojetvaa ``bhagavaa sumanassa kicca.m ni.t.thita.m, tumhaaka.m gamana.m ^a^P1.0291^ea^ paccaasiisatii''ti aaha. bhagavaa bhikkhusatasahassaparivuto yojane yojane vihaaresu vasamaano agamaasi. kumaaro ``satthaa aagacchatii''ti sutvaa yojana.m paccuggantvaa gandhamaalaadiihi puujayamaano vihaara.m pavesetvaa --
[21] ``satasahassena me kiita.m, satasahassena maapita.m.
[22] sobhana.m naama uyyaana.m, pa.tigga.nha mahaamunii''ti.. --

[25] vihaara.m niyyaadesi. so vassuupanaayikaadivase daana.m datvaa attano puttadaare ca amacce ca pakkosaapetvaa aaha -- ``satthaa amhaaka.m santika.m duuratova aagato, buddhaa ca naama dhammagarukaa na aamisacakkhukaa ^a^M1.0227^ea^. tasmaa aha.m ima.m temaasa.m dve saa.take nivaasetvaa dasa siilaani samaadiyitvaa idheva vasissaami, tumhe khii.naasavasatasahassassa iminaava niihaarena temaasa.m daana.m dadeyyaathaa''ti.

[03] so sumanattherassa vasana.t.thaanasabhaageyeva .thaane vasanto ya.m thero bhagavato vatta.m karoti, ta.m sabba.m disvaa ``imasmi.m .thaane ekantavallabho esa thero, etasseva me .thaanantara.m patthetu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa upaka.t.thaaya pavaara.naaya gaama.m pavisitvaa sattaaha.m mahaadaana.m datvaa sattame divase bhikkhusatasahassassa paadamuule ticiivara.m .thapetvaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa, ``bhante, yadeta.m mayaa sattaaha.m khandhaavaaradaanato pa.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m kata.m, ta.m neva sakkasampatti.m, na maarabrahmasampatti.m patthayantena, buddhassa pana upa.t.thaakabhaava.m patthentena kata.m. tasmaa ahampi bhagavaa anaagate sumanatthero viya ekassa buddhassa upa.t.thaako homii''ti pa~ncapati.t.thitena pati.t.thahitvaa vandi. satthaa tassa anantaraaya.m disvaa byaakaritvaa pakkaami. kumaaro ^a^P1.0292^ea^ ta.m sutvaa ``buddhaa ca naama advejjhakathaa hontii''ti dutiyadivase gotamabuddhassa pattaciivara.m gahetvaa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito gacchanto viya ahosi.

[03] so tasmi.m buddhuppaade vassasatasahassa.m daana.m datvaa sagge nibbattitvaa kassapabuddhakaale pi.n.daaya carato therassa pattaggaha.nattha.m uttarisaa.taka.m datvaa puuja.m akaasi. puna sagge nibbattitvaa tato cuto baaraa.nasiraajaa hutvaa uparipaasaadavaragato gandhamaadanato aakaasena aagacchante ^a^V1.0223^ea^ a.t.tha paccekabuddhe disvaa nimantaapetvaa bhojetvaa attano ma"ngalauyyaane tesa.m a.t.tha pa.n.nasaalaayo kaaretvaa tesa.m nisiidanatthaaya attano nivesane a.t.tha sabbaratanamayaani pii.thaani ceva ma.niaadhaarake ca pa.tiyaadetvaa dasa vassasahassaani upa.t.thaana.m akaasi. etaani paaka.ta.t.thaanaani.

[03] kappasatasahassa.m pana daana.m dadamaanova amhaaka.m bodhisattena saddhi.m tusitapure nibbattitvaa tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbatti. athassa sabbeva ~naatake aanandite pamudite karonto jaatoti aanandotveva naama.m aka.msu. so anupubbena kataabhinikkhamane sammaasambodhi.m patvaa pa.thamagamanena kapilavatthu.m aagantvaa tato ^a^M1.0228^ea^ nikkhante bhagavati bhagavato parivaarattha.m raajakumaaresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyaadiihi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa bhagavato santike pabbajitvaa nacirasseva aayasmato pu.n.nassa mantaa.niputtassa santike dhammakatha.m sutvaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thahi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena bhagavato pa.thamabodhiya.m viisati vassaani anibaddhaa upa.t.thaakaa ahesu.m. ekadaa naagasamaalo pattaciivara.m gahetvaa vicari ekadaa naagito, ekadaa upavaano, ekadaa sunakkhatto, ekadaa cundo sama.nuddeso ^a^P1.0293^ea^, ekadaa saagato, ekadaa raadho, ekadaa meghiyo. tattha ekadaa bhagavaa naagasamaalattherena saddhi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno dvedhaapatha.m patto. thero maggaa okkamma ``bhagavaa aha.m iminaa maggena gacchaamii''ti aaha. atha na.m bhagavaa ``ehi bhikkhu, iminaa maggena gacchaamaa''ti aaha. so ``handa bhagavaa tumhaaka.m pattaciivara.m ga.nhatha, aha.m iminaa maggena gacchaamii''ti vatvaa pattaciivara.m bhuumiya.m .thapetu.m aaraddho. atha na.m bhagavaa ``aahara bhikkhuu''ti vatvaa pattaciivara.m gahetvaa gato. tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena gacchato coraa pattaciivara~nceva hari.msu, siisa~nca bhindi.msu. so ``bhagavaa idaani me pa.tisara.na.m, na a~n~no''ti cintetvaa lohitena galantena bhagavato santika.m aagami. ``kimida.m bhikkhuu''ti ca vutte ta.m pavatti.m aarocesi. atha na.m bhagavaa ``maa cinteyi bhikkhu, etassa kaara.naayeva ta.m nivaarayimhaa''ti vatvaa samassaasesi.
