[03] ekadaa pana bhagavaa meghiyattherena saddhi.m paaciinava.mse migadaaye jantugaama.m agamaasi. tatraapi meghiyo jantugaame pi.n.daaya caritvaa nadiitiire paasaadika.m ambavana.m disvaa ``bhagavaa tumhaaka.m ^a^V1.0224^ea^ pattaciivara.m ga.nhatha, aha.m tasmi.m ambavane sama.nadhamma.m karomii''ti vatvaa bhagavataa tikkhattu.m nivaariyamaanopi gantvaa akusalavitakkehi anvaasatto paccaagantvaa ta.m pavatti.m aarocesi. tampi bhagavaa ``imameva te kaara.na.m sallakkhetvaa nivaarayimhaa''ti vatvaa anupubbena saavatthi.m agamaasi. tattha gandhaku.tiparive.ne pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisinno bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhave, idaanimhi mahallako, `ekacce bhikkhuu iminaa maggena gacchaamaa'ti vutte a~n~nena gacchanti, ekacce mayha.m pattaciivara.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipanti, mayha.m nibaddhupa.t.thaaka.m eka.m bhikkhu.m ^a^M1.0229^ea^ jaanaathaa''ti ^a^P1.0294^ea^. bhikkhuuna.m dhammasa.mvego udapaadi. athaayasmaa saariputto u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m vanditvaa ``aha.m, bhante, tumheyeva patthayamaano satasahassakappaadhika.m asa"nkhyeyya.m paaramiyo puurayi.m, nanu maadiso mahaapa~n~no upa.t.thaako naama va.t.tati, aha.m upa.t.thahissaamii''ti aaha. ta.m bhagavaa ``ala.m, saariputta, yassa.m disaaya.m tva.m viharasi, asu~n~naa ve saa disaa, tava hi ovaado buddhaana.m ovaadasadiso, tena me tayaa upa.t.thaakakicca.m atthii''ti pa.tikkhipi. eteneva upaayena mahaamoggallaana.m aadi.m katvaa asiiti mahaasaavakaa u.t.thahi.msu. te sabbe bhagavaa pa.tikkhipi.

[03] aanandatthero pana tu.nhiiyeva nisiidi. atha na.m bhikkhuu aaha.msu -- ``aavuso aananda, bhikkhusa"ngho upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m yaacati, tvampi yaacaahii''ti. yaacitvaa laddha.t.thaana.m naama, aavuso, kiidisa.m hoti, ki.m ma.m satthaa na passati? sace satthaa rocissati, ``aanando ma.m upa.t.thahatuu''ti vakkhatiiti. atha bhagavaa ``na, bhikkhave, aanando a~n~nehi ussaahetabbo, sayameva jaanitvaa ma.m upa.t.thahissatii''ti aaha. tato bhikkhuu ``u.t.thehi, aavuso aananda, u.t.thehi, aavuso aananda, dasabala.m upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m yaacaahii''ti aaha.msu. thero u.t.thahitvaa cattaaro pa.tikkhepaa catasso ca aayaacanaati a.t.tha vare yaaci.

[03] ^b^cattaaro pa.tikkhepaa^eb^ naama -- ``sace me, bhante, bhagavaa attanaa laddha.m pa.niita.m ciivara.m na dassati, pi.n.dapaata.m na dassati, ekagandhaku.tiya.m vasitu.m na dassati, nimantana.m ^a^P1.0295^ea^ gahetvaa na gamissati, evaaha.m bhagavanta.m upa.t.thahissaamii''ti vatvaa ``ka.m panettha, aananda, aadiinava.m addasaa''ti vutte aaha -- ``sacaaha.m, bhante, imaani vatthuuni labhissaami, bhavissanti vattaaro `aanando dasabalena laddha.m pa.niita.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati, pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati, ekagandhaku.tiya.m vasati ^a^V1.0225^ea^, ekato nimantana.m gacchati. eta.m laabha.m labhanto tathaagata.m upa.t.thaati, ko eva.m upa.t.thahato bhaaro'''ti? ime cattaaro pa.tikkhepe yaaci.

[03] ^b^catasso aayaacanaa^eb^ naama -- ``sace, bhante, bhagavaa mayaa gahitanimantana.m gamissati, sacaaha.m tirora.t.thaa tirojanapadaa bhagavanta.m da.t.thu.m aagata.m parisa.m aagatakkha.neyeva bhagavanta.m dassetu.m lacchaami, yadaa me ka"nkhaa uppajjati, tasmi.myeva kha.ne bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitu.m lacchaami, tathaa ya.m bhagavaa mayha.m parammukhe dhamma.m deseti, ta.m aagantvaa mayha.m kathessati, evaaha.m ^a^M1.0230^ea^ bhagavanta.m upa.t.thahissaamii''ti vatvaa ``ka.m panettha, aananda, aanisa.msa.m passasii''ti vutte aaha -- ``idha, bhante, saddhaa kulaputtaa bhagavato okaasa.m alabhantaa ma.m eva.m vadanti `sve, bhante aananda, bhagavataa saddhi.m amhaaka.m ghare bhikkha.m ga.nheyyaathaa'ti. sace bhagavaa tattha na gamissati, icchiticchitakkha.neyeva parisa.m dassetu.m, ka"nkha~nca vinodetu.m okaasa.m na lacchaami, bhavissanti vattaaro `ki.m aanando dasabala.m upa.t.thaati ^a^P1.0296^ea^. ettakampissa bhagavaa anuggaha.m na karotii'ti. bhagavato ca parammukhaa ma.m pucchissanti `aya.m, aavuso aananda, gaathaa, ida.m sutta.m, ida.m jaataka.m kattha desita'nti. sacaaha.m ta.m na sampaadayissaami, bhavissanti vattaaro -- `ettakampi, aavuso, na jaanaasi, kasmaa tva.m chaayaa viya bhagavanta.m avijahanto diigharatta.m vicarasii'ti. tenaaha.m parammukhaa desitassapi dhammassa puna kathana.m icchaamii''ti. imaa catasso aayaacanaa yaaci. bhagavaapissa adaasi.

[03] eva.m ime a.t.tha vare gahetvaa nibaddhupa.t.thaako ahosi. tasseva .thaanantarassa atthaaya kappasatasahassa.m puuritaana.m paaramiina.m phala.m paapu.ni. so upa.t.thaaka.t.thaana.m laddhadivasato pa.t.thaaya dasabalassa duvidhena udakena tividhena dantaka.t.thena hatthapaadaparikammena pi.t.thiparikammena gandhaku.tiparive.na.m sammajjanenaati evamaadiihi kiccehi upa.t.thahanto ``imaaya naama velaaya satthu ima.m naama laddhu.m va.t.tati, ida.m naama kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti divasabhaaga.m santikaavacaro hutvaa rattibhaagasamanantare da.n.dadiipika.m gahetvaa ekaratti.m gandhaku.tiparive.na.m nava vaare anupariyaayati. eva~nhissa ahosi -- ``sace me thinamiddha.m okkameyya, dasabale pakkosante pa.tivacana.m daatu.m na sakku.neyya''nti. tasmaa sabbaratti.m da.n.dadiipika.m hatthena na mu~ncati. idamettaka.m vatthu. aparabhaage pana satthaa jetavane viharanto anekapariyaayena dhammabha.n.daagaarikaaanandattherassa va.n.na.m kathetvaa ^a^V1.0226^ea^ thera.m imasmi.m saasane bahussutaana.m satimantaana.m gatimantaana.m dhitimantaana.m upa.t.thaakaana~nca bhikkhuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P1.0297^ea^ ^b^mahaaparisaana^eb^nti mahaaparivaaraana.m uruvelakassapo aggoti dasseti. a~n~nesa~nhi theraana.m ka~nci kaala.m parivaaro mahaa hoti ka~nci ^a^M1.0231^ea^ kaala.m appo, imassa pana therassa dviihi bhaatikehi saddhi.m eka.m sama.nasahassa.m nibaddhaparivaarova ahosi. tesu ekekasmi.m ekeka.m pabbaajente dve sama.nasahassaani honti, dve dve pabbaajente tii.ni sahassaani honti. tasmaa so mahaaparivaaraana.m aggo naama jaato. ^b^kassapo^eb^ti panassa gotta.m. uruvelaaya.m pabbajitattaa ^b^uruvelakassapo^eb^ti pa~n~naayittha.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa vayappatto satthu dhammakatha.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m mahaaparisaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa ``mayaapi anaagate evaruupena bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa ticiivarena acchaadetvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa mahaaparisaana.m aggabhaavattha.m patthana.m akaasi. satthaa anantaraaya.m disvaa anaagate gotamabuddhassa saasane mahaaparisaana.m aggo bhavissatii''ti byaakaritvaa pakkaami.

[03] sopi kulaputto yaavajiiva.m kalyaa.nakamma.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ito dvenavutikappamatthake phussabuddhassa vemaatikakani.t.thabhaataa hutvaa nibbatto, pitaa mahindaraajaa naama. apare panassa dve kani.t.thabhaataro ahesu.m. eva.m te tayo bhaataro visu.m visu.m .thaanantara.m labhi.msu. te he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva kupita.m paccanta.m vuupasametvaa pitu santikaa vara.m labhitvaa ``temaasa.m dasabala.m pa.tijaggissaamaa''ti vara.m ga.nhi.msu. atha nesa.m ^a^P1.0298^ea^ etadahosi -- ``amhehi dasabala.m pa.tijaggantehi anucchavika.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti eka.m amacca.m uppaadaka.t.thaane .thapetvaa eka.m aayavayajaananaka.m katvaa eka.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa parivesaka.t.thaane .thapetvaa attanaa dasa siilaani samaadaaya temaasa.m sikkhaapadaani rakkhi.msu. te tayo amaccaa he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva imasmi.m buddhuppaade bimbisaaravisaakhara.t.thapaalaa jaataa.

[03] te ^a^V1.0227^ea^ pana raajakumaaraa vutthavasse dasabale sahatthaa buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m paccayapuujaaya puujetvaa yaavajiiva.m kalyaa.nakamma.m katvaa amhaaka.m dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva braahama.nakule nibbattitvaa attano gottavasena ^a^M1.0232^ea^ tayopi janaa kassapaa eva naama jaataa. te vayappattaa tayo vede ugga.nhi.msu. tesa.m je.t.thabhaatikassa pa~nca maa.navakasataani parivaaro ahosi, majjhimassa tii.ni, kani.t.thassa dve. te attano ganthe saara.m olokentaa di.t.thadhammikameva passi.msu, na samparaayika.m. atha nesa.m je.t.thabhaataa attano parivaarena saddhi.m uruvela.m gantvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa uruvelakassapo naama jaato, mahaaga"ngaanadiiva"nke pabbajito nadiikassapo naama jaato, gayaasiise pabbajito gayaakassapo naama jaato.

[03] eva.m tesu isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa tattha vasantesu bahuuna.m divasaana.m accayena amhaaka.m bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa pa.tividdhasabba~n~nuta~n~naa.no anukkamena dhammacakka.m pavattetvaa pa~ncavaggiye there arahatte pati.t.thaapetvaa yasadaarakappamukhe pa~ncapa~n~naasa sahaayakepi vinetvaa sa.t.thi arahante ``caratha, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0299^ea^, caarika''nti bahujanahitaaya caarika.m pesetvaa bhaddavaggiye vinetvaa uruvelakassapassa hetu.m disvaa ``mayi gate tayo bhaatikaa saparivaaraa arahatta.m paapu.nissantii''ti ~natvaa ekako adutiyo uruvelakassapassa vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa vasanatthaaya agyaagaara.m yaacitvaa tattha kata.m naagadamana.m aadi.m katvaa a.d.dhu.d.dhasahassehi paa.tihaariyehi uruvelakassapa.m saparivaara.m vinetvaa pabbaajesi. tassa pabbajitabhaava.m ~natvaa itarepi dve bhaataro saparivaaraa aagantvaa pabbaji.msu, sabbepi ehibhikkhuu iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa ahesu.m.

[03] satthaa ta.m sama.nasahassa.m aadaaya gayaasiisa.m gantvaa pi.t.thipaasaa.ne nisinno ``katha.mruupaa nu kho etesa.m dhammadesanaa sappaayaa''ti olokento ``ime aggi.m paricarantaa vicari.msu, imesa.m tayo bhave aadittaagaarasadise katvaa dassetu.m va.t.tatii''ti aadittapariyaayasutta.m (mahaava0 54) desesi. desanaapariyosaane sabbeva arahatta.m pattaa. satthaa tehi parivuto pubbe bimbisaarara~n~no dinnapa.ti~n~nattaa raajagahanagare la.t.thivanuyyaana.m agamaasi. raajaa dasabalassa aagatabhaava.m sutvaa dvaadasanahutehi braahma.nagahapatikehi saddhi.m satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. satthaa sabbaavanta.m parisa.m oloketvaa mahaajana.m uruvelakassapassa nipaccakaara.m karonta.m disvaa ``ime mayha.m vaa kassapassa vaa ^a^M1.0233^ea^ mahantabhaava.m na jaananti, savitakkaa ca naama desana.m sampa.ticchitu.m ^a^V1.0228^ea^ na sakkontii''ti ^a^P1.0300^ea^ cintetvaa, ``kassapa, tuyha.m upa.t.thaakaana.m vitakka.m chindaa''ti therassa sa~n~na.m adaasi. thero satthu vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa satthaara.m pa~ncapati.t.thitena vanditvaa taalappamaa.na.m aakaasa.m uppatitvaa iddhivikubbana.m dassetvaa ``satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmi, satthaa me, bhante, bhagavaa, saavakohamasmii''ti vatvaa oruyha dasabalassa paade vandi. etenupaayena sattame vaare sattataalappamaa.na.m aakaasa.m abbhuggantvaa puna aagantvaa dasabalassa paade vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] tasmi.m kaale mahaajano ``aya.m loke mahaasama.no''ti satthari nibbitakko jaato, athassa satthaa dhamma.m desesi. desanaapariyosaane raajaa ekaadasanahutehi braahma.nagahapatikehi saddhi.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thito, ekanahuta.m upaasakatta.m pa.tivedesi. tepi uruvelakassapassa parivaaraa sahassamattaa bhikkhuu attano aasevanavasena cintesu.m -- ``amhaaka.m pabbajitakicca.m matthaka.m patta.m, bahi gantvaa ki.m karissaamaa''ti uruvelakassapatthera.myeva parivaaretvaa vicari.msu. tesu ekekasmi.m ekeka.m nissitaka.m ga.nhante dve sahassaani honti, dve dve ga.nhante tii.ni sahassaani honti. tato pa.t.thaaya yattakaa tesa.m nissitakaa, tattake kathetu.m va.t.tatiiti. idamettha vatthu. aparabhaage pana satthaa jetavane viharanto thera.m mahaaparisaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^kulappasaadakaana^eb^nti kula.m pasaadentaana.m. aya.m hi thero adi.t.thabuddhadassana.myeva suddhodanamahaaraajassa nivesana.m pasaadesi, tasmaa kulappasaadakaana.m ^a^P1.0301^ea^ aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu ^a^M1.0234^ea^ sa.msaranto amhaaka.m bodhisattassa maatukucchiya.m pa.tisandhiggaha.nadivase kapilavatthusmi.myeva amaccagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. jaatadivase bodhisattena saddhi.myeva jaatoti ta.mdivasa.myeva ta.m dukuulacumbu.take nipajjaapetvaa bodhisattassa upa.t.thaanatthaaya nayi.msu. bodhisattena hi ^a^V1.0229^ea^ saddhi.m bodhirukkho raahulamaataa catasso nidhikumbhiyo aarohaniyahatthii ka.n.dako channo kaa.ludaayiiti ime satta ekadivase jaatattaa sahajaataa naama ahesu.m. athassa naamaggaha.nadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jaatoti udaayiitveva naama.m aka.msu. thoka.m kaa.ladhaatukattaa pana ^b^kaa.ludaayii^eb^ naama jaato. so bodhisattena saddhi.m kumaarakii.la.m kii.lanto vuddhi.m agamaasi.

[03] aparabhaage bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa anukkamena sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko lokaanuggaha.m karonto raajagaha.m upanissaaya viharati. tasmi.m samaye suddhodanamahaaraajaa ``siddhatthakumaaro abhisambodhi.m patvaa raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane viharatii''ti sutvaa purisasahassaparivaara.m eka.m amacca.m ``putta.m me idha aanehii''ti pesesi. so sa.t.thiyojanamagga.m gantvaa dasabalassa catuparisamajjhe ^a^P1.0302^ea^ nisiiditvaa dhammadesanaavelaaya vihaara.m paavisi. so ``ti.t.thatu taava ra~n~naa pahitasaasana''nti parisapariyante .thito satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa yathaa.thitova saddhi.m purisasahassehi arahatta.m paapu.ni. atha nesa.m satthaa ``etha bhikkhavo''ti hattha.m pasaaresi, sabbe ta.mkha.na.myeva iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya ahesu.m. arahatta.m pattakaalato pa.t.thaaya pana ariyaa naama majjhattaava hontiiti ra~n~naa pahitasaasana.m dasabalassa na kathesi. raajaa ``neva gato aagacchati, na saasana.m suyyatii''ti ``ehi, taata, tva.m gacchaa''ti teneva niyaamena a~n~na.m amacca.m pesesi. sopi gantvaa purimanayeneva saddhi.m parisaaya arahatta.m patvaa tu.nhii ahosi. eva.m navahi amaccehi saddhi.m nava purisasahassaani pesesi. sabbe attano kicca.m ni.t.thaapetvaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] atha raajaa cintesi -- ``ettakaa janaa mayi sinehaabhaavena dasabalassa idhaagamanatthaaya na ki~nci kathayi.msu, a~n~ne gantvaapi dasabala.m aanetu.m ^a^M1.0235^ea^ na sakkhissanti. mayha.m kho pana putto udaayii dasabalena saddhi.m ekavayo sahapa.msukii.liko, mayi cassa sineho atthii''ti kaa.ludaayi.m pakkosaapetvaa, ``taata, purisasahassaparivaaro gantvaa dasabala.m aanehii''ti aaha. pa.thama.m gatapurisaa viya pabbajitu.m labhanto aanessaami, devaati. ya.mki~nci katvaa mama putta.m dassehiiti. ``saadhu, devaa''ti ra~n~no saasana.m aadaaya raajagaha.m gantvaa satthu dhammadesanaavelaaya parisapariyante .thito dhamma.m sutvaa saparivaaro arahattaphala.m patvaa ehibhikkhubhaave pati.t.thaasi. tato cintesi -- ``na taava dasabalassa kulanagara.m gantu.m esa kaalo, vasantasamaye supupphitesu vanasa.n.desu ^a^V1.0230^ea^ haritati.nasa~nchannaaya pathaviyaa esa kaalo bhavissatii''ti ^a^P1.0303^ea^ kaala.m pa.timaanento tassa kaalassa aagatabhaava.m ~natvaa --
[21] ``naatisiita.m naatiu.nha.m, naatidubbhikkhachaataka.m.
[22] saddalaa haritaa bhuumi, esa kaalo mahaamunii''ti.. --

[25] sa.t.thimattaahi gaathaahi dasabalassa kulanagara.m gamanatthaaya gamanava.n.na.m va.n.nesi. satthaa ``udaayii gamanava.n.na.m katheti, kapilavatthunagara.m gantu.m esa kaalo''ti viisatisahassabhikkhuparivaaro aturitagamanena caarika.m nikkhami.

[01] udaayitthero satthu nikkhantabhaava.m ~natvaa ``pitu mahaaraajassa sa~n~na.m daatu.m va.t.tatii''ti vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa ra~n~no nivesane paaturahosi. suddhodanamahaaraajaa thera.m disvaa tu.t.thacitto mahaarahe palla"nke nisiidaapetvaa attano pa.tiyaaditassa naanaggarasabhojanassa patta.m puuretvaa adaasi. thero u.t.thaaya gamanaakappa.m dassesi. nisiiditvaava bhu~nja, taataati. satthu santika.m gantvaa bhu~njissaami, mahaaraajaati. kaha.m pana, taata, satthaati? viisatisahassabhikkhuparivaaro tumhaaka.m dassanatthaaya caarika.m nikkhanto, mahaaraajaati. tumhe ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa yaava mama putto ima.m nagara.m sampaapu.naati, taavassa itova pi.n.dapaata.m harathaati. thero bhattakicca.m katvaa dasabalassa aaharitabba.m bhatta.m gahetvaa dhammakatha.m kathetvaa dasabalassa adassaneneva sakalaraajanivesana.m saddhaapa.tilaabha.m labhaapetvaa sabbesa.m passantaana~n~neva patta.m aakaase ^a^M1.0236^ea^ vissajjetvaa sayampi vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa pi.n.dapaata.m aadaaya satthu hatthe .thapesi, satthaa ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~nji. thero sa.t.thiyojanamagga.m yojanaparama.m gacchantassa satthuno divase divase raajagehato bhatta.m aaharitvaa adaasi. eva.m ^a^P1.0304^ea^ vatthu veditabba.m. atha aparabhaage satthaa ``mayha.m pitu mahaaraajassa sakalanivesana.m pasaadesii''ti thera.m kulappasaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.
[03] 226^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^appaabaadhaana^eb^nti niraabaadhaana.m. ^b^baakulo^eb^ti dviisu kulesu va.d.dhitattaa eva.mladdhanaamo thero.

[03] tassa ^a^V1.0231^ea^ pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- aya.m kira atiite ito kappasatasahassaadhike asa"nkhyeyyamatthake anomadassidasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva braahma.nakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa vaya.m aagamma uggahitavedo vedattaye saara.m apassanto ``samparaayikattha.m gavesissaamii''ti pabbatapaade isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa pa~ncaabhi~n~naa-a.t.thasamaapattilaabhii hutvaa jhaanakii.litaaya viitinaamesi. tasmi.m samaye anomadassii bodhisatto sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa ariyaga.naparivuto caarika.m carati. taapaso ``tii.ni ratanaani uppannaanii''ti sutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa desanaapariyosaane sara.nesu pati.t.thito, attano .thaana.m pana vijahitu.m naasakkhi. so kaalena kaala.m satthu dassanaaya ceva gacchati, dhamma~nca su.naati.

[03] athekasmi.m samaye tathaagatassa udaravaato uppajji. taapaso satthu dassanatthaaya aagato ``satthaa gilaano''ti sutvaa ``ko, bhante, aabaadho''ti. ``udaravaato''ti vutte ``aya.m kaalo mayha.m pu~n~na.m kaatu''nti pabbatapaada.m gantvaa naanaavidhaani bhesajjaani samodhaanetvaa ``ida.m bhesajja.m satthu upanethaa''ti upa.t.thaakattherassa adaasi. saha bhesajjassa upayogena udaravaato pa.tippassambhi. so satthu phaasukakaale gantvaa evamaaha -- ``bhante, yadida.m mama bhesajjena ^a^P1.0305^ea^ tathaagatassa phaasuka.m jaata.m, tassa me nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave gadduuhanamattampi sariire ^a^M1.0237^ea^ byaadhi naama maa hotuu''ti. idamassa tasmi.m attabhaave kalyaa.nakamma.m.

[03] so tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvaa eka.m asa"nkhyeyya.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m appaabaadhaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavataayuka.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto vipassiidasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva bandhumatiinagare braahma.nakule nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa jhaanalaabhii hutvaa pabbatapaade vasati.

[03] vipassiibodhisattopi sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa a.t.thasa.t.thibhikkhusatasahassaparivaaro bandhumatiinagara.m upanissaaya pitu mahaaraajassa sa"ngaha.m karonto kheme migadaaye viharati. athaaya.m taapaso dasabalassa loke nibbattabhaava.m ~natvaa aagantvaa satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa sara.nesu pati.t.thaasi, attano pabbajja.m jahitu.m naasakkhi, kaalena kaala.m pana satthu upa.t.thaana.m gacchati.

[03] athekasmi.m ^a^V1.0232^ea^ samaye .thapetvaa satthaara~nceva dve aggasaavake ca himavati pupphitaana.m visarukkhaana.m vaatasamphassena sesabhikkhuuna.m matthakarogo naama udapaadi. taapaso satthu upa.t.thaana.m aagato bhikkhuu sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nipanne disvaa -- ``ki.m, bhante, bhikkhusa"nghassa aphaasuka''nti pucchi. bhikkhuuna.m ti.napupphakarogo, aavusoti. taapaso cintesi -- ``aya.m kaalo mayha.m bhikkhusa"nghassa kaayaveyyaavatikakamma.m katvaa pu~n~na.m nibbattetu''nti attano ^a^P1.0306^ea^ aanubhaavena naanaavidhaani bhesajjaani sa.mka.d.dhitvaa yojetvaa adaasi. sabbabhikkhuuna.m rogo ta.mkha.na.myeva vuupasanto.

[03] so yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa brahmaloke nibbattitvaa ekanavutikappe devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapabuddhakaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe nibbatto gharaavaasa.m vasanto ``mayha.m vasanageha.m dubbala.m, paccanta.m gantvaa dabbasambhaara.m aaharitvaa geha.m karissaamii''ti va.d.dhakiihi saddhi.m gacchanto antaraamagge eka.m ji.n.na.m mahaavihaara.m disvaa ``ti.t.thatu taava mayha.m gehakamma.m, na ta.m mayaa saddhi.m gamissati, ya.mki~nci katvaa pana saddhi.m gamanakammameva puretara.m kaatu.m ^a^M1.0238^ea^ va.t.tatii''ti teheva va.d.dhakiihi dabbasambhaara.m gaahaapetvaa tasmi.m vihaare uposathaagaara.m kaaresi, bhojanasaala.m aggisaala.m diighaca"nkama.m jantaaghara.m kappiyaku.ti.m vaccaku.ti.m aarogyasaala.m kaaresi, ya.mki~nci bhikkhusa"nghassa upabhogaparibhoga.m bhesajja.m naama sabba.m pa.tiyaadetvaa .thapesi.

[03] so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva kosambiya.m se.t.thigehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. tassa pa.tisandhiggaha.nadivasato pa.t.thaaya ta.m se.t.thikula.m laabhaggayasaggappatta.m ahosi. athassa maataa putta.m vijaayitvaa cintesi -- ``aya.m daarako pu~n~navaa kataadhikaaro, yattaka.m kaala.m arogo diighaayuko hutvaa ti.t.thati, tattaka.m amhaaka.m sampattidaayako bhavissati. jaatadivaseyeva mahaayamunaaya nhaatadaarakaa nirogaa hontii''ti nhaapanatthaaya na.m pesesi. ``pa~ncame divase siisa.m nhaapetvaa nadiikii.lanatthaaya na.m pesesii''ti majjhimabhaa.nakaa. tattha ^a^P1.0307^ea^ dhaatiyaa daaraka.m nimujjanummujjanavasena kii.laapentiyaa eko maccho daaraka.m disvaa ``bhakkho me aya''nti ma~n~namaano mukha.m vivaritvaa upagato. dhaatii daaraka.m cha.d.detvaa palaataa, maccho ta.m gili. pu~n~navaa satto dukkha.m na paapu.ni, sayanagabbha.m pavisitvaa nipanno viya ahosi. maccho daarakassa tejena tattaphaala.m gilitvaa .dayhamaano viya vegena ti.msayojana.m gantvaa baaraa.nasinagaravaasino macchabandhassa jaala.m paavisi. mahaamacchaa ^a^V1.0233^ea^ naama jaalena baddhaa maariyamaanaava maranti, aya.m pana daarakassa tejena jaalato niiha.tamattova mato. macchabandhaa ca mahaamaccha.m labhitvaa phaaletvaa vikki.nanti, ta.m pana daarakassa aanubhaavena aphaaletvaa sakalameva kaajena haritvaa ``sahassena demaa''ti vadantaa nagare vicari.msu, koci na ga.nhaati.

[03] tasmi.m pana nagare aputtaka.m asiitiko.tivibhava.m se.t.thikula.m atthi. tassa dvaaramuula.m patvaa ``ki.m gahetvaa dethaa''ti vuttaa ``kahaapa.na''nti aaha.msu. tehi kahaapa.na.m datvaa gahito. se.t.thibhariyaapi a~n~nesu divasesu macche na ke.laayati, ta.mdivasa.m pana maccha.m phalake .thapetvaa sayameva phaalesi. maccha~nca naama kucchito phaalenti, saa pana pi.t.thito phaalentii ^a^M1.0239^ea^ macchakucchiya.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m daaraka.m disvaa ``macchakucchiya.m me putto laddho''ti naada.m naditvaa daaraka.m aadaaya saamikassa santika.m agamaasi. se.t.thi taavadeva bheri.m caraapetvaa daarakamaadaaya ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa ``macchakucchiya.m me, deva, daarako laddho, ki.m karomaa''ti aaha. pu~n~navaa esa, yo macchakucchiya.m aarogo vasi, posehi nanti ^a^P1.0308^ea^.

[03] assosi kho itara.m kula.m ``baaraa.nasiya.m kira eka.m se.t.thikula.m macchakucchiya.m daaraka.m labhii''ti. te tattha agama.msu. athassa maataa daaraka.m ala"nkaritvaa kii.laapiyamaana.m disvaa ``manaapo vataaya.m daarako''ti gahetvaa pakati.m aacikkhi. itaraa ``mayha.m putto''ti aaha. kaha.m te laddhoti. macchakucchiyanti. na tuyha.m putto, mayha.m puttoti. kaha.m te laddhoti. mayaa dasa maase kucchiyaa dhaarito, atha na.m nadiyaa kii.laapiyamaana.m maccho giliiti. tuyha.m putto a~n~nena macchena gilito bhavissati, aya.m pana mayaa macchakucchiya.m laddhoti ubhopi raajakula.m agama.msu. raajaa aaha -- ``aya.m dasa maase kucchiyaa dhaaritattaa amaataa kaatu.m na sakkaa, maccha.m ga.nhantaapi vakkayakanaadiini bahi katvaa ga.nhantaa naama natthiiti macchakucchiya.m laddhattaa ayampi amaataa kaatu.m na sakkaa, daarako ubhinnampi kulaana.m daayaado hotuu''ti. tato pa.t.thaaya dvepi kulaani ativiya laabhaggayasaggappattaani ahesu.m. tassa dviihi kulehi va.d.dhitattaa baakulakumaaroti naama.m kari.msu.

[03] tassa vi~n~nuta.m pattassa dviisupi nagaresu tayo tayo paasaade kaaretvaa naa.takaani paccupa.t.thapesu.m. ekekasmi.m nagare cattaaro cattaaro maase vasati. ekasmi.m nagare cattaaro maase vutthassa ^a^V1.0234^ea^ sa"nghaa.tanaavaasu ma.n.dapa.m kaaretvaa tattha na.m saddhi.m naa.takehi aaropenti. so sampatti.m anubhavamaano catuuhi maasehi itara.m nagara.m gacchati. ta.mnagaravaasiini naa.takaani ``dviihi maasehi upa.d.dhamagga.m ^a^P1.0309^ea^ aagato bhavissatii''ti paccuggantvaa ta.m parivaaretvaa dviihi maasehi attano nagara.m nenti, itaraani naa.takaani nivattitvaa attano nagarameva gacchanti. tattha cattaaro maase vasitvaa teneva niyaamena puna itara.m nagara.m gacchati. evamassa sampatti.m anubhavantassa asiiti vassaani paripu.n.naani.

[03] tasmi.m ^a^M1.0240^ea^ samaye amhaaka.m bodhisatto sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena caarika.m caramaano kosambi.m paapu.ni, baaraa.nasinti majjhimabhaa.nakaa. baakulo se.t.thipi kho ``dasabalo aagato''ti sutvaa bahu.m gandhamaala.m aadaaya satthu santika.m gantvaa dhammakatha.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so sattaahameva puthujjano hutvaa a.t.thame aru.ne saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. athassa dviisu nagaresu gihikaale paricaarikamaatugaamaa attano kulagharaani aagantvaa tattha vasamaanaa ciivaraani katvaa pahi.ni.msu. thero eka.m addhamaasa.m kosambivaasikehi pahita.m ciivara.m bhu~njati, eka.m addhamaasa.m baaraa.nasivaasikehiiti. eteneva niyaamena dviisupi nagaresu ya.m ya.m uttama.m, ta.m ta.m therasseva aahariyati. therassa asiiti vassaani agaaramajjhe vasantassa dviiha"ngulehi gandhapi.n.da.m gahetvaa upasi"nghanamattampi kaala.m na koci aabaadho naama ahosi. aasiitime vasse sukheneva pabbajja.m upagato. pabbajitassaapissa appamattakopi aabaadho vaa catuuhi paccayehi vekalla.m vaa naahosi. so pacchime kaale parinibbaanasamayepi puraa.nagihisahaayakassa ^a^P1.0310^ea^ acelakassapassa attano kaayikacetasikasukhadiipanavaseneva sakala.m baakulasutta.m (ma0 ni0 3.209 aadayo) kathetvaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayi. eva.m a.t.thuppatti samu.t.thitaa. satthaa pana therassa dharamaanakaaleyeva there yathaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thaanantare .thapento baakulatthera.m imasmi.m saasane appaabaadhaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ pa~ncame ^b^pubbenivaasa.m anussarantaana^eb^nti pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantaana.m anussara.nasamatthaana.m sobhitatthero aggoti dasseti. so kira pubbenivaasa.m anupa.tipaa.tiyaa anussaramaano ^a^V1.0235^ea^ pa~nca kappasataani asa~n~nibhave acittakapa.tisandhi.m nayato aggahesi aakaase pada.m dassento viya. tasmaa pubbenivaasa.m anussarantaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa vayappatto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pubbenivaasa~naa.nalaabhiina.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^M1.0241^ea^ agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusalakamma.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti, ^b^sobhito^eb^tissa naama.m aka.msu.

[03] so aparena samayena satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m ^a^P1.0311^ea^ patvaa pubbenivaasa~naa.ne ci.n.navasii ahosi. so anupa.tipaa.tiyaa attano nibbatta.t.thaana.m anussaranto yaava asa~n~nibhave acittakapa.tisandhi, taava pa.tisandhi.m addasa. tato para.m antare pa~nca kappasataani pavatti.m adisvaa avasaane cuti.m disvaa ``ki.m naameta''nti aavajjamaano nayavasena ``asa~n~nibhavo bhavissatii''ti ni.t.tha.m agamaasi. satthaa ima.m kaara.na.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarantaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ cha.t.the ^b^vinayadharaana.m yadida.m upaalii^eb^ti vinayadharaana.m bhikkhuuna.m upaalitthero aggoti dasseti. thero kira tathaagatasseva santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. tathaagatasseva santike vinayapi.taka.m ugga.nhitvaa bhaarukacchakavatthu.m, ajjukavatthu.m, (paaraa0 158) kumaarakassapavatthunti imaani tii.ni vatthuuni sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena saddhi.m sa.msandetvaa kathesi. tasmaa vinayadharaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- padumuttarabuddhakaale kiresa ha.msavatiya.m kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasa.m satthu dhammakatha.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m vinayadharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade kappakagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi ^a^P1.0312^ea^, upaalidaarakotissa naama.m aka.msu. so ^a^V1.0236^ea^ vayappatto channa.m khattiyaana.m pasaadhako hutvaa tathaagate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajjatthaaya nikkhamantehi teti chahi khattiyehi saddhi.m nikkhamitvaa pabbaji. tassa pabbajjaavidhaana.m paa.liya.m (cuu.lava0 330) aagatameva.

[03] so ^a^M1.0242^ea^ pabbajitvaa upasampanno satthaara.m kamma.t.thaana.m kathaapetvaa ``mayha.m, bhante, ara~n~navaasa.m anujaanaathaa''ti aaha. bhikkhu tava ara~n~ne vasantassa ekameva dhura.m va.d.dhissati, amhaaka.m pana santike vasantassa vipassanaadhura~nca ganthadhura~nca paripuuressatiiti. thero satthu vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa vipassanaaya kamma.m karonto nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni. atha na.m satthaa sayameva sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m ugga.nhaapesi. so aparabhaage he.t.thaa vuttaani tii.ni vatthuuni vinicchini. satthaa ekekasmi.m vinicchite saadhukaara.m datvaa tayopi vinicchaye a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m vinayadharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^bhikkhunovaadakaana.m yadida.m nandako^eb^ti aya.m hi thero dhammakatha.m kathento ekasamodhaane pa~nca bhikkhuniisataani arahatta.m paapesi. tasmaa bhikkhunovaadakaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- aya~nhi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhunovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto ^a^P1.0313^ea^ imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa vayappatto satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni, pubbenivaasa~naa.ne ca ci.n.navasii ahosi. so catuusu parisaasu sampattaasu ``sabbesa.myeva mana.m gahetvaa kathetu.m sakkotii''ti dhammakathikanandako naama jaato. tathaagatopi kho rohi.niinadiitiire cumba.takakalahe nikkhamitvaa pabbajitaana.m pa~ncanna.m saakiyakumaarasataana.m anabhiratiyaa uppannaaya te bhikkhuu aadaaya ku.naaladaha.m gantvaa ku.naalajaatakakathaaya (jaa0 2.21.ku.naalajaataka) nesa.m sa.mviggabhaava.m ~natvaa catusaccakatha.m kathetvaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapesi. aparabhaage mahaasamayasutta.m ^a^V1.0237^ea^ (dii0 ni0 2.331 aadayo) kathetvaa aggaphala.m arahatta.m paapesi. tesa.m theraana.m puraa.nadutiyikaa ``amhe daani idha ki.m karissaamaa''ti vatvaa sabbaava ekacittaa ^a^M1.0243^ea^ hutvaa mahaapajaapati.m upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. taapi pa~ncasataa theriyaa santike pabbajja~nca upasampada~nca labhi.msu. atiitaanantaraaya pana jaatiyaa sabbaava taa nandakattherassa raajaputtabhaave .thitassa paadaparicaarikaa ahesu.m.

[03] tena samayena satthaa ``bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo ovadantuu''ti aaha. thero attano vaare sampatte taasa.m purimabhave attano paadaparicaarikabhaava.m ~natvaa cintesi -- ``ma.m imassa bhikkhuniisa"nghassa majjhe nisinna.m upamaayo ca kaara.naani ca aaharitvaa dhamma.m kathayamaana.m disvaa a~n~no pubbenivaasa~naa.nalaabhii bhikkhu ima.m kaara.na.m oloketvaa `aayasmaa ^a^P1.0314^ea^ nandako yaavajjadivasaa orodhe na vissajjeti, sobhataayamaayasmaa orodhaparivuto'ti vattabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti. tasmaa saya.m agantvaa a~n~na.m bhikkhu.m pesesi. taa pana pa~ncasataa bhikkhuniyo therasseva ovaada.m paccaasiisanti. iminaa kaara.nena bhagavaa ``attano vaare sampatte a~n~na.m apesetvaa sayameva gantvaa bhikkhuniisa"ngha.m ovadaahii''ti thera.m aaha. so satthu katha.m pa.tibaahitu.m asakkonto attano vaare sampatte caatuddase bhikkhunisa"nghassa ovaada.m datvaa sabbaava taa bhikkhuniyo sa.laayatanapa.tima.n.ditaaya dhammadesanaaya sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapesi.

[03] taa bhikkhuniyo therassa dhammadesanaaya attamanaa hutvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa attano pa.tividdhagu.na.m aarocesu.m. satthaa ``kasmi.m nu kho dhamma.m desente imaa bhikkhuniyo uparimaggaphalaani paapu.neyyu''nti aavajjento puna ``ta.myeva nandakassa dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa~ncasataapi etaa arahatta.m paapu.nissantii''ti disvaa punadivasepi therasseva santika.m dhammassavanatthaaya pesesi. taa punadivase dhamma.m sutvaa sabbaava arahatta.m pattaa. ta.mdivasa.m bhagavaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m attano santika.m aagatakaale dhammadesanaaya saphalabhaava.m ~natvaa ``hiyyo nandakassa dhammadesanaa caatuddasiya.m candasadisii ahosi, ajja pannarasiya.m candasadisii''ti vatvaa therassa saadhukaara.m datvaa tadeva ca kaara.na.m a.t.thuppatti.m katvaa thera.m bhikkhunovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ a.t.thame ^a^V1.0238^ea^ ^a^P1.0315^ea^ ^a^M1.0244^ea^ ^b^indriyesu guttadvaaraana^eb^nti chasu indriyesu pihitadvaaraana.m nandatthero aggoti dasseti. ki~ncaapi hi satthusaavakaa aguttadvaaraa naama natthi, nandatthero pana dasasu disaasu ya.m ya.m disa.m oloketukaamo hoti, na ta.m catusampaja~n~navasena aparicchinditvaa oloketi. tasmaa indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiinagare kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa vayappatto satthu santike dhamma.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kapilavatthupure mahaapajaapatigotamiyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. athassa naamaggaha.nadivase ~naatisa"ngha.m nandayanto tosento jaatoti ^b^nandakumaaro^eb^teva naama.m aka.msu.

[03] mahaasattopi sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa pavattitavaradhammacakko lokaanuggaha.m karonto raajagahato kapilavatthupura.m gantvaa pa.thamadassaneneva pitara.m sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaapesi. punadivase pitu nivesana.m gantvaa raahulamaataaya ovaada.m datvaa sesajanassapi dhamma.m kathesi. punadivase nandakumaarassa abhisekagehapavesanaaavaahama"ngalesu vattamaanesu tassa nivesana.m gantvaa kumaara.m patta.m gaahaapetvaa ^a^P1.0316^ea^ pabbaajetu.m vihaaraabhimukho paayaasi. nandakumaara.m abhisekama"ngala.m na tathaa pii.lesi, patta.m aadaaya gamanakaale pana janapadakalyaa.nii uparipaasaadavaragataa siihapa~njara.m ugghaa.tetvaa ``tuva.ta.m kho, ayyaputta, aagaccheyyaasii''ti ya.m vaaca.m nicchaaresi. ta.m sutvaa gehasitachandaraagavasena olokento panesa satthari gaaravena yathaaruciyaa nimitta.m gahetu.m naasakkhi, tenassa cittasantaapo ahosi. atha na.m ``imasmi.m .thaane nivattessati, imasmi.m .thaane nivattessatii''ti cintentameva satthaa vihaara.m netvaa pabbaajesi. pabbajitopi pa.tibaahitu.m asakkonto tu.nhii ahosi. pabbajitadivasato pa.t.thaaya pana janapadakalyaa.niyaa vuttavacanameva sarati. athassa saa aagantvaa aviduure ^a^M1.0245^ea^ .thitaa viya ahosi. so anabhiratiyaa pii.lito thoka.m .thaana.m gacchati, tassa gumba.m vaa gaccha.m vaa atikkamantasseva dasabalo purato .thitako viya ^a^V1.0239^ea^ ahosi. so aggimhi pakkhitta.m kukku.tapatta.m viya pa.tinivattitvaa attano vasana.t.thaanameva pavisati.

[03] satthaa cintesi -- ``nando ativiya pamatto viharati, anabhirati.m vuupasametu.m na sakkoti, etassa cittanibbaapana.m kaatu.m va.t.tatii''ti. tato na.m aaha -- ``ehi, nanda, devacaarika.m gacchissaamaa''ti. bhagavaa kathaaha.m iddhimantehi gantabba.t.thaana.m gamissaamiiti. tva.m kevala.m gamanacitta.m uppaadehi, gantvaa passissasiiti. so dasabalassa aanubhaavena tathaagateneva saddhi.m devacaarika.m gantvaa sakkassa devara~n~no nivesana.m oloketvaa pa~nca accharaasataani addasa. satthaa nandatthera.m subhanimittavasena taa olokenta.m disvaa, ``nanda, imaa nu kho accharaa manaapaa, atha janapadakalyaa.nii''ti pucchi. bhante, janapadakalyaa.nii ^a^P1.0317^ea^ imaa accharaa upanidhaaya ka.n.nanaasacchinnakaa makka.tii viya khaayatiiti. nanda, evaruupaa accharaa sama.nadhamma.m karontaana.m na dullabhaati. sace me, bhante bhagavaa, paa.tibhogo hoti, aha.m sama.nadhamma.m karissaamiiti. vissattho tva.m, nanda, sama.nadhamma.m karohi. sace te sappa.tisandhikaa kaalakiriyaa bhavissati, aha.m etaasa.m pa.tilaabhatthaaya paa.tibhogoti. iti satthaa yathaaruciyaa devacaarika.m caritvaa jetavanameva paccaaga~nchi.

[03] tato pa.t.thaaya nandatthero accharaana.m hetu rattindiva.m sama.nadhamma.m karoti. satthaa bhikkhuu aa.naapesi -- ``tumhe nandassa vasana.t.thaane `eko kira bhikkhu dasabala.m paa.tibhoga.m katvaa accharaana.m hetu sama.nadhamma.m karotii'ti tattha tattha kathentaa vicarathaa''ti. te satthu vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa ``bhatako kiraayasmaa nando, upakkitako kiraayasmaa nando, accharaana.m hetu brahmacariya.m carati, bhagavaa kirassa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadiina''nti therassa savanuupacaare kathentaa vicaranti. nandatthero ta.m katha.m sutvaa ``ime bhikkhuu na a~n~na.m kathenti, ma.m aarabbha kathenti, ayutta.m mama kamma''nti pa.tisa"nkhaana.m uppaadetvaa vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. athassa arahattapattakkha.neyeva a~n~nataraa ^a^M1.0246^ea^ devataa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesi, sayampi bhagavaa a~n~naasiyeva. punadivase nandatthero bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha -- ``ya.m me, bhante bhagavaa ^a^P1.0318^ea^, paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadiina.m, mu~ncaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti. eva.m vatthu (udaa0 22) samu.t.thita.m ^a^V1.0240^ea^. satthaa aparabhaage jetavanavihaare viharanto thera.m indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^bhikkhuovaadakaana^eb^nti bhikkhuu ovadantaana.m mahaakappinatthero aggoti dasseti. aya.m kira thero ekasamodhaanasmi.myeva dhammakatha.m kathento bhikkhusahassa.m arahatta.m paapesi. tasmaa bhikkhuovaadakaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m kulaghare nibbattitvaa aparabhaage satthu dhammakatha.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapasammaasambuddhakaale baaraa.nasiya.m kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa purisasahassassa ga.naje.t.thako hutvaa gabbhasahassapa.tima.n.dita.m mahaaparive.na.m kaaresi. te sabbepi janaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa kappinaupaasaka.m je.t.thaka.m katvaa saputtadaaraa devaloke nibbattaa. eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msari.msu.

[03] atha amhaaka.m satthu nibbattito puretarameva aya.m kappino paccantadese kukku.tavatiinagare raajagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, sesapurisaa tasmi.myeva nagare amaccakulesu nibbatti.msu. tesu kappinakumaaro pitu ^a^P1.0319^ea^ accayena chatta.m ussaapetvaa mahaakappinaraajaa naama jaato. pubbe kalyaa.nakammakara.nakaale tassa gharasaaminii itthii samaanajaatike raajakule nibbattitvaa mahaakappinara~n~no aggamahesii jaataa, anojaapupphasadisava.n.nataaya panassaa anojaadeviitveva naama.m ahosi. mahaakappinaraajaapi sutavittako ahosi. so paatova u.t.thaaya catuuhi dvaarehi ^a^M1.0247^ea^ siigha.m duute pesesi -- ``yattha bahussute sutadhare passatha, tato nivattitvaa mayha.m aarocethaa''ti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena amhaaka.m satthaa loke nibbattitvaa saavatthi.m upanissaaya pa.tivasati. tasmi.m kaale saavatthinagaravaasino vaa.nijaa saavatthiya.m u.t.thaanakabha.n.da.m gahetvaa, ta.m nagara.m gantvaa, bha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa, ``raajaana.m passissaamaa''ti pa.n.naakaara.m gahetvaa, raajakuladvaara.m ^a^V1.0241^ea^ gantvaa, ``raajaa uyyaana.m gato''ti sutvaa, uyyaana.m gantvaa, dvaare .thitaa pa.tihaarakassa aarocayi.msu. atha ra~n~no nivedi, te raajaa pakkosaapetvaa niyyaatitapa.n.naakaare vanditvaa .thite, ``taataa, kuto aagacchathaa''ti pucchi. saavatthito, devaati. kacci vo ra.t.tha.m subhikkha.m, dhammiko raajaati? aama, devaati. atthi pana tumhaaka.m dese ki~nci saasananti? atthi deva, na pana sakkaa ucchi.t.thamukhehi kathetunti. raajaa suva.n.nabhi"ngaarena udaka.m daapesi. te mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa dasabalaabhimukhaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa, ``deva, amhaaka.m dese buddharatana.m naama uppanna''nti aaha.msu. ra~n~no ``buddho''ti vacane sutamatteyeva sakalasariira.m pharamaanaa piiti ^a^P1.0320^ea^ uppajji. tato ``buddhoti, taataa, vadathaa''ti aaha. buddhoti, deva, vadaamaati. eva.m tikkhattu.m vadaapetvaa ``buddhotipada.m aparimaa.na.m, naassa sakkaa parimaa.na.m kaatu''nti tasmi.myeva pade pasanno satasahassa.m datvaa ``apara.m ki.m saasana''nti pucchi. deva dhammaratana.m naama uppannanti. tampi sutvaa tatheva tikkhattu.m pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa aparampi satasahassa.m datvaa puna ``a~n~na.m ki.m saasana''nti pucchi. sa"ngharatana.m deva uppannanti. tampi sutvaa tatheva pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa aparampi satasahassa.m datvaa dinnabhaava.m pa.n.ne likhitvaa, ``taataa, deviyaa santika.m gacchathaa''ti pesesi. tesu gatesu amacce pucchi -- ``taataa, buddho loke uppanno, tumhe ki.m karissathaa''ti? deva tumhe ki.m kattukaamaati? aha.m pabbajissaamiiti. mayampi pabbajissaamaati. te sabbepi ghara.m vaa ku.tumba.m vaa anapaloketvaa ye asse aaruyha gataa teheva nikkhami.msu.

[03] vaa.nijaa ^a^M1.0248^ea^ anojaadeviyaa santika.m gantvaa pa.n.na.m dassesu.m. saa ta.m vaacetvaa ``ra~n~naa tumhaaka.m bahuu kahaapa.naa dinnaa, ki.m tumhehi kata.m, taataa''ti pucchi. piyasaasana.m, devi, aaniitanti. amhepi sakkaa, taataa, su.naapetunti? sakkaa, devi, ucchi.t.thamukhehi pana vattu.m na sakkaati. saa suva.n.nabhi"ngaarena udaka.m daapesi. te mukha.m vikkhaaletvaa ra~n~no aarocitaniyaameneva aarocesu.m. saapi ta.m sutvaa uppannapaamojjaa teneva nayena ekekasmi.m pade tikkhattu.m pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa pa.ti~n~naaga.nanaaya tii.ni tii.ni katvaa nava satasahassaani adaasi. vaa.nijaa sabbaanipi dvaadasa satasahassaani labhi.msu. atha ne ``raajaa kaha.m, taataa''ti pucchi. pabbajissaamiiti ^a^P1.0321^ea^ nikkhanto, deviiti. ``tena hi, taataa, tumhe gacchathaa''ti te uyyojetvaa ra~n~naa saddhi.m gataana.m amaccaana.m maatugaame pakkosaapetvaa ``tumhe attano saamikaana.m gata.t.thaana.m jaanaatha ammaa''ti pucchi. jaanaama, ayye, ra~n~naa saddhi.m uyyaanakii.la.m ^a^V1.0242^ea^ gataati. aama, ammaa gataa, tattha pana gantvaa ``buddho uppanno, dhammo uppanno, sa"ngho uppanno''ti sutvaa ``dasabalassa santike pabbajissaamaa''ti gataa, tumhe ki.m karissathaati? tumhe pana, ayye, ki.m kattukaamaati? ``aha.m pabbajissaami, na tehi vantavamana.m jivhagge .thapeyyanti. ``yadi eva.m, mayampi pabbajissaamaa''ti sabbaapi rathe yojetvaa nikkhami.msu.

[03] raajaapi amaccasahassehi saddhi.m ga"ngaatiira.m paapu.ni, tasmi.m samaye ga"ngaa puuraa hoti. atha na.m disvaa ``aya.m ga"ngaa puuraa hoti ca.n.damacchaaki.n.naa, amhehi ca saddhi.m aagataa daasaa vaa manussaa vaa natthi, ye no naava.m vaa u.lumpa.m vaa katvaa dadeyyu.m. etassa pana satthu gu.naa naama he.t.thaa aviicito upari yaava bhavaggaa pattha.taa. sace esa satthaa sammaasambuddho, imesa.m assaana.m khurapi.t.thaani maa tementuu''ti udakapi.t.thena asse pakkhandaapesu.m. ekassa assassaapi khurapi.t.thamatta.m na temi, raajamaggena gacchantaa viya paratiira.m patvaa parato a~n~na.m mahaanadi.m paapu.ni.msu. ``dutiyaa kinnamaa''ti pucchi. niilavaahinii naama gambhiiratopi puthulatopi a.d.dhayojanamattaa devaati. tattha ^a^P1.0322^ea^ a~n~naa saccakiriyaa natthi, taaya eva saccakiriyaaya ^a^M1.0249^ea^ tampi a.d.dhayojanavitthaara.m nadi.m atikkami.msu. atha tatiya.m candabhaaga.m naama mahaanadi.m patvaa tampi taaya eva saccakiriyaaya atikkami.msu.

[03] satthaapi ta.mdivasa.m paccuusasamaye mahaakaru.naasamaapattito vu.t.thaaya loka.m olokento ``ajja mahaakappino tiyojanasatika.m rajja.m pahaaya amaccasahassaparivaaro mama santike pabbajitu.m aagacchatii''ti disvaa ``mayaa tesa.m paccuggamana.m kaatu.m yutta''nti paatova sariirapa.tijaggana.m katvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivaaro saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto sayameva pattaciivara.m gahetvaa aakaase uppatitvaa candabhaagaaya tiire tesa.m uttara.natitthaabhimukha.t.thaane mahaanigrodharukkho atthi, tattha palla"nkena nisiiditvaa parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa chabba.n.nabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi. te tena titthena uttarantaa buddharasmiyo ito cito ca dhaavantiyo oloketvaa dasabalassa pu.n.nacandasassirika.m mukha.m disvaa ``ya.m satthaara.m uddissa maya.m pabbajitaa, addhaa so eso''ti dassaneneva ni.t.tha.m gantvaa di.t.tha.t.thaanato pa.t.thaaya o.namitvaa vandamaanaa aagamma satthaara.m vandi.msu. raajaa gopphakesu gahetvaa satthaara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi saddhi.m amaccasahassena. satthaa tesa.m dhammakatha.m kathesi. desanaapariyosaane sabbeva ^a^V1.0243^ea^ arahatte pati.t.thaaya satthaara.m pabbajja.m yaaci.msu. satthaa ``pubbe ime ciivaradaanassa dinnattaa attano pattaciivaraani gahetvaava aagataa''ti suva.n.nava.n.na.m hattha.m pasaaretvaa ``etha bhikkhavo, svaakkhaato dhammo, caratha brahmacariya.m sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti aaha. saava tesa.m aayasmantaana.m pabbajjaa ^a^P1.0323^ea^ ca upasampadaa ca ahosi, vassasa.t.thikattheraa viya satthaara.m parivaarayi.msu.

[03] anojaapi devii rathasahassaparivaaraa ga"ngaatiira.m patvaa ra~n~no atthaaya aabhata.m naava.m vaa u.lumpa.m vaa adisvaa attano byattataaya cintesi -- ``raajaa saccakiriya.m katvaa gato bhavissati, so pana satthaa na kevala.m tesa.myeva atthaaya nibbatto, sace so satthaa sammaasambuddho, amhaaka.m rathaa maa udake nimujji.msuu''ti udakapi.t.thena rathe pakkhandaapesi. rathaana.m nemiva.t.timattampi na temi. dutiyanadimpi tatiyanadimpi teneva saccakaarena uttari. uttaramaanaa eva ca nigrodharukkhamuule satthaara.m ^a^M1.0250^ea^ addasa. satthaapi ``imaasa.m attano saamike passantiina.m chandaraago uppajjitvaa maggaphalaana.m antaraaya.m kareyya, dhamma.m sotu.m ca na sakkhissantii''ti. yathaa a~n~nama~n~na.m na passanti, tathaa akaasi. taa sabbaapi titthato uttaritvaa dasabala.m vanditvaa nisiidi.msu. satthaa taasa.m dhammakatha.m kathesi. desanaapariyosaane sabbaa sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaaya a~n~nama~n~na.m passi.msu. satthaa ``uppalava.n.naa aagacchatuu''ti cintesi. therii aagantvaa sabbaa pabbaajetvaa aadaaya bhikkhuniupassaya.m gataa, satthaa bhikkhusahassa.m gahetvaa aakaasena jetavana.m agamaasi.

[03] athaaya.m mahaakappinatthero attano kicca.m matthakappatta.m ~natvaa appossukko hutvaa phalasamaapattisukhena viitinaamento ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi ``aho sukha.m aho ^a^P1.0324^ea^ sukha''nti abhi.nha.m udaana.m udaanesi. bhikkhuu katha.m uppaadesu.m ``kappinatthero rajjasukha.m anussaranto udaana.m udaanetii''ti. te tathaagatassa aarocesu.m. bhagavaa ``mama putto maggasukha.m phalasukha.m aarabbha udaana.m udaanesii''ti vatvaa dhammapade ima.m gaathamaaha --
[21] ``dhammapiiti sukha.m seti, vippasannena cetasaa.
[22] ariyappavedite dhamme, sadaa ramati pa.n.dito''ti.. (dha0 pa0 79).

[03] athekadivasa.m ^a^V1.0244^ea^ satthaa tassa antevaasikabhikkhusahassa.m aamantetvaa aaha -- ``kacci vo, bhikkhave, aacariyo dhamma.m desetii''ti. na bhagavaa deseti, appossukko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharati, kassaci ovaadamattampi na detiiti. satthaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa ``sacca.m kira tva.m, kappina, antevaasikaana.m ovaadamattampi na desii''ti? sacca.m bhagavaati. braahma.na, maa eva.m kari, ajja pa.t.thaaya antevaasikaana.m dhamma.m desehiiti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti thero satthu katha.m siravarena sampa.ticchitvaa ekasamodhaaneyeva sama.nasahassassa dhamma.m desetvaa sabbe arahatta.m paapesi. aparabhaage satthaa sa"nghamajjhe nisinno pa.tipaa.tiyaa there .thaanantaresu .thapento mahaakappinatthera.m bhikkhuovaadakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M1.0251^ea^ ^b^tejodhaatukusalaana^eb^nti tejodhaatu.m samaapajjitu.m kusalaana.m saagatatthero aggoti dasseti. aya~nhi thero tejodhaatusamaapattiyaa ambatitthanaagassa tejasaa teja.m pariyaadiyitvaa ta.m naaga.m nibbisevana.m akaasi. tasmaa ^a^P1.0325^ea^ tejodhaatukusalaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa aparabhaage satthudhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m tejodhaatukusalaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade saavatthiya.m braahma.nakule nibbatti, saagatamaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu. so aparabhaage satthu dhammadesana.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho pabbajitvaa a.t.tha samaapattiyo nibbattetvaa tattha vasiibhaava.m paapu.ni.

[03] athekadivasa.m satthaa caarika.m caramaano kosambinagarasamiipa.m agamaasi. tena ca samayena nadiititthe poraa.nakanaavikassa bahuu aagantukagamikaa verino hutvaa ta.m pothetvaa maarayi.msu. so viruddhena cittena patthana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tasmi.myeva titthe mahaanubhaavo naagaraajaa hutvaa nibbatto. so viruddhacittattaa akaaleyeva vassaapeti, kaale pana na vassaapeti, sassaani na sammaa sampajjanti. sakalara.t.thavaasino ca tassa vuupasamanattha.m anusa.mvacchara.m balikamma.m karonti, vasanatthaaya ^a^V1.0245^ea^ cassa eka.m geha.m aka.msu. satthaapi teneva titthena uttaritvaa bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto ``tasmi.myeva padese ratti.m vasissaamii''ti agamaasi.

[03] athaaya.m thero ``ca.n.do kirettha naagaraajaa''ti sutvaa ``ima.m naagaraajaana.m dametvaa nibbisevana.m katvaa satthu vasana.t.thaana.m pariyaadetu.m va.t.tatii''ti naagaraajassa vasana.t.thaana.m pavisitvaa palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa nisiidi. naago kujjhitvaa ``konaamaaya.m ^a^P1.0326^ea^ mu.n.dako mayha.m vasana.t.thaana.m pavisitvaa nisinno''ti dhuupaayi, thero uttaritara.m dhuupaayi. naago, pajjali, theropi uttaritara.m pajjalitvaa tassa teja.m pariyaadiyi. so ``mahanto vataaya.m ^a^M1.0252^ea^ bhikkhuu''ti therassa paadamuule nipatitvaa, ``bhante, tumhaaka.m sara.na.m gacchaamii''ti aaha. mayha.m sara.nagamanakicca.m natthi, dasabalassa sara.na.m gacchaati. so ``saadhuu''ti sara.nagato hutvaa tato pa.t.thaaya na ka~nci vihe.theti, devampi sammaa vassaapeti, sassaani sammaa sampajjanti.

[03] kosambivaasino ``ayyena kira saagatena ambatitthakanaago damito''ti sutvaa satthu aagamana.m udikkhamaanaa dasabalassa mahaasakkaara.m sajjayi.msu. te dasabalassa ^a^P1.0327^ea^ mahaasakkaara.m katvaa chabbaggiyaana.m vacanena sabbagehesu kaapotika.m pasanna.m pa.tiyaadetvaa punadivase saagatattherassa pi.n.daaya carantassa gehe gehe thoka.m thoka.m ada.msu. thero apa~n~natte sikkhaapade manussehi yaaciyamaano gehe gehe thoka.m ^a^M1.0253^ea^ thoka.m pivitvaa aviduura.m gantvaava anaahaarikabhaavena sati.m vissajjetvaa sa"nkaara.t.thaane pati.

[03] satthaa katabhattakicco nikkhamanto ta.m disvaa gaahaapetvaa vihaara.m gantvaa vigarahitvaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapesi. so punadivase sati.m labhitvaa attanaa katakaara.na.m sutvaa accaya.m desetvaa dasabala.m khamaapetvaa uppannasa.mvego vipassana.m va.d.dhetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. eva.m vatthu vinaye samu.t.thita.m. ta.m tattha aagatanayeneva vitthaarato veditabba.m. aparabhaage pana satthaa jetavane mahaavihaare nisiiditvaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa there .thaanantaresu .thapento saagatatthera.m tejodhaatukusalaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ekaadasame ^a^V1.0246^ea^ ^b^pa.tibhaaneyyakaana^eb^nti satthu dhammadesanaapa.tibhaanassa paccayabhuutaana.m pa.tibhaanajanakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m raadhatthero aggoti dasseti. therassa hi di.t.thisamudaacaara~nca okappaniyasaddha~nca aagamma dasabalassa navanavaa dhammadesanaa pa.tibhaati. tasmaa thero pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m kulagehe ^a^P1.0328^ea^ nibbattitvaa aparabhaage satthu dhammadesana.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m tathaagata.m paricaritvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto imasmi.m buddhuppaade raajagahanagare braahma.nakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, raadhamaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu.

[03] so mahallakakaale attano puttadaarena abahumato ``pabbajitvaa kaala.m viitinaamessaamii''ti vihaara.m gantvaa there pabbajja.m yaaci. ``ji.n.no mahallakabraahma.no''ti na koci pabbaajetu.m icchi. athekadivasa.m braahma.no satthu santika.m gantvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. satthaa tassa upanissayasampatti.m disvaa katha.m samu.t.thaapetukaamo ``ki.m, braahma.na, puttadaaraa ta.m pa.tijaggantii''ti? kuto, bho gotama, pa.tijaggana.m, mahallakoti ^a^M1.0254^ea^ ma.m bahi niihari.msu. ki.m pana te, braahma.na, pabbajitu.m na va.t.tatiiti? ko ma.m, bho gotama, pabbaajessati, mahallakabhaavena ma.m na koci icchatiiti. satthaa saariputtattherassa sa~n~na.m adaasi. thero satthu vacana.m sirasaa sampa.ticchitvaa raadhabraahma.na.m pabbaajetvaa cintesi -- ``satthaa ima.m braahma.na.m saadarena pabbajaapesi, na kho me eta.m anaadarena pariharitu.m va.t.tatii''ti raadhatthera.m aadaaya gaamakaavaasa.m agamaasi. tatrassa adhunaa pabbajitattaa kicchalaabhissa thero attano patta.m aavaasa.m deti, attano patta.m pa.niitapi.n.dapaatampi tasseva datvaa saya.m pi.n.daaya carati. raadhatthero senaasanasappaaya~nca bhojanasappaaya~nca labhitvaa saariputtattherassa santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa nacirasseva arahatta.m paapu.ni.

[03] atha na.m thero gahetvaa dasabala.m passitu.m aagato. satthaa jaanantova pucchi -- ``yo te mayaa ^a^V1.0247^ea^ ^a^P1.0329^ea^, saariputta, nissitako dinno, kiidisa.m tassa, na ukka.n.thatii''ti? bhante, saasane abhiramitabhikkhu naama evaruupo bhaveyyaati. athaayasmato saariputtassa ``saariputtatthero kata~n~nuu katavedii''ti sa"nghamajjhe kathaa udapaadi. ta.m sutvaa satthaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``anacchariya.m, bhikkhave, saariputtassa idaani kata~n~nuukataveditaa, so atiite ahetukapa.tisandhiya.m nibbattopi kata~n~nuukatavediiyeva ahosii''ti. katarasmi.m kaale bhagavaati?

[03] atiite, bhikkhave, pabbatapaadamhi pa~ncasatamattaa va.d.dhakipurisaa mahaaara~n~na.m pavisitvaa dabbasambhaare chinditvaa mahaau.lumpa.m bandhitvaa nadiyaa otaarenti. atheko hatthinaago ekasmi.m visama.t.thaane so.n.daaya saakha.m ga.nhanto saakhaabha"ngavega.m sandhaaretu.m asakkonto tikhi.nakhaa.nuke paadena avatthaasi, paado viddho, dukkhavedanaa vattanti. so gamana.m abhiniiharitu.m asakkonto tattheva nipajji. so katipaahaccayena te va.d.dhakii attano samiipena gacchante disvaa ``ime nissaayaaha.m jiivita.m labhissaamii''ti tesa.m anupada.m agamaasi. te nivattitvaa hatthi.m disvaa bhiitaa palaayanti. so tesa.m palaayanabhaava.m ~natvaa a.t.thaasi, puna .thitakaale anubandhi.

[03] va.d.dhakije.t.thako cintesi -- ``aya.m hatthi amhesu ti.t.thantesu anubandhati, palaayantesu ti.t.thati, bhavissati tattha kaara.na''nti. sabbe ta.m ta.m rukkha.m aaruyha ^a^M1.0255^ea^ tassa aagamana.m pa.timaanentaa nisiidi.msu. so tesa.m santika.m aagantvaa attano paada.m dassento parivattetvaa nipajji. tadaa va.d.dhakiina.m sa~n~naa udapaadi -- ``gilaanabhaavena, bho, esa aagacchati, na a~n~nena kaara.nenaa''ti tassa santika.m gantvaa paade pavi.t.thakhaa.nuka.m disvaa ^a^P1.0330^ea^ ``iminaa kaara.nena esa aagato''ti tikhi.navaasiyaa khaa.nukako.tiya.m odhi.m datvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandhitvaa ka.d.dhitvaa niihari.msu. athassa va.namukha.m pii.letvaa pubbalohita.m niiharitvaa kasaavodakena dhovitvaa attano jaananabhesajja.m makkhetvaa nacirasseva phaasuka.m aka.msu.

[03] hatthinaago gilaanaa vu.t.thito cintesi -- ``ime mayha.m bahupakaaraa, ime mayaa nissaaya jiivita.m laddha.m, mayaa imesa.m kata~n~nunaa katavedinaa bhavitu.m va.t.tatii''ti attano vasana.t.thaana.m gantvaa seta.m gandhahatthipotaka.m aanesi. va.d.dhakino hatthipotaka.m disvaa ``amhaaka.m hatthii puttampi gahetvaa aagato''ti ativiya tu.t.thacittaa ahesu.m. hatthinaago cintesi -- ``mayi ti.t.thante `ki.m nu kho aya.m aagato'ti mama aagatakaara.na.m na jaanissantii''ti .thita.t.thaanato pakkaami. hatthipotako ^a^V1.0248^ea^ pitu pacchato pacchato anupaayaasi. hatthinaago tassa aagatabhaava.m ~natvaa nivattanatthaaya saddasa~n~na.m adaasi. so pitu katha.m sutvaa nivattitvaa va.d.dhakiina.m santika.m gato. va.d.dhakino ``ima.m hatthipotaka.m amhaaka.m daatu.m aagato bhavissati eso''ti ~natvaa ``amhaaka.m santike tayaa kattabbakicca.m natthi, pitu santika.myeva gacchaa''ti pahi.ni.msu. hatthinaago yaavatatiya.m attano santika.m aagatampi puna va.d.dhakiina.myeva samiipa.m pesesi. tato pa.t.thaaya va.d.dhakino hatthipotaka.m attano santike katvaa pa.tijagganti. bhojanakaale ekeka.m bhattapi.n.da.m denti, bhatta.m tassa yaavadattha.m ahosi. so va.d.dhakiihi antogahane ko.t.tita.m dabbasambhaara.m aaharitvaa a"nga.na.t.thaane raasi.m karoti. eteneva niyaamena a~n~nampi upakaarakamma.m karoti.

[03] satthaa ^a^P1.0331^ea^ ima.m kaara.na.m aaharitvaa pubbepi saariputtassa kata~n~nuukatavedibhaava.m diipeti. saariputtatthero hi tadaa mahaahatthii ahosi, a.t.thuppattiya.m aagato ossa.t.thaviiriyo bhikkhu hatthipotako ahosi. sa.myuttanikaaya.m pana patvaa sakala.m raadhasa.myutta.m, dhammapade ca --
[21] ``nidhiina.mva ^a^M1.0256^ea^ pavattaara.m, ya.m passe vajjadassina.m.
[27] niggayhavaadi.m medhaavi.m, taadisa.m pa.n.dita.m bhaje.
[22] taadisa.m bhajamaanassa, seyyo hoti na paapiyo''ti.. (dha0 pa0 76) --
[25] gaathaa therassa dhammadesanaa naama. aparabhaage pana satthaa pa.tipaa.tiyaa there .thaanantaresu .thapento raadhatthera.m pa.tibhaaneyyakaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ dvaadasame ^b^luukhaciivaradharaana^eb^nti luukhaciivara.m dhaarentaana.m mogharaajaa aggoti dasseti. aya.m hi thero satthaluukha.m suttaluukha.m rajanaluukhanti tividhenapi luukhena samannaagata.m pa.msukuula.m dhaaresi. tasmaa luukhaciivaradharaana.m aggo naama jaato.

[03] tassa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaa -- ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa nibbatti, tato aparabhaage satthu dhammakatha.m su.nanto satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhu.m luukhaciivaradharaana.m ^a^V1.0249^ea^ agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. so yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msaranto kassapadasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva ^a^P1.0332^ea^ ka.t.thavaahananagare amaccagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. aparabhaage vayappatto ka.t.thavaahanaraajaana.m upa.t.thahanto amacca.t.thaana.m labhi.

[03] tasmi.m kaale kassapadasabalo loke uppajji. ka.t.thavaahanaraajaa ``buddho kira loke uppanno''ti sutvaa ta.m pakkosaapetvaa aaha -- ``taata, buddho kira loke uppanno, ima.m paccantanagara.m ekappahaareneva ubhohi amhehi tuccha.m kaatu.m na sakkaa, tva.m taava majjhimadesa.m gantvaa buddhassa uppannabhaava.m ~natvaa dasabala.m ima.m nagara.m aanehii''ti purisasahassena saddhi.m pesesi. so anupubbena satthu santika.m gantvaa dhammakatha.m sutvaa pa.tiladdhasaddho tattheva pabbajitvaa viisati vassasahassaani sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. tena saddhi.m gatapurisaa pana sabbepi nivattitvaa puna ra~n~no santika.m aagataa.

[03] aya.m thero paripu.n.nasiilo kaala.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msaranto amhaaka.m dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva saavatthiya.m ^a^M1.0257^ea^ braahma.nakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, mogharaajamaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu. ka.t.thavaahanaraajaapi kassapassa bhagavato adhikaarakamma.m katvaa eka.m buddhantara.m saparivaaro devamanussesu sa.msaritvaa amhaaka.m dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva saavatthiya.m purohitagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, baavarimaa.navotissa naama.m aka.msu. so aparena samayena tayo vede ugga.nhitvaa so.lasanna.m maa.navakasahassaana.m sippa.m vaacento carati. athassa pasenadikosalara~n~no kaale pitu accayena purohita.t.thaana.m ada.msu. tadaa ayampi mogharaajamaa.navo baavaribraahma.nassa santike sippa.m ga.nhaati.

[03] athekadivasa.m baavaribraahma.no rahogato attano sippe saara.m olokento samparaayika.m saara.m adisvaa ``eka.m pabbajja.m ^a^P1.0333^ea^ pabbajitvaa samparaayika.m gavesessaamii''ti kosalaraajaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa attano pabbajja.m anujaanaapesi. so tena anu~n~naato so.lasahi maa.navakasahassehi parivuto pabbajjatthaaya nikkhami. kosalaraajaapi tena saddhi.myeva eka.m amacca.m kahaapa.nasahassa.m datvaa pesesi -- ``yasmi.m .thaane aacariyo pabbajati, tatrassa vasana.t.thaana.m gahetvaa dethaa''ti. baavaribraahma.no phaasuka.t.thaana.m olokento majjhimadesato pa.tikkamma ^a^V1.0250^ea^ assakara~n~no ca mu.lhakara~n~no ca siimantare godhaavaritiire attano vasana.t.thaana.m kaaresi.

[03] atheko puriso ja.tilaana.m dassanaaya gato tesa.m santake bhuumi.t.thaane tehi anu~n~naato attano vasana.t.thaana.m akaasi. tena kata.m disvaa apara.m kulasata.m gehasata.m kaaresi. te sabbepi sannipatitvaa ``maya.m ayyaana.m santake bhuumibhaage vasaama, mudhaa vasitu.m na kaara.na.m, sukhavaasa.m vo dassaamaa''ti ekeko ekeka.m kahaapa.na.m ^a^M1.0258^ea^ baavaribraahma.nassa vasana.t.thaane .thapesi. sabbehipi aabhatakahaapa.naa satasahassamattaa ahesu.m. baavaribraahma.no ``kimattha.m ete aabhataa''ti aaha. sukhavaasadaanatthaaya, bhanteti. sacaaha.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nena atthiko assa.m, aha.m mahanta.m dhanaraasi.m pahaaya na pabbajeyya.m. tumhaaka.m kahaapa.ne ga.nhitvaa gacchathaati. amhehi ayyassa pariccatta.m na puna ga.nhaama, anusa.mvacchara.m pana eteneva niyaamena aaharissaama, ime gahetvaa ayyo daana.m detuuti. braahma.no adhivaasetvaa kapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaana.m ^a^P1.0334^ea^ daanamukhe niyyaatesi. tassa aparaapara.m daayakabhaavo sakalajambudiipe pa~n~naayittha.

[03] tato kaali"ngara.t.the dunnivi.t.the naama gaame juujakabraahma.nassa va.mse jaatabraahma.nassa braahma.nii u.t.thaaya samu.t.thaaya braahma.na.m codeti -- ``baavarii, kira daana.m deti, gantvaa tato hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m aaharaa''ti. so taaya codiyamaano sa.n.thaatu.m asakkonto baavarissa santika.m gacchamaano baavarimhi daana.m datvaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa nipajjitvaa daana.m anussaramaane gato. gantvaa ca ``daana.m me, braahma.na, dehi, daana.m me, braahma.na, dehii''ti aaha. akaale tva.m, braahma.na, aagato, sampattayaacakaana.m me dinna.m, idaani kahaapa.na.m natthiiti. na mayha.m, braahma.na, bahuuhi kahaapa.nehi attho, tava ettaka.m daana.m dadantassa na sakkaa kahaapa.nehi vinaa bhavitu.m, mayha.m pa~nca kahaapa.nasataani dehiiti. braahma.na, pa~ncapi sataani natthi, puna daanakaale sampatte labhissasiiti. ki.m panaaha.m tava daanakaale aagamissaamiiti? baavaribraahma.nassa pa.n.nasaaladvaare vaaluka.m thuupa.m katvaa samantato rattava.n.naani pupphaani vikiritvaa manta.m jappento viya o.t.the caaletvaa caaletvaa ``muddhaa phalatu sattadhaa''ti vadati.

[03] baavaribraahma.no cintesi -- ``aya.m mahaatapo tapacaara.m ga.nhitvaa cara.nabraahma.nako mayha.m sattadivasamatthake `sattadhaa muddhaa phaalatuu'ti vadati, mayha~nca ^a^P1.0335^ea^ imassa daatabbaani pa~nca kahaapa.nasataani ^a^V1.0251^ea^ natthi, eka.msena ma.m esa ghaatessatii''ti. eva.m tasmi.m sokasallasamappite nipanne rattibhaagasamanantare anantarattabhaave baavarissa maataa devataa hutvaa nibbatti. saa puttassa sokasallasamappitabhaava.m disvaa aagantvaa aaha -- ``taata ^a^M1.0259^ea^, esa muddha.m vaa muddhaphaalana.m vaa na jaanaati, tvampi loke buddhaana.m uppannabhaava.m na jaanaasi. sace te sa.msayo atthi, satthu santika.m gantvaa puccha, so te eta.m kaara.na.m kathessatii''ti. braahma.no devataaya katha.m sutakaalato pa.t.thaaya assaasa.m labhitvaa punadivase u.t.thite aru.ne sabbeva antevaasike pakkositvaa, ``taataa, buddho kira loke uppanno, tumhe siigha.m gantvaa `buddho vaa no vaa'ti ~natvaa aagantvaa mayha.m aarocetha, aha.m satthu santika.m gamissaami. apica kho pana mayha.m mahallakabhaavena jiivitantaraayo dujjaano, tumhe tassa santika.m gantvaa iminaa ca iminaa ca niyaamena pa~nhe pucchathaa''ti muddhaphaalanapa~nha.m naama abhisa"nkharitvaa adaasi.

[03] tato cintesi -- ``sabbe ime maa.navaa pa.n.ditaa, satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa attano kicce matthaka.m patte puna mayha.m santika.m aagaccheyyu.m vaa no vaa''ti. atha attano bhaagineyyassa ajitamaa.navassa naama sa~n~na.m adaasi -- ``tva.m pana ekanteneva mama santika.m aagantu.m arahasi, tayaa pa.tiladdhagu.na.m aagantvaa mayha.m katheyyaasii''ti. atha te so.lasasahassaja.tilaa ajitamaa.nava.m je.t.thaka.m katvaa so.lasahi je.t.thantevaasikehi saddhi.m ``satthaara.m pa~nha.m pucchissaamaa''ti caarika.m carantaa gatagata.t.thaane, ``ayyaa, kaha.m gacchatha, kaha.m gacchathaa''ti pucchitaa ``dasabalassa ^a^P1.0336^ea^ santika.m pa~nha.m pucchitu.m gacchaamaa''ti ko.tito pa.t.thaaya parisa.m sa.mka.d.dhantaa anekayojanasata.m magga.m gataa. satthaa ``tesa.m aagamanadivase a~n~nassa okaaso na bhavissati, ida.m imissaa parisaaya anucchavika.t.thaana''nti gantvaa paasaa.nacetiye pi.t.thipaasaa.ne nisiidi. so ajitamaa.navopi sapariso ta.m pi.t.thipaasaa.na.m aaruyha satthu sariirasampatti.m disvaa ``aya.m puriso imasmi.m loke viva.tacchado buddho bhavissatii''ti attano aacariyena pahite pa~nhe manasaa pucchantova gato.

[03] ta.mdivasa.m tasmi.m .thaane sampattaparisaa dvaadasayojanikaa ahosi. tesa.m so.lasanna.m antevaasikaana.m antare mogharaajamaa.navo ``aha.m sabbehi pa.n.ditataro''ti maanatthaddho, tassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m ajitamaa.navo sabbesa.m je.t.thako, etassa pa.thamatara.m mama pa~nha.m pucchitu.m na yutta''nti ^a^M1.0260^ea^. tassa lajjaayanto pa.thamatara.m pa~nha.m apucchitvaa tena pucchite dutiyo hutvaa satthaara.m ^a^V1.0252^ea^ pa~nha.m pucchi. satthaa ``maanatthaddho mogharaajamaa.navaa, na taavassa ~naa.na.m paripaaka.m gacchati, assa maana.m nivaaritu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa aaha -- ``ti.t.tha tva.m, mogharaaja, a~n~ne taava pa~nhe pucchantuu''ti. so satthu santikaa apasaada.m labhitvaa cintesi -- ``aha.m ettaka.m kaala.m mayaa pa.n.ditataro naama natthiiti vicaraami, buddhaa ca naama ajaanitvaa na kathenti. satthaaraa mama pucchaaya doso di.t.tho bhavissatii''ti ^a^P1.0337^ea^ tu.nhii ahosi. so a.t.thahi janehi pa.tipaa.tiyaa pa~nhe pucchite adhivaasetu.m asakkonto navamo hutvaa puna u.t.thaasi. punapi na.m satthaa apasaadesi.

[03] so punapi tu.nhii hutvaa ``sa"nghanavako daani bhavitu.m na sakkhissaamii''ti pa~ncadasamo hutvaa pa~nha.m pucchi. atha satthaa ~naa.nassa paripaakabhaava.m ~natvaa pa~nha.m kathesi. so desanaapariyosaane attano parivaarena ja.tilasahassena saddhi.m arahatta.m paapu.ni. iminaava niyaamena sesaanipi pannarasa ja.tilasahassaani arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. sabbepi iddhimayapattaciivaradharaa ehibhikkhuuva ahesu.m. sesajanaa pana na kathiyanti. aya.m mogharaajatthero tato pa.t.thaaya tiihi luukhehi samannaagata.m ciivara.m dhaareti. eva.m paaraayane (su0 ni0 982 aadayo) vatthu samu.t.thita.m. satthaa pana aparabhaage jetavane nisinno there pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thaanantaresu .thapento mogharaajatthera.m imasmi.m saasane luukhaciivaradharaana.m agga.t.thaane .thapento ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m luukhaciivaradharaana.m yadida.m mogharaajaa''ti aaha.
[06] catutthavaggava.n.nanaa.
[06] ekacattaaliisasuttamattaaya therapaa.liyaa va.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.
[03] 235^b^.^eb^ theripaa.liyaa ^a^V1.0253^ea^ ^a^M1.0261^ea^ pa.thame ^b^yadida.m mahaapajaapatigotamii^eb^ti mahaapajaapatigotamii therii ratta~n~nuuna.m aggaati dasseti.

[03] tassaa pa~nhakamme pana ayamanupubbikathaa -- aya.m ^a^P1.0338^ea^ kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa aparena samayena satthu dhammadesana.m su.nantii satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhuni.m ratta~n~nuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa adhikaarakamma.m katvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. saa yaavajiiva.m daana.m datvaa siila.m rakkhitvaa tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvaa pana ekasmi.m buddhantare devalokato cavitvaa baaraa.nasiya.m pa~ncanna.m daasisataana.m je.t.thakadaasii hutvaa nibbatti. atha vassuupanaayikasamaye pa~nca paccekabuddhaa nandamuulakapabbhaarato isipatane otaritvaa nagare pi.n.daaya caritvaa isipatanameva gantvaa ``vassuupanaayikaku.tiyaa atthaaya hatthakamma.m yaacissaamaa''ti cintesu.m. kasmaa? vassa.m upagacchantena hi naalakapa.tipada.m pa.tipannenaapi pa~ncanna.m chadanaana.m a~n~natarena chadanena channe sadvaarabaddhe senaasane upagantabba.m. vutta~nheta.m ``na, bhikkhave, asenaasanikena vassa.m upagantabba.m, yo upagaccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (mahaava0 204). tasmaa vassakaale upaka.t.the sace senaasana.m labhati, icceta.m kusala.m. no ce labhati, hatthakamma.m pariyesitvaapi kaatabba.m. hatthakamma.m alabhantena saamampi kaatabba.m, na tveva asenaasanikena vassa.m upagantabba.m. ayamanudhammataa. tasmaa te paccekabuddhaa ``hatthakamma.m yaacissaamaa''ti ciivara.m paarupitvaa saayanhasamaye nagara.m pavisitvaa se.t.thissa gharadvaare a.t.tha.msu. je.t.thakadaasii ku.ta.m gahetvaa udakatittha.m gacchantii paccekabuddhe nagara.m pavisante addasa. se.t.thi tesa.m aagatakaara.na.m sutvaa ``amhaaka.m okaaso natthi, gacchantuu''ti aaha.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0254^ea^ te nagaraa nikkhante je.t.thakadaasii ku.ta.m gahetvaa pavisantii disvaa ku.ta.m otaaretvaa vanditvaa onamitvaa mukha.m ukkhipitvaa, ``ayyaa, nagara.m pavi.t.thamattaava nikkhantaa, ki.m nu kho''ti pucchi. vassuupanaayikaku.tiyaa hatthakamma.m yaacitu.m aagatamhaati. laddha.m, bhanteti? na laddha.m upaasiketi. ki.m ^a^M1.0262^ea^ panesaa ku.ti issareheva kaatabbaa, udaahu ^a^P1.0339^ea^ duggatehipi sakkaa kaatunti? yena kenaci sakkaa kaatunti. saadhu, bhante, maya.m karissaama, sve mayha.m bhikkha.m ga.nhathaati nimantetvaa puna ku.ta.m gahetvaa aagamanatitthamagge .thatvaa aagataagataa avasesadaasiyo ``ettheva hothaa''ti vatvaa sabbaasa.m aagatakaale aaha -- ``ammaa, ki.m niccameva parassa daasikamma.m karissatha, udaahu daasibhaavato muccitu.m icchathaa''ti. ajjeva muccitu.m icchaama, ayyeti. yadi eva.m, mayaa paccekabuddhaa hatthakamma.m alabhantaa svaatanaaya nimantitaa, tumhaaka.m saamikehi ekadivasa.m hatthakamma.m daapethaati. taa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa saaya.m a.tavito aagatakaale saamikaana.m aarocesu.m. te ``saadhuu''ti je.t.thakadaasassa gehadvaare sannipati.msu.

[03] atha ne je.t.thakadaasii ``sve, taataa, paccekabuddhaana.m hatthakamma.m dethaa''ti aanisa.msa.m aacikkhitvaa yepi na kaatukaamaa, te gaa.lhena ovaadena tajjetvaa sabbepi sampa.ticchaapesi. saa punadivase paccekabuddhaana.m bhatta.m datvaa sabbesa.m daasaputtaana.m sa~n~na.m adaasi. te taavadeva ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa dabbasambhaare samodhaanetvaa sata.m sata.m hutvaa ekeka.m ku.ti.m ca"nkamanaadiparivaara.m katvaa ma~ncapii.thapaaniiya-paribhojaniiyaadiini .thapetvaa paccekabuddhaana.m temaasa.m tattheva vasanatthaaya pa.ti~n~na.m kaaretvaa vaarabhikkha.m pa.t.thapesu.m. yaa attano vaaradivase na sakkoti, tassaa je.t.thakadaasii sakagehato niiharitvaa deti. eva.m temaasa.m pa.tijaggitvaa je.t.thakadaasii ekeka.m daasi.m ekeka.m saa.taka.m sajjaapesi, pa~nca thuulasaa.takasataani ahesu.m. taani parivattaapetvaa pa~ncanna.m paccekabuddhaana.m ticiivaraani katvaa adaasi. paccekabuddhaa taasa.m passantiina.myeva aakaasena gandhamaadanapabbata.m agama.msu.

[03] taapi ^a^P1.0340^ea^ sabbaa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devaloke nibbatti.msu. taasu je.t.thikaa tato cavitvaa baaraa.nasiyaa aviduure pesakaaragaame pesakaaraje.t.thakassa gehe nibbatti. athekadivasa.m padumavatiyaa puttaa pa~ncasataa paccekabuddhaa baaraa.nasira~n~naa nimantitaa raajadvaara.m aagantvaa ka~nci olokentampi adisvaa nivattitvaa nagaradvaarena nikkhamitvaa ta.m pesakaaragaama.m ^a^M1.0263^ea^ agama.msu ^a^V1.0255^ea^. saa itthii paccekabuddhe disvaa sampiyaayamaanaa sabbe vanditvaa bhikkha.m adaasi. te bhattakicca.m katvaa gandhamaadanameva agama.msu.

[03] saapi yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msarantii amhaaka.m satthu nibbattito puretarameva devadahanagare mahaasuppabuddhassa gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, gotamiitissaa naama.m aka.msu. mahaamaayaaya kani.t.thabhaginii hoti. mantajjhaayakaa braahma.naa lakkha.naani parigga.nhantaa ``imaasa.m dvinnampi kucchiya.m vasitadaarakaa cakkavattino bhavissantii''ti byaakari.msu. suddhodanamahaaraajaa vayappattakaale taa dvepi ma"ngala.m katvaa attano ghara.m aanesi. aparabhaage amhaaka.m bodhisatto tusitapuraa cavitvaa mahaamaayaaya deviyaa kucchiya.m pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi. mahaamaayaa tassa jaatadivasato sattame divase kaala.m katvaa tusitapure nibbatti. suddhodanamahaaraajaa mahaasattassa maatuccha.m mahaapajaapatigotami.m aggamahesi.t.thaane .thapesi. tasmi.m kaale nandakumaaro jaato. aya.m mahaapajaapati nandakumaara.m dhaatiina.m datvaa saya.m bodhisatta.m parihari.

[03] aparena samayena bodhisatto mahaabhinikkhamana.m nikkhamitvaa sabba~n~nuta.m patvaa lokaanuggaha.m karonto anukkamena kapilavatthu.m patvaa nagara.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. athassa pitaa suddhodanamahaaraajaa antaraviithiya.myeva ^a^P1.0341^ea^ dhammakatha.m sutvaa sotaapanno ahosi. atha dutiyadivase nando pabbaji, sattame divase raahulo. satthaa aparena samayena vesaali.m upanissaaya kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m viharati. tasmi.m samaye suddhodanamahaaraajaa setacchattassa he.t.thaa arahatta.m sacchikatvaa parinibbaayi. tadaa mahaapajaapatigotamii pabbajjaaya citta.m uppaadesi. tato rohi.niinadiitiire kalahavivaadasuttapariyosaane (su0 ni0 868 aadayo) nikkhamitvaa pabbajitaana.m pa~ncanna.m kumaarasataana.m paadaparicaarikaa sabbaava ekacittaa hutvaa ``mahaapajaapatiyaa santika.m gantvaa sabbaava satthu santike pabbajissaamaa''ti mahaapajaapati.m je.t.thika.m katvaa satthu santika.m gantvaa pabbajitukaamaa ahesu.m. aya~nca mahaapajaapati pa.thamameva ekavaara.m satthaara.m pabbajja.m yaacamaanaa naalattha, tasmaa kappaka.m pakkosaapetvaa kese chinnaapetvaa kaasaayaani acchaadetvaa sabbaa taa saakiyaaniyo aadaaya vesaali.m ^a^M1.0264^ea^ gantvaa aanandattherena dasabala.m yaacaapetvaa a.t.thahi garudhammehi pabbajja~nca upasampada~nca alattha. itaraa pana sabbaapi ekatova upasampannaa ahesu.m. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaarato paneta.m vatthu paa.liya.m (cuu.lava0 402 aadayo) aagatameva.

[03] eva.m ^a^V1.0256^ea^ upasampannaa pana mahaapajaapati satthaara.m upasa"nkamitvaa abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi, athassaa satthaa dhamma.m desesi. saa satthu santike kamma.t.thaana.m gahetvaa arahatta.m paapu.ni. sesaa pa~ncasataa bhikkhuniyo nandakovaadasuttapariyosaane (ma0 ni0 3.398 aadayo) arahatta.m paapu.ni.msu. evameta.m ^a^P1.0342^ea^ vatthu samu.t.thita.m. aparabhaage satthaa jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo .thaanantare .thapento mahaapajaapati.m ratta~n~nuuna.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.
[03] 236^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^khemaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamikaa bhikkhunii. ito pa.t.thaaya ca panassaa pa~nhakamme ayamanupubbikathaati avatvaa sabbattha abhiniihaara.m aadi.m katvaa vattabbameva vakkhaama.

[03] atiite kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m aya.m parapariyaapannaa hutvaa nibbatti. athekadivasa.m tassa bhagavato aggasaavika.m sujaatattheri.m naama pi.n.daaya caranta.m disvaa tayo modake datvaa ta.mdivasameva attano kese vissajjetvaa theriyaa daana.m datvaa ``anaagate buddhuppaade tumhe viya mahaapa~n~naa bhaveyya''nti patthana.m katvaa yaavajiiva.m kusalakammesu appamattaa hutvaa kappasatasahassa.m devamanussesu sa.msarantii kassapabuddhakaale kikissa kaasira~n~no gehe pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa sattanna.m bhaginiina.m abbhantaraa hutvaa viisativassasahassaani geheyeva komaaribrahmacariya.m caritvaa taahi bhaginiihi saddhi.m dasabalassa vasanaparive.na.m kaaretvaa eka.m buddhantara.m devamanussesu sa.msarantii imasmi.m buddhuppaade maddara.t.the saagalanagare raajakule pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhi, khemaatissaa naama.m aka.msu. tassaa sariirava.n.no suva.n.narasapi~njaro viya ahosi. saa vayappattaa bimbisaarara~n~no geha.m agamaasi.

[03] saa ^a^M1.0265^ea^ tathaagate raajagaha.m upanissaaya ve.luvane viharante ``satthaa kira ruupe dosa.m dassetii''ti ruupamadamattaa ^a^P1.0343^ea^ hutvaa ``mayhampi ruupe dosa.m dasseyyaa''ti bhayena dasabala.m dassanaaya na gacchati. raajaa cintesi -- ``aha.m satthu aggupa.t.thaako, maadisassa ca naama ariyasaavakassa aggamahesii dasabala.m dassanaaya na gacchati, na me eta.m ruccatii''ti. so kaviihi ve.luvanuyyaanassa va.n.na.m bandhaapetvaa ``khemaaya deviyaa savanuupacaare gaayathaa''ti aaha. saa uyyaanassa va.n.na.m sutvaa gantukaamaa hutvaa raajaana.m pa.tipucchi. raajaa ``uyyaana.m gaccha, satthaara.m ^a^V1.0257^ea^ pana adisvaa aagantu.m na labhissasii''ti aaha. saa ra~n~no pa.tivacana.m adatvaava magga.m pa.tipajji. raajaa taaya saddhi.m gacchante purise aaha -- ``sace devii uyyaanato nivattamaanaa dasabala.m passati, icceta.m kusala.m. sace na passati, raajaa.naaya na.m dassethaa''ti. atha kho saa devii divasabhaaga.m uyyaane caritvaa nivattantii dasabala.m adisvaava gantu.m aaraddhaa. atha na.m raajapurisaa attano aruciyaava devi.m satthu santika.m nayi.msu.

[03] satthaa ta.m aagacchanti.m disvaa iddhiyaa eka.m devacchara.m nimminitvaa taalava.n.ta.m gahetvaa biijamaana.m viya akaasi. khemaa devii ta.m disvaa cintesi -- ``maanamhi na.t.thaa, evaruupaa naama devaccharappa.tibhaagaa itthiyo dasabalassa aviduure ti.t.thanti, aha.m etaasa.m paricaarikaapi nappahomi, maanamada.m hi nissaaya paapacittassa vasena na.t.thaa''ti ta.m nimitta.m gahetvaa tameva itthi.m olokayamaanaa a.t.thaasi. athassaa passantiyaava tathaagatassa adhi.t.thaanabalena saa itthii pa.thamavaya.m atikkamma majjhimavaye ^a^P1.0344^ea^ .thitaa viya majjhimavaya.m atikkamma pacchimavaye .thitaa viya ca valittacaa palitakesaa kha.n.davira.ladantaa ahosi. tato tassaa passantiyaava saddhi.m taalava.n.tena parivattitvaa paripati. tato khemaa pubbahetusampannattaa tasmi.m aaramma.ne aapaathagate eva.m cintesi -- ``eva.mvidhampi naama sariira.m evaruupa.m vipatti.m paapu.naati, mayhampi sariira.m eva.mgatikameva bhavissatii''ti. athassaa eva.m cintitakkha.ne satthaa ima.m dhammapade gaathamaaha --
[21] ``ye ^a^M1.0266^ea^ raagarattaanupatanti sota.m,
[27] saya.mkata.m makka.takova jaala.m.
[26] etampi chetvaana vajanti dhiiraa,
[22] anapekkhino sabbadukkha.m pahaayaa''ti..

[03] saa gaathaapariyosaane .thitapade .thitaayeva saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni. agaaramajjhe vasantena naama arahatta.m pattena ta.mdivasameva parinibbaayitabba.m vaa pabbajitabba.m vaa hoti, saa pana attano aayusa"nkhaaraana.m pavattanabhaava.m ~natvaa ``attano pabbajja.m anujaanaapessaamii''ti satthaara.m vanditvaa raajanivesana.m gantvaa raajaana.m anabhivaadetvaava a.t.thaasi. raajaa i"ngiteneva a~n~naasi -- ``ariyadhamma.m pattaa bhavissatii''ti. atha na.m aaha -- ``devi gataa nu kho satthudassanaayaa''ti. mahaaraaja, tumhehi di.t.thadassana.m paritta.m, aha.m pana dasabala.m ^a^V1.0258^ea^ sudi.t.thamakaasi.m, pabbajja.m me anujaanaathaati ^a^P1.0345^ea^. raajaa ``saadhu, devii''ti sampa.ticchitvaa suva.n.nasivikaaya bhikkhuniupassaya.m upanetvaa pabbaajesi. athassaa ``khemaatherii naama gihibhaave .thatvaa arahatta.m pattaa''ti mahaapa~n~nabhaavo paaka.to ahosi. idamettha vatthu. atha satthaa aparabhaage jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thaanantare .thapento khemaatheri.m mahaapa~n~naana.m agga.t.thaane .thapesiiti.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^uppalava.n.naa^eb^ti niiluppalagabbhasadiseneva va.n.nena samannaagatattaa eva.mladdhanaamaa therii. saa kira padumuttarabuddhakaale ha.msavatiya.m kulagehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa aparabhaage mahaajanena saddhi.m satthu santika.m gantvaa dhamma.m su.nantii satthaara.m eka.m bhikkhuni.m iddhimantiina.m agga.t.thaane .thapenta.m disvaa sattaaha.m buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusa"nghassa mahaadaana.m datvaa ta.m .thaanantara.m patthesi. saa yaavajiiva.m kusala.m katvaa devamanussesu sa.msarantii kassapabuddhakaale baaraa.nasinagare kikissa kaasira~n~no gehe pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitvaa sattanna.m bhaginiina.m abbhantaraa hutvaa viisati vassasahassaani ^a^M1.0267^ea^ brahmacariya.m caritvaa bhikkhusa"nghassa parive.na.m katvaa devaloke nibbattaa.
